title: Ad Creative  Editor | Full Time
description:
At Sole Assistant, we place VAs into stable, long-term roles with US-based ecommerce businesses. We have hired and placed more than 300 VAs in the last 3 years and currently support over 75 active roles. Our mission is to give talented Filipino VAs a real career pathway, not a short-term gig.

If you are coachable, fast, and eager to grow, this is the right opportunity for you.



Why Work With Sole Assistant:



‚Ä¢ Stable full-time work with long-term clients

‚Ä¢ Clear SOPs so you always know what to do

‚Ä¢ Growth opportunities as you improve your skills

‚Ä¢ 3-month employment guarantee (Average employment is 12+ months)

‚Ä¢ We will replace you with another company if let go



We have a large network of businesses actively hiring, which allows us to place strong candidates quickly.



Role: Ad Creative Editor

Rate: $5/hour | Around PHP46,000+ per month



About the Role:

The purpose of the Editor Role at our brand is to process ad briefs from our creative team and bring them to life through the power of editing.



As an Editor, you are responsible for the actual execution & applying the finishing touches on all the ads we create. Our success as a marketing team will rely on your ability to comprehend each ad concept, strategically put the pieces together, and enhance the overall marketing message with your edits.



You understand that the smallest details can make the biggest differences. So, you take pride in paying immense attention to detail in everything you do as those details can be the difference between an ad that is shown to millions & an ad that is shown to very few.



Your active purpose at our brand is to work alongside our Creative Directors and Copywriters to edit & bring to life ad briefs, utilize our creative resources, and help produce winning ads month over month for our clients.



If you are a perfect fit, you will be given documents as well as reference winning ads and what makes those ads a winner and those must be studied for not only our business success but yours as well at our company. Must be ready to create 6-7 batches a week, as well as an onboarding quiz on what makes a winning ad and our target customer.



Direct Experience Qualifications:

- 1 Year of experience in video editing or designing ads

- 1 Year of experience in CapCut, Photoshop

- 1 Year of experience editing eCommerce ads

- Experience with HeyGen

- Experience with Higgsfield

- Experience with eleven labs

- Nano bannana

- Sora 2

- Working in a team environment & understanding individual roles



Character Traits:

- Excruciatingly high level of attention to detail with all designs & edits

Required Skills & Experience

Strong understanding of:

Highly Desirable:

title: thesis writer
description:
Thesis writing:



Assignment overview: Project proposal (4000 words)



In this assignment, you will have the opportunity to showcase your intellectual depth, problem-solving skills, and dedication to data-driven solutions. The goal is to demonstrate your competence in executing the Problem Definition and Analysis and Diagnosis steps for the LYCar project. Your proposal should be comprehensive, well-structured, and convincing, highlighting your preparedness for the Execution phase.



**Document content**



**Chapter 1: Problem Definition**

In the first chapter, you will set the stage by providing necessary background information and identifying key stakeholders related to the case situation. Your task is to clearly define the problem your project aims to address. You should analyze the problem and utilize various sources of evidence to showcase your broad knowledge base on the subject matter, supporting your problem statement effectively.



**Chapter 2: Literature Review**

The second chapter involves an exploration of relevant literature, where you will analyze different scenarios, factors, and potential solutions relevant to the research problem. Your analysis should be well-rounded, considering multiple perspectives and demonstrating intellectual depth. Present well-reasoned arguments and propose potential courses of action to tackle the identified problem. Develop a conceptual framework and formulate research questions that will guide your study.



**Chapter 3: Methodology (Plan)**

This chapter is of utmost importance as it demonstrates your expertise in applying the acquired knowledge and theory into your research strategy. You will outline your research design and methodology, describing the structured and systematic approach you will use to investigate the problem identified in Chapters 1 and 2. Justify the selected research methods, ensuring the reliability and validity of data collection. Additionally, competently address any ethical and data management issues related to your research.



**Chapter 4: Dissemination (Plan)**

Explain how your project will have meaningful impact on the company. Develop a clear and actionable plan for disseminating the knowledge and insights derived from your study and highlight various valuable channels through which you will share your findings with key stakeholders. Discuss how you will provide proof of sufficient interaction with these stakeholders.

title: Infographic Designer ‚Äî Business Book Visual Finisher
description:
I am the author of a business leadership book ("Dialogue of Work") 

currently in production. I need an experienced infographic designer 

to take AI-generated draft visuals and finish them to professional 

print quality.



IMPORTANT: You are NOT designing from scratch. AI tools have 

already generated rough drafts with the correct content, layout, 

and logic. Your job is to refine, correct, and polish them to 

match our exact visual style guide.



THE WORK:

- 35 infographic visuals total (framework diagrams, comparison 

  charts, process flows, data visualizations)

- Each visual comes with: an AI draft + a detailed prompt 

  describing exactly what it should contain

- You match colors, typography, spacing, and layout to our 

  style guide (provided on day one)



STYLE REQUIREMENTS:

- Color palette: 6 specific colors with exact hex codes (provided)

- Typography: Helvetica Neue / Arial, clean sans-serif

- Containers: 8px rounded corners, subtle drop shadows

- Abstract geometric human figures only (no detailed faces)

- Must be print-ready for 6"√ó9" business book format

- Must work in grayscale



DELIVERABLES:

- SVG or high-resolution PNG files (300 DPI minimum)

- Each visual sized for 4.5" print width

- Consistent visual language across all 35 pieces

- Final files organized and labeled by chapter and figure number



PROCESS:

- Week 1: Paid test task ‚Äî finish 1 visual to confirm style match

- If test passes: proceed with full project in batches of 5-7 visuals

- Feedback given within 24 hours of each batch submission

- Maximum 2 revision rounds per visual



SKILLS NEEDED:

- Adobe Illustrator, Figma, or equivalent vector design tool

- Experience with infographics or business publication design

- Attention to exact color matching and typography precision

- Able to follow a strict style guide without creative deviation

- Good English (for reading content descriptions)



TIMELINE: Approximately 6-8 weeks, flexible.



Please include 2-3 portfolio samples of infographic or diagram work 

when you apply.

title: YouTube Video Editor Needed ‚Äì Documentary Style
description:
Hello,



I am currently looking for an experienced YouTube video editor to join me on a long-term project.



I already run a French YouTube channel with over 4,000 subscribers, where several videos have reached hundreds of thousands of views. I am now launching a new English YouTube channel, targeting a wider international audience, and I am looking for the right editor to help build this channel from the ground up.



? Project Overview



The content will mainly consist of:



Facecam recordings



Voice-over storytelling



Documentary-style editing



B-roll integration, music, pacing, and storytelling-driven edits



The goal is to reproduce the style and quality of established documentary-style YouTube channels (references will be provided privately).



We are aiming for:



1 to 2 long-form videos per week



Potential additional Shorts content later on



This means there will be consistent and ongoing work for the right person.



? Who I‚Äôm Looking For



Someone experienced with YouTube documentary-style editing



Strong storytelling and pacing skills



Ability to keep viewer retention high



Someone who understands YouTube standards and audience expectations



Reliable and interested in a long-term collaboration



This is not a beginner position ‚Äî I‚Äôm specifically looking for someone who already has experience working with YouTube creators or documentary content.



Here exemple of the channel we need to copy: 
 



? Application Process



If you are interested:



Please apply to this job with examples of similar work you‚Äôve done.



Let me know your rate per edited minute.



Tell me if you have already worked on YouTube documentary-style videos.



Shortlisted editors will receive a 1-minute trial edit to see how you approach the content and editing style. If the result matches what I‚Äôm looking for, we will move forward into a long-term collaboration.



The goal is to build a serious YouTube channel over time, so I‚Äôm looking for someone who wants to grow with the project.



Looking forward to working together.



Thank you.

title: Google Ads & Landing Page Support Virtual Assistant
description:
We are a digital marketing agency looking for a detail-oriented Google Ads & Landing Page Support Assistant to help our Google Ads Manager with day-to-day tasks. This is an administrative/implementation role, not a senior strategist position.



Key Responsibilities

Google Ads administrative support



Assist with basic campaign setup (creating campaigns, ad groups, ads, adding keywords, extensions from provided structures or templates).



Make minor budget and bid changes as directed by the Google Ads Manager.



Perform daily/weekly account checks (disapproved ads, limited by budget, tracking issues, sudden drops in impressions or conversions).



Reporting and monitoring



Pull performance reports from Google Ads and Analytics (CTR, CPC, CPA, conversions, etc.).



Update report templates and dashboards with fresh data.



Flag notable changes or anomalies to the Google Ads Manager (e.g., big jumps in cost, conversions going down, new disapprovals).



Google support, policy, and verification



Open and manage support tickets with Google for disapprovals, policy questions, and technical issues.



Handle verification processes (business, advertiser, identity) following internal SOPs.



Keep organized records of all support interactions and outcomes.



Landing page and tracking support



Make minor edits to existing landing pages in Instapage, Unbounce, Webflow, and WordPress (text changes, image swaps, simple layout tweaks).



Add or update tracking scripts, pixels, and tags as instructed (e.g., Google tags, conversion tracking).



Nice-to-have: Help build new landing pages using templates or builders under guidance from the team.



Requirements

5+ years of full-time experience in a digital marketing, advertising, or virtual assistant role with regular exposure to Google Ads.



Comfortable working inside Google Ads: navigating the interface, updating campaigns, pulling data, and following clear instructions.



Basic understanding of performance metrics (impressions, clicks, CTR, CPC, conversions, CPA).



Experience with at least one of the following: Instapage, Unbounce, Webflow, or WordPress; able to make minor content and layout edits.



Basic HTML/CSS knowledge sufficient for small changes and troubleshooting simple layout issues.



Strong English communication skills (written and spoken).



Reliable internet connection and ability to work with some overlap in US business hours.



Nice-to-Have

Experience assisting with Google Ads account issues, policy disapprovals, or verification processes.



Prior work in an agency or in a support/assistant role for media buyers or marketing managers.



Experience building landing pages from templates and following simple CRO best practices.



Personal Attributes

Very detail-oriented and organized; comfortable working with numbers and checklists.



Follows instructions and SOPs accurately, but asks questions when something is unclear.



Responsive, reliable, and able to meet deadlines.



Comfortable working in tools like Slack,
, and a project management system (e.g., Asana/ClickUp/Trello).



How to Apply

Please apply through OnlineJobs.ph and include:



Your CV/resume.



A short note about your Google Ads experience (what you actually do day-to-day).



A brief description of which landing page tools you‚Äôve used (Instapage, Unbounce, Webflow, WordPress) and what kind of edits you can do.



Answer this question in your message:



‚ÄúWhat is one common Google Ads issue you‚Äôve handled before (e.g., disapproval, tracking, verification), and how did you fix it?‚Äù



We will only review applications that follow all instructions above.

title: Editorial Illustrator ‚Äî Business Book Chapter Visuals
description:
I am the author of a business leadership book ("Dialogue of Work") 

currently in production. I need a creative illustrator to produce 

15 original editorial illustrations that bring key storytelling 


nts to life.



IMPORTANT: Unlike our infographic work, these visuals are created 

from scratch based on scene descriptions. They require creative 

interpretation, warmth, and human storytelling ‚Äî not just technical 

execution.



THE WORK:

- 15 editorial illustrations for narrative 
nts in the book

- Examples of scenes: a leader and worker walking through a park 

  in Berlin, a circle of 15 people in a garden in Malaga, Spain, 

  a nursing home resident caring for a small potted plant, a 

  young professional in a Korean restaurant, an analytics expert 

  in deep concentration

- Each illustration comes with a written scene description and 

  the relevant book excerpt for context



STYLE REQUIREMENTS:

- Warm, professional, human ‚Äî think editorial illustration for 

  Harvard Business Review or a Malcolm Gladwell book

- Abstract or semi-abstract figures (no hyper-realistic portraits)

- Color palette: 6 specific colors provided in style guide

- Must feel cohesive ‚Äî all 15 illustrations from the same visual world

- Must work in grayscale for print fallback

- Book format: 6"√ó9", visuals up to 4.5" wide



DELIVERABLES:

- High-resolution PNG or SVG files (300 DPI minimum)

- Each illustration sized for print

- Consistent style across all 15 pieces



PROCESS:

- Week 1: Paid test task ‚Äî one illustration from a provided 

  scene description

- If test passes: proceed with full project in batches of 3-4

- Feedback given within 24 hours per batch

- Maximum 2 revision rounds per illustration



SKILLS NEEDED:

- Strong editorial or conceptual illustration portfolio

- Experience illustrating human scenes and emotions

- Ability to work within a defined color palette and style guide

- Good English (for reading scene descriptions and book excerpts)

- Experience with print-ready file preparation preferred



TIMELINE: Approximately 8-10 weeks, flexible.



Please include 3-5 portfolio samples showing editorial or 

character-based illustration work when you apply. Applications 

without portfolio samples will not be considered.

I‚Äôm looking for a podcast Video Editor to join my agency full-time (Not a freelancer). We help podcasters take their long episodes and turn them into great content for YouTube and social media.



The role is remote, long-term, and with flexible hours. I don‚Äôt care when you work, as long as deadlines are met and the quality is consistent.



What You‚Äôll Do:

Edit 3 full podcast episodes per week (1to 2 hours each).

9‚Äì15 short-form clips per week

Create simple, eye-catching thumbnails.



Watch this (VERY IMPORTANT): 


/file/d/1ZeXpmfb8ChrqZoICiZfl2T7EHW74m58D/view?usp=sharing



What I‚Äôm Looking For:

Strong portfolio of podcast video editing work. PLEASE DON'T APPLY IF YOU'RE NOT A PODCAST VIDEO EDITOR.

Experience with Adobe Premiere Pro & After Effects.

Start your message with the word medal so I know you read the entire post.

Good communication skills, reliable internet connection, and self-management.



Pay & Benefits:

$1000/month.

Vacation: 15 days of Paid Leave a year (vacation + Sick) after 6 months of work.

13th-Month Pay. This is typically paid in December.

Regular public holidays: 12 Days a year.



How to Apply:

Send your portfolio. ONLY PODCAST EDITS PLEASE.

Record a short video introducing yourself. This video is a must for your application to be considered.

Complete a short test edit before hiring. I will send you the raw footage if you get shortlisted.



Examples of the editing style and quality I‚Äôm looking for:

youtu.be/WiykZ3rYBuQ

youtu.be/vVqVvGIZMQY

youtu.be/a5hDVhrytG4



If you‚Äôre passionate about editing, love podcasts, and want a stable long-term role where you can grow with me, I‚Äôd love to hear from you!

title: Google Ads Media Buyer for E-Commerce Brands ($50K‚Äì$100K+/Month Budgets)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Google Ads Media Buyer to manage and scale campaigns for e-commerce brands.



This role is for someone who has real experience managing large budgets and driving profitable growth. You must have experience managing at least $50,000‚Äì$100,000+ per month in Google Ads spend for e-commerce brands.



This will start with one project for now, with the opportunity to manage additional projects as we grow.



This is a long-term opportunity with consistent work and growth.



Responsibilities



‚Ä¢ Manage and optimize Google Ads campaigns across Search, Shopping, Performance Max, and YouTube

‚Ä¢ Handle monthly budgets of $50,000‚Äì$100,000+

‚Ä¢ Improve ROAS, CPA, and overall account performance

‚Ä¢ Scale profitable campaigns and reduce wasted spend

‚Ä¢ Conduct keyword research and competitor analysis

‚Ä¢ Optimize Shopping feeds and campaign structure

‚Ä¢ Monitor performance daily and make ongoing optimizations



Requirements



‚Ä¢ Proven experience managing Google Ads for e-commerce brands

‚Ä¢ Experience managing $50K‚Äì$100K+/month in ad spend

‚Ä¢ Strong experience with Shopping and Performance Max campaigns

‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of ROAS, CPA, and scaling strategies

‚Ä¢ Detail-oriented and reliable

‚Ä¢ Strong English communication



Nice to Have



‚Ä¢ Experience with Shopify brands

‚Ä¢ Agency experience

‚Ä¢ Experience with Meta Ads



Position Details



‚Ä¢ Starts with one project, with opportunity for more as we grow

‚Ä¢ Long-term opportunity

‚Ä¢ Competitive pay based on experience



To apply, please include your experience, monthly budgets managed, example results, and e-commerce brands you have worked with. When you reply to this post, add the word "grape" at the end of the title of your reply.

title: Back Office & Invoicing Specialist
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION



Back Office & Invoicing Specialist (Remote ‚Äì Philippines)



Company: European Specialty Coffee & Distribution Group

Structure: Czech Operating Company + US Holding

Location: Remote (Philippines ‚Äì CET overlap required)

Employment Type: Full-Time

Reports To: Senior Financial Controller



?



???? About Us



We are a European specialty coffee roasting, distribution, and service company headquartered in the Czech Republic with a US holding structure. Our operations include wholesale coffee, tea distribution, equipment service, and retail caf√©s.



We are implementing Odoo ERP to centralize order processing, accounting control, and operational workflows. We are seeking a highly organized Back Office & Invoicing Specialist to manage daily transactional processes and ensure accurate data entry within Odoo.



This role replaces a mixed customer service/accounting position and is focused on operational accuracy and financial discipline.



?



Position Overview



The Back Office & Invoicing Specialist is responsible for:

 ‚Ä¢ Processing all sales orders and invoices

 ‚Ä¢ Managing returns and credit notes

 ‚Ä¢ Bank reconciliation and payment pairing

 ‚Ä¢ Monitoring receivables and payables

 ‚Ä¢ Recording and monitoring expenses

 ‚Ä¢ Maintaining price lists

 ‚Ä¢ Assisting sales with accurate offers

 ‚Ä¢ Supporting cost control and profitability checks



This is a detail-oriented role requiring ERP experience and strong process discipline.



?



Key Responsibilities



1. Sales Order & Invoicing Management (Odoo)

 ‚Ä¢ Process B2B and monitor B2C orders in Odoo

 ‚Ä¢ Generate invoices and proforma invoices

 ‚Ä¢ Issue credit notes

 ‚Ä¢ Process returns and corrections

 ‚Ä¢ Ensure correct VAT application

 ‚Ä¢ Confirm pricing matches approved price lists

 ‚Ä¢ Coordinate with warehouse for shipment confirmation



?



2. Receivables & Bank Reconciliation

 ‚Ä¢ Daily bank transaction pairing

 ‚Ä¢ Match payments to invoices

 ‚Ä¢ Monitor Accounts Receivable aging

 ‚Ä¢ Flag overdue invoices to sales team

 ‚Ä¢ Prepare AR aging reports

 ‚Ä¢ Support collections tracking



?



3. Payables & Expense Monitoring

 ‚Ä¢ Record supplier invoices

 ‚Ä¢ Enter and categorize company expenses

 ‚Ä¢ Monitor expense documentation completeness

 ‚Ä¢ Track due dates of supplier payments

 ‚Ä¢ Assist in cost monitoring and expense reporting

 ‚Ä¢ Prepare documents for Senior Controller review



?



4. Pricing & Profitability Control

 ‚Ä¢ Maintain and update official price lists in Odoo

 ‚Ä¢ Ensure pricing consistency across clients

 ‚Ä¢ Double-check sales offers for correct margin application

 ‚Ä¢ Support sales team by preparing structured offers

 ‚Ä¢ Flag pricing anomalies to Controller or Managing Director

 ‚Ä¢ Monitor discount application accuracy



This role does NOT approve pricing changes but ensures correct execution.



?



5. ERP & E-Commerce Coordination

 ‚Ä¢ Work daily inside Odoo ERP

 ‚Ä¢ Support integration between Shopify and Odoo

 ‚Ä¢ Monitor order synchronization

 ‚Ä¢ Correct data discrepancies

 ‚Ä¢ Maintain accurate customer and product master data

 ‚Ä¢ Ensure tax mapping accuracy



Experience with Odoo, Zoho, or similar ERP systems preferred.

Experience with Shopify or other e-commerce platforms is highly valued.



?



6. Documentation & Compliance Preparation

 ‚Ä¢ Prepare monthly transaction exports

 ‚Ä¢ Organize VAT documentation

 ‚Ä¢ Maintain structured digital filing

 ‚Ä¢ Ensure audit trail readiness

 ‚Ä¢ Assist Senior Financial Controller in preparing documents for Czech external accounting firm



?



KPIs

 ‚Ä¢ Invoice accuracy ? 99.5%

 ‚Ä¢ Bank reconciliation completed daily

 ‚Ä¢ AR aging within agreed targets

 ‚Ä¢ Zero unauthorized pricing errors

 ‚Ä¢ Monthly closing support completed by Day 3

 ‚Ä¢ Clean and organized digital documentation



?



Required Qualifications

 ‚Ä¢ 3+ years experience in back office, accounting support, or invoicing

 ‚Ä¢ Experience with ERP systems (Odoo preferred)

 ‚Ä¢ Experience with accounting software

 ‚Ä¢ Experience with Shopify or e-commerce platforms preferred

 ‚Ä¢ Strong Excel skills

 ‚Ä¢ Understanding of receivables and payables processes

 ‚Ä¢ High attention to detail

 ‚Ä¢ Strong written and verbal English

 ‚Ä¢ Ability to work CET overlapping hours



?



Ideal Candidate Profile

 ‚Ä¢ Extremely organized

 ‚Ä¢ Process-driven

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable with repetitive but critical tasks

 ‚Ä¢ Strong numerical accuracy

 ‚Ä¢ Understands margin logic

 ‚Ä¢ Proactive in identifying discrepancies

 ‚Ä¢ Not afraid to question incorrect data

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable working in structured reporting environment



?



This Role Is NOT

 ‚Ä¢ A sales role

 ‚Ä¢ A strategic finance role

 ‚Ä¢ A pricing approval role

 ‚Ä¢ A decision-making accounting position



It is a structured execution and control role within ERP.



?



What We Offer

 ‚Ä¢ Stable long-term position

 ‚Ä¢ Direct integration into European business structure

 ‚Ä¢ Professional ERP exposure

 ‚Ä¢ Growth opportunity into Senior Accounting role

 ‚Ä¢ Competitive compensation based on experience

 ‚Ä¢ Remote work with structured management



?



To Apply



Please send:

 ‚Ä¢ Updated CV to 

 ‚Ä¢ ERP experience details (Odoo, Zoho, etc.)

 ‚Ä¢ Accounting software experience

 ‚Ä¢ E-commerce platform experience (if any)

 ‚Ä¢ Availability (hours per week)

 ‚Ä¢ Expected monthly salary

title: Property Management Virtual Assistant
description:
We are looking for a reliable Virtual Assistant who can stay online most of the time and reply to guest or tenant inquiries within 5‚Äì10 minutes maximum.



Most messages will come from rental platforms such as Airbnb, Zillow, 
, and similar platforms, so fast and professional communication is very important.



The workload is usually light (about 2‚Äì3 hours of active work per day), since messages do not come continuously. However, you must be available to respond quickly. For payment purposes, this role will be counted as 2 hours per day.



If you can add value to our company, handle communication efficiently, and help improve our occupancy rate, there will be an opportunity to move into a full-time position based on your performance and experience.

title: Appointment Setter
description:
Title: Appointment Setter

Hours: Full-time | Time Zone: U.S. Business Hours

Pay: Base $1,200 + per-meeting commission (OTE)



About the Role

We‚Äôre a U.S.-based legal-marketing company helping law firms grow through lead generation. As a BDR / Appointment Setter, you‚Äôll make outbound calls to law-firm decision-makers, introduce our software, and book discovery meetings for our sales team. We provide scripts and leads‚Äîbut top performers improve the process, capture insights, and drive results. First 2 months pay full OTE; after that, base + commission.



Who You Are:

- Confident, persuasive, and resilient with no fear of rejection

- Excellent spoken English (minimal accent)

- Results-driven and self-motivated

- Comfortable making high-volume outbound calls and managing your pipeline

- Tech-savvy; quick to learn CRMs and dialers (Zoho, Vonage, etc.)



What You‚Äôll Do:

- Call law-firm prospects daily to secure qualified appointments

- Tailor messaging, handle objections, and log activity in CRM

- Maintain high-volume activity (hundreds of calls weekly)

- Book 5+ meetings/week during ramp; 10/week = top performer

- Collaborate with the team to improve scripts, leads, and outreach strategy



Requirements:

- 1+ years in outbound sales, BDR/SDR, or appointment-setting roles (U.S. client experience preferred)

- Proven track record hitting meeting or sales targets

- Strong phone presence and professional communication

- Comfortable using CRMs, dialers, and tracking performance

- Reliable internet and quiet remote workspace



Preferred:

- Experience calling law firms or professional-services companies

- BDR/SDR experience in high-volume outbound environments

- Sales experience in lead generation, marketing, or SaaS targeting U.S. markets



Why Join Us:

If you‚Äôre ambitious, coachable, and motivated by measurable goals, you‚Äôll thrive here. Build your skills, grow your career, and help law firms succeed‚Äîall from your home office.



To apply, send your resume and a short introduction
 to: 

Subject: Your Name ‚Äì Applicant for Appointment Setter

Example: Maria Santos ‚Äì Applicant for Appointment Setter

Please submit your application to the
. DMs are not monitored.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
We are a fast-growing sports media brand with a strong focus on football, and we are seeking a proactive, creative, organized, and strategic Social Media Manager & Lead Generation Specialist. This role is essential to our growth, elevating our brand‚Äôs online presence, driving audience engagement, and generating quality leads that contribute to our revenue goals.



Key Responsibilities

- Manage and scale all social media channels, including Instagram, TikTok,
, and YouTube.

- Collaborate with our in-house content editor to ensure consistent delivery of high-quality, on-brand content.

- Work closely with our brand strategist to maintain alignment in messaging, positioning, and visual identity.

- Plan, schedule, and publish content across platforms while monitoring performance metrics and implementing data-driven improvements.

- Engage with the community across comments, messages, and other touchpoints to foster a strong online presence.

- Conduct outreach to brands for sponsorships, partnerships, and collaboration opportunities.

- Run, manage, and optimize
 advertising campaigns, with additional platform experience considered an advantage.

- Stay up-to-date with football trends, news, and emerging opportunities to create timely and relevant content.

- Propose new ideas and actively contribute to shaping the long-term social media strategy.

- Produce quick, simple edits for reels, stories, graphics, or carousels

 (major video editing is handled by our in-house editor).

- Assist with minor administrative tasks when needed to support overall team operations.



Qualifications

- Full-time availability (40 hours/week) aligned with Australian time zone / Philippine daytime hours.

- Strong attention to detail, organizational skills, and a consistent professional work ethic.

- Demonstrated understanding of brand aesthetics, storytelling, and effective content execution.

- Proficiency in social media analytics, scheduling tools, and performance measurement.

- Experience in brand and influencer outreach is a plus.

- Working knowledge of basic editing tools (e.g., Canva, CapCut).

- Self-driven, reliable, and able to work effectively in a remote, collaborative environment.



Why Join Us

- Opportunity to contribute meaningfully to the growth of an international sports brand.

- Supportive and collaborative work culture.

- Long-term role with potential for professional growth and expansion of responsibilities.

- A dynamic environment where creativity and initiative are valued.





If you are strategic, proactive, and passionate about social media and sports, we invite you to apply and play a key role in our continued growth.

title: AI Video Creator
description:
About Us: We're a leading Australian luxury bathroom and kitchen products retailer. We're looking for a creative AI video specialist to help us showcase dream bathroom designs through stunning Instagram Reels.



The Role: This is a focused, full-time position where you'll create AI-generated videos of beautiful bathroom interiors featuring our luxury products. If you can do this one task exceptionally well, that's all we need.



What You'll Do:



Generate high-quality AI videos of dream bathroom interiors in styles like modern luxury, contemporary, Japandi, and Scandinavian

Create content suitable for Instagram Reels (vertical format, engaging, eye-catching)

Incorporate our luxury bathroom products into the designs

Produce consistent, scroll-stopping content that showcases aspirational bathroom spaces



What We're Looking For:



Proficiency in AI tools (MidJourney, Veo3, Higgsfield, or similar)

Understanding of what makes engaging Instagram Reels content

Eye for contemporary luxury interior design and modern aesthetics (Japandi, Scandinavian, minimalist styles)

Ability to create polished, professional-looking videos

Reliable and able to produce content consistently

Strong creative judgement, adaptability, and ability to work independently with minimal revisions



Trial Task (Required to Apply): Submit 2 AI-generated videos of dream bathroom interiors. These should be:



Suitable for Instagram Reels format (vertical, 9:16 ratio)

High quality and visually stunning

Showcase modern luxury styles (contemporary, Japandi, Scandinavian, etc.)

Use products from this folder to create your videos: 

Show us your best work!



To Apply: Complete this Google Form with your trial videos: 





Hiring Process: Selected candidates will be hired for a paid trial period. During the trial, you must use your own AI tools and subscriptions. After successfully completing the trial and joining us full-time, all required subscriptions (Adobe Creative Suite, MidJourney, Veo3, Runway, etc.) will be provided at our cost.



NOTE: Applications without relevant trial task and AI tool experience or portfolio examples will not be considered.

title: E - Commerce Video Editor
description:
Overview

We are seeking an exceptional, data-driven Video Editor obsessed with driving conversions for e-commerce/DTC brands. This is a fast-paced role requiring a marketer's mindset, platform expertise, and rapid iteration based on performance data.



Core Responsibilities (What You Will Do)

Conversion Focus: Edit raw footage (often UGC-style) into scroll-stopping, short-form ads (15-60 seconds) for Meta, TikTok, and YouTube, focused entirely on driving sales.



DR Implementation: Structure videos using Direct Response (DR) frameworks (e.g., Problem-Agitate-Solution), ensuring a powerful hook in the first 3 seconds, and seamless CTA integration.



Technical Execution: Apply advanced post-production techniques: color grading, audio mixing, speed ramping, dynamic transitions, and creating engaging typography/subtitles.



Rapid Iteration: Maintain fast turnaround (24 for first cuts) and produce multiple testing variations based on performance metrics (CTR, ROAS, Hook Rate).



Platform Mastery: Optimize content (9:16, 1:1, etc.) for native feel and best practices across TikTok, Reels, and YouTube Ads.



Pre-requisites (Must-Haves)

Experience: Proven portfolio of successful e-commerce/DTC ad editing (not just cinematic/corporate work).



Software Mastery: Advanced proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.



Mindset: Deep understanding of DR Marketing and key metrics (ROAS, CTR). Must be performance-driven, flexible, and willing to iterate based on data without ego.



Skills: Expertise in UGC-style editing, audio/sound design, and closed captioning/subtitles.



Bonus Skills

Proficiency in After Effects, CapCut, or DaVinci Resolve.



Familiarity with ad platforms and marketing metrics.



Workload: Initial paid trial project, then transitioning to 20 hours per week ongoing.



Shift: Flexible hours; work is output-based with strict deadlines.



To Apply:

If you are an exceptional designer with a portfolio that demonstrates world-class DTC brand quality, kindly fill out the application form:






Looking forward to receiving your application!

title: Email & SMS Manager (Klaviyo Specialist)
description:

title: Accounting & Tax Virtual Assistant (Junior to Mid-Level, Australia-Focused)
description:
We are looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Accounting and Tax Virtual Assistant to support our team with Australian tax, compliance, and accounting tasks. We're seeking someone with a broader understanding of Australian accounting standards, BAS/IAS compliance, and business tax reporting.



This role is ideal for a junior to mid-level candidate who is comfortable working virtually, has strong proficiency in Xero, and is eager to grow their career in virtual accounting services with an Australian focus.



Core Competencies

- Hands-on experience in Australian accounting and tax

- Proficiency in Xero (Australian version); experience with QuickBooks or MYOB is a plus

- Ability to handle a variety of accounting tasks, including:

- BAS and IAS preparation and lodgement

- GST, PAYG, and Superannuation compliance

- Preparation of financial reports for businesses, trusts, or companies

- Familiarity with Division 7A, FBT, CGT, and PSI rules (a bonus, not a must)

- Support for business tax return preparation and small business tax strategies



Preferred Qualifications

- CPA certification or working towards CPA is preferred but not essential

- 1‚Äì4 years of experience in an Australian accounting role

- Prior experience working remotely or in a virtual assistant capacity is a plus

- Technical Skills

- Strong knowledge of Xero, including:

- Tax code setup and reconciliation (GST, GST-free, input-taxed)

- BAS/IAS preparation and submission through ATO Portal

- Payroll processing in compliance with STP and Superannuation

- Ability to generate and interpret financial statements and management reports

- Skilled in using Excel or Google Sheets for tax tracking, analysis, and reconciliations

- Familiarity with tools like TaxCalc, Business Fitness Workpapers, and ATO online services



What You'll Do

- Support and work with accountants with day-to-day tasks relating to Australian tax compliance

- Assist in the preparation of business activity statements (BAS), payroll, and reconciliations

- Manage financial records with attention to accuracy and ATO compliance

- Help prepare documentation for year-end tax returns and reports

- Maintain clear communication and reliable task tracking in a remote setting



This is a long-term, remote opportunity for someone who is ready to move beyond data entry and basic bookkeeping and gain deeper experience in Australian tax and financial support. You‚Äôll work alongside experienced accountants and be part of a collaborative team. Apply now if you're detail-driven, tech-savvy, and committed to helping businesses meet their compliance and financial goals.

title: API Integration Developer ‚Äî E-commerce SaaS Platform
description:
We're a growing tech studio building an AI-powered SaaS platform for brands. We need a skilled developer to own our API integration layer ‚Äî setting up, building, and maintaining connections to major e-commerce and advertising platforms.



What you'll be doing:



‚Ä¢Setting up developer accounts and obtaining API credentials for platforms like Google Ads, Shopify, Klaviyo, TikTok Ads, Amazon Ads, and Postscript

‚Ä¢Building and maintaining OAuth 2.0 authentication flows

‚Ä¢Creating reliable data sync pipelines that pull platform data into our application

‚Ä¢Implementing token refresh logic, error handling, and retry mechanisms

‚Ä¢Setting up and managing webhook receivers for real-time data updates

‚Ä¢Writing clean, well-documented TypeScript code that integrates with our existing codebase

‚Ä¢Troubleshooting API issues, rate limits, and platform-specific quirks



Our tech stack:



‚Ä¢Next.js / React / TypeScript

‚Ä¢Prisma ORM / PostgreSQL

‚Ä¢Deployed on Vercel

‚Ä¢AI layer powered by Anthropic Claude

‚Ä¢Agentic Saas



What we're NOT looking for:



‚Ä¢Someone who only knows WordPress or basic HTML/CSS

‚Ä¢Someone who hasn't worked with APIs in production

‚Ä¢Someone who needs hand-holding on OAuth flows



Requirements



Must have:



‚Ä¢3+ years of experience with REST API integrations



‚Ä¢Hands-on experience implementing OAuth 2.0 flows in production



‚Ä¢Experience with at least 2 of these APIs: Shopify Admin API, Meta/Facebook Marketing API, Google Ads API, Klaviyo API, Amazon Ads API



‚Ä¢Strong proficiency in TypeScript and Node.js



‚Ä¢Experience with Next.js API routes



‚Ä¢Familiarity with PostgreSQL and an ORM (Prisma preferred)



‚Ä¢Experience handling webhook receivers and token refresh in production



‚Ä¢Solid understanding of error handling, rate limiting, and retry patterns



Nice to have:



‚Ä¢Experience with multiple ad platform APIs



‚Ä¢Experience with Vercel deployments



‚Ä¢Familiarity with e-commerce data models (orders, customers, campaigns, metrics)



‚Ä¢Experience building data sync/ETL pipelines



Screening Questions (include in application)



1.

Which e-commerce or ad platform APIs have you personally integrated with? Describe what you built.



2.

Walk me through how you'd implement an OAuth 2.0 flow for Google Ads in a Next.js app.



3.

How do you handle token expiration and refresh in production?



4.

If given API docs and credentials, how long would it take you to build a complete OAuth flow and data sync for a platform like Shopify, TikTok, Stripe?



5.

What's your availability and expected monthly rate?



6.

Do you have any experience with OpenClaw?

title: Graphic Designer / E-Learning Instructional Designer
description:
ELLSEY Creative is looking for a full-time Graphic Designer, ideally with experience in digital learning design.



ELLSEY Creative designs digital learning, capability materials, and branded communications for organisations that care about quality and standards. Much of our work involves translating complex, content-heavy information into structured, visually clear learning and communication assets.



This role sits at the intersection of graphic design and digital learning execution.





ROLE FOCUS



As the Graphic Designer, you are responsible for the visual design and structured layout of:

‚Ä¢ Digital learning modules

‚Ä¢ Interactive training materials

‚Ä¢ Proposals and pitch decks

‚Ä¢ Capability statements and reports

‚Ä¢ Flyers and campaign collateral

‚Ä¢ Social media graphics



E-learning is a core component of this role. You will design and build visually structured learning modules using supplied content, ensuring clarity, flow, pacing, and engagement.



You understand that in digital learning, design affects comprehension. You can structure screens, apply hierarchy, reduce cognitive overload, and create clean, intuitive learning experiences.



This is a hands-on execution role requiring strong layout capability and disciplined design standards.





KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



‚Ä¢ Design and build digital learning modules from existing content

‚Ä¢ Structure learning screens for clarity, pacing, and comprehension

‚Ä¢ Apply visual hierarchy and layout principles to complex information

‚Ä¢ Create supporting visuals, diagrams, and interactive elements where required

‚Ä¢ Design long-form structured materials such as proposals, reports, and booklets

‚Ä¢ Produce campaign assets including flyers and social graphics

‚Ä¢ Maintain brand consistency and visual cohesion across multiple client environments

‚Ä¢ Ensure all outputs are professionally finished and aligned with ELLSEY Creative standards





DESIGN CAPABILITY



You are a strong graphic designer first.

You are confident using the Adobe Creative Suite, particularly:

‚Ä¢ InDesign

‚Ä¢ Illustrator

‚Ä¢ Photoshop



Experience using e-learning authoring tools (Articulate, aNewSpring, Kajabi or similar) is highly regarded.



You understand that learning design is not decoration. You know how to make screens readable, structured, and calm, not cluttered or overwhelming.





INFORMATION AND LEARNING STRUCTURE



‚Ä¢ You are comfortable working with dense content.

‚Ä¢ You can break down large volumes of information into structured layouts and logical screen sequences.

‚Ä¢ You understand the fundamentals of learner flow, attention, and reinforcement - even if you are not a formally trained instructional designer.





Working at ELLSEY Creative:

‚Ä¢ You work with autonomy and ownership. You are trusted to execute learning and design materials to a high standard.

‚Ä¢ You collaborate internally on structure and direction but are accountable for visual clarity and execution quality.

‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll be part of a team that moves quickly, values quality, and works across diverse industries. 

‚Ä¢ If you thrive in complexity and enjoy bringing order to fast-moving environments, this role will stretch and reward you.





Highly regarded:

‚Ä¢ Experience building structured digital learning modules

‚Ä¢ Experience in a senior design role

‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of branding systems

‚Ä¢ Ability to maintain consistency across multiple brands





What matters:

‚Ä¢ This role suits someone who:

‚Ä¢ Cares deeply about quality

‚Ä¢ Thinks structurally

‚Ä¢ Works with discipline

‚Ä¢ Understands that clarity is more powerful than decoration



This is a role for a designer who wants to build meaningful learning and communication materials, not just make things look good.







REMUNERATION



Pay rate will be dependent on experience and demonstrated capability.

title: Paid Ads Expert (Performance Marketing ‚Äì Lead & Revenue Focus)
description:
We are hiring a Paid Ads Expert to join our marketing agency. This role is 100% performance-driven.



Your responsibility is simple: generate qualified leads and profitable website purchases across multiple client accounts.



This is not a brand awareness or engagement role. We are looking for someone who understands funnels, tracking infrastructure, attribution logic, and ROI optimization.



Your Mission:



Plan, launch, optimize, and scale paid advertising campaigns that produce measurable business results ‚Äî leads, sales, and revenue ‚Äî for multiple clients simultaneously.



You will be accountable for performance metrics, not impressions.



Core Responsibilities:



Develop and execute full-funnel paid ad strategies for both e-commerce and B2B lead generation clients.



Plan, structure, and manage campaigns across:

1 Meta Ads 
 and Instagram)

2 Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube)

3 TikTok Ads (strong advantage)



Build conversion-focused campaigns optimized for:

1 Website purchases

2 Qualified lead submissions



Properly structure cold, warm, and retargeting campaigns with clear budget allocation logic.



Set up and manage tracking systems including:

1 Meta Pixel

2 Google Tag Manager (GTM)

3 GA4

4 Conversion events

5 Conversions API (preferred)



Implement structured attribution using UTMs and event tracking.



Conduct systematic A/B testing on:

1 Creatives

2 Audiences

3 Offers

4 Landing pages



Monitor and optimize performance metrics such as:

1 Cost per Lead (CPL)

2 Cost per Acquisition (CPA)

3 Return on Ad Spend (ROAS)

4 Conversion Rate (CVR)



Deliver weekly performance reports with:

1 Data insights

2 Optimization actions taken

3 Next-step strategy



Collaborate with designers, video editors, and account managers to align creative execution with campaign objectives.



Manage multiple client accounts simultaneously without performance decline.



Requirements:



Proven experience running conversion-focused paid campaigns for e-commerce and B2B lead generation.



Ability to demonstrate real performance results with clear metrics (CPL, CPA, ROAS, revenue impact).



Strong understanding of:

1 Audience targeting

2 Funnel structure

3 Retargeting strategy

4 Scaling methodology



Hands-on experience setting up tracking and analytics correctly (GTM, GA4, Pixel implementation).



Structured, data-driven optimization approach.



Ability to manage time, priorities, and performance across multiple active campaigns.



Clear communication and reporting skills.



What Success Looks Like:



Consistent generation of qualified leads at or below target CPL.



Profitable website purchases at sustainable CPA.



Transparent performance reporting with proactive optimization.



Stable performance while managing multiple client accounts.



Compensation:



Open to full-time monthly retainer. Please include your rate structure and availability.



To Apply:



Send 2‚Äì3 case studies showing:

1.1 Campaign structure

1.2 Budget level

1.3 Results achieved

1.4 Time frame



Briefly explain how you would structure a paid campaign to generate 50 qualified leads in 14 days.



Use the subject line: Performance Growth Operator



We are looking for someone who measures success in revenue and qualified leads ‚Äî not impressions.

title: Executive Assistant & Operations Coordinator (E-commerce Coffee Company) *Full Time, Remote|Long-Term Growth Opportunity
description:
Are you ready‚Ä¶

To start a role that motivates and excites you?

And a position where we invest in your learning, education, and growth?



Then keep reading, we want to work with you!





WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE THIS POSITION:

This is not your typical support role ‚Äî you‚Äôll work directly with our founders, influence company-wide systems, and gain exposure to every part of the business.



Incredible company culture:

‚Ä¢ Small, close team with collaborative, friendly and open culture.

‚Ä¢ We believe the biggest asset of a company is our people. We focus on helping each tea
mber reach their full potential by investing in their learning, growth, skills, and education. When we grow as individuals, we succeed as a team.

‚Ä¢ Not a fan of office politics or drama? We‚Äôre on the same page. Instead of wasting time with that, we focus on solving problems and reaching goals

‚Ä¢ 100% remote, enjoy the comfort and flexibility of working from home



Pay, benefits, progression, and long-term growth:

‚Ä¢ Competitive salary

‚Ä¢ Benefits including up to 16 days a year Paid Time off

‚Ä¢ Progression as we grow: greater responsibilities, leadership opportunities, and increased pay.

‚Ä¢ Feel empowered, make decisions, have an impact

‚Ä¢ Grow with the company and live up to your potential!

‚Ä¢ Join an exciting, fast-growing company!







ABOUT US:

We‚Äôre a young, ambitious, and small (but growing!) company that‚Äôs making a massive impact in ecommerce. 



Since 2015 we‚Äôve been obsessed with building award-winning products and awesome brands that people fall in love with. We have 2 primary brands in our portfolio: 

(1) an international award-winning coffee products brand 
 / 
).

(2) an educational coaching program that helps entrepreneurs grow their businesses to create a positive impact in the world!



Our two recent flagship products became the world‚Äôs most successful launches in their categories. We‚Äôve shipped more than 200,000 orders worldwide and we‚Äôre continuing to expand.



Our culture is transparent and candid. You‚Äôre always welcome (and encouraged!) to ask questions or express a difference of opinion. Learning and growth is a cornerstone of our culture, both personally and professionally. We work hard, and we have fun!







WHO WE‚ÄôRE LOOKING FOR:

We‚Äôre looking for a proactive and detail-oriented team player to fill this role‚Äîsomeone who thrives on solving problems, staying organized, and making things run smoothly across departments.



Do you love helping customers, supporting a team, and keeping operations organized? Do you get satisfaction from making systems work better and ‚Äúgetting things done‚Äù? If yes, we want you on our team!



You‚Äôre probably the type of person who:

‚Ä¢ Enjoys supporting others and finding solutions to problems

‚Ä¢ Has strong communication and organizational skills

‚Ä¢ Likes working behind the scenes to make sure everything runs like clockwork

‚Ä¢ Is excited to wear multiple hats and be part of a growing, fast-moving company

‚Ä¢ Has worked directly with founders or in a startup, and enjoys that fast-paced, flexible vibe

We‚Äôre not just looking for someone who can support our team, we‚Äôre looking for someone to be proactive with taking ownership of tasks, solve problems independently, and grow into larger responsibilities over time.







YOUR OPPORTUNITY AND ROLE ON THE TEAM:

Our culture is collaborative, friendly, and open. We hire people who are smart, ambitious, and have a strong desire to learn and grow.



Sound like you? This is an exciting long-term opportunity!



This is a fully remote position. You‚Äôll work directly with our founders and collaborate with our small but mighty team to support customer happiness, streamline operations, and take on projects that help the business grow. 



This is a foundational role ‚Äî one where you‚Äôll gain visibility into all parts of the company.



As you grow, your role will grow with you, based on your interests and strengths:

‚Ä¢ Want to work improving our systems and processes? Awesome!

‚Ä¢ Have ideas on how to improve our website? Fantastic!

‚Ä¢ Want to learn how to manage projects? Let‚Äôs go!



We‚Äôre not just hiring for a role ‚Äî we‚Äôre hiring for potential. 



Your responsibilities will span 4 key areas: customer experience (30-40%), operations/logistics (20-30%), executive support (10-20%), and special projects (10-20%) ‚Äî giving you exposure across the business. These percentages are estimates and you can expect your day-to-day to shift and evolve as the business grows and as you take ownership. 



1. Customer Experience

‚Ä¢ Provide
/chat-based support for our customers across our channels (Shopify, Amazon, and wholesale)

‚Ä¢ Answer order and product questions, resolve issues promptly, and ensure customers feel heard and supported

‚Ä¢ Support wholesale partners with order updates, invoicing, and coordination



2. Order Management & Platform Coordination

‚Ä¢ Manage, monitor, and troubleshoot orders across Shopify, Amazon, and wholesale channels

‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and resolve shipping or fulfillment issues with partners and customers

‚Ä¢ Maintain accurate product listings, inventory data, and logistics information across platforms



3. Executive & Admin Support

‚Ä¢ Manage founder and team inboxes, schedule meetings, and organize internal documentation

‚Ä¢ Assist with travel bookings, meeting preparation, and note-taking

‚Ä¢ Support small projects by tracking timelines, managing tasks, and ensuring follow-through



4. Special Projects & Company Operations

‚Ä¢ Conduct research projects to support decision-making (tools, systems, competitors)

‚Ä¢ Support lead generation efforts through identifying new wholesale prospects, brand partners, or influencers

‚Ä¢ Support planning and execution of events, expos, or marketing campaigns ‚Äî manage timelines, logistics, and tasks

‚Ä¢ Document and maintain SOPs for operational clarity and training

‚Ä¢ Test and troubleshoot web pages, workflows, or customer journeys to ensure quality and functionality

‚Ä¢ Take ownership of ad hoc ‚Äúfigure it out‚Äù tasks ‚Äî we‚Äôll guide you, but we value initiative and independent problem-solving mindset



You‚Äôll be trained on all platforms and tools, and we‚Äôll support your learning ‚Äî but we‚Äôre looking for someone who‚Äôs excited to take initiative and build systems along the way. This role evolves ‚Äî as you grow, so will your responsibilities.







ABOUT YOU / REQUIRED SKILLS OR EXPERIENCE:

We value curiosity, reliability, and the ability to take ownership. If you enjoy figuring things out, learning on the job, and taking initiative, you‚Äôll thrive here. This role is not a fit if you need constant direction or struggle to manage your own time.



Must have experience:

‚Ä¢ 2+ years of experience in a customer service or operations support role 
/chat-based)

‚Ä¢ 1+ years experience in eCommerce environments (Shopify, Amazon, etc.)

‚Ä¢ Fluent in written and spoken English



Key traits:

‚Ä¢ Strong detail orientation, organizational, and time-management skills ‚Äî you‚Äôre detail-obsessed and on top of things

‚Ä¢ Proactive problem-solver ‚Äî you take initiative, do the research, and follow through

‚Ä¢ Able to work independently, ask questions when needed, and communicate clearly

‚Ä¢ Comfortable with constructive feedback and direct, respectful communication



Optional but a big plus:

‚Ä¢ Experience coordinating projects, events, or marketing campaigns is a plus

‚Ä¢ Experience with executive assistant work 
/calendar/travel management)

‚Ä¢ Experience improving or documenting processes (SOPs)

‚Ä¢ Experience at a startup or small business where you wore multiple hats

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúExperience coordinating projects, events, or marketing campaigns is a plus‚Äù







PAY, WORKING HOURS, HOW TO APPLY

If this description seems like it‚Äôs too intimidating for you, this position is probably not for you. However, if you‚Äôre still here reading and this sounds exciting for you, we‚Äôd love to meet you!



The full time monthly salary will be $
based on your skills and level of relevant experience. Being a member of our team has other benefits including up to 16 days of paid time off per year.



We understand you may have a busy schedule, so we‚Äôve made our interview process extremely quick and efficient. 



To apply, please follow the steps below:

1. Get started with a quick Initial Screening here for us to get to know you: 

2. Complete the screening and we‚Äôll be in touch with next steps once we receive it.





The position is on a first come first review basis, so the sooner you complete the screening, the more likely you'll get hired.



Good luck, and we hope to have someone awesome like you to join us!

WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE THIS POSITION:

This is not your typical support role ‚Äî you‚Äôll work directly with our founders, influence company-wide systems, and gain exposure to every part of the business.



Incredible company culture:

‚Ä¢ Small, close team with collaborative, friendly and open culture.

‚Ä¢ We believe the biggest asset of a company is our people. We focus on helping each tea
mber reach their full potential by investing in their learning, growth, skills, and education. When we grow as individuals, we succeed as a team.

‚Ä¢ Not a fan of office politics or drama? We‚Äôre on the same page. Instead of wasting time with that, we focus on solving problems and reaching goals

‚Ä¢ 100% remote, enjoy the comfort and flexibility of working from home



Pay, benefits, progression, and long-term growth:

‚Ä¢ Competitive salary

‚Ä¢ Benefits including up to 16 days a year Paid Time off

‚Ä¢ Progression as we grow: greater responsibilities, leadership opportunities, and increased pay.

‚Ä¢ Feel empowered, make decisions, have an impact

‚Ä¢ Grow with the company and live up to your potential!

‚Ä¢ Join an exciting, fast-growing company!







ABOUT US:

We‚Äôre a young, ambitious, and small (but growing!) company that‚Äôs making a massive impact in ecommerce. 



Since 2015 we‚Äôve been obsessed with building award-winning products and awesome brands that people fall in love with. We have 2 primary brands in our portfolio: 

(1) an international award-winning coffee products brand 
 / 
).

(2) an educational coaching program that helps entrepreneurs grow their businesses to create a positive impact in the world!



Our two recent flagship products became the world‚Äôs most successful launches in their categories. We‚Äôve shipped more than 200,000 orders worldwide and we‚Äôre continuing to expand.



Our culture is transparent and candid. You‚Äôre always welcome (and encouraged!) to ask questions or express a difference of opinion. Learning and growth is a cornerstone of our culture, both personally and professionally. We work hard, and we have fun!







WHO WE‚ÄôRE LOOKING FOR:

We‚Äôre looking for a proactive and detail-oriented team player to fill this role‚Äîsomeone who thrives on solving problems, staying organized, and making things run smoothly across departments.



Do you love helping customers, supporting a team, and keeping operations organized? Do you get satisfaction from making systems work better and ‚Äúgetting things done‚Äù? If yes, we want you on our team!



You‚Äôre probably the type of person who:

‚Ä¢ Enjoys supporting others and finding solutions to problems

‚Ä¢ Has strong communication and organizational skills

‚Ä¢ Likes working behind the scenes to make sure everything runs like clockwork

‚Ä¢ Is excited to wear multiple hats and be part of a growing, fast-moving company

‚Ä¢ Has worked directly with founders or in a startup, and enjoys that fast-paced, flexible vibe

We‚Äôre not just looking for someone who can support our team, we‚Äôre looking for someone to be proactive with taking ownership of tasks, solve problems independently, and grow into larger responsibilities over time.







YOUR OPPORTUNITY AND ROLE ON THE TEAM:

Our culture is collaborative, friendly, and open. We hire people who are smart, ambitious, and have a strong desire to learn and grow.



Sound like you? This is an exciting long-term opportunity!



This is a fully remote position. You‚Äôll work directly with our founders and collaborate with our small but mighty team to support customer happiness, streamline operations, and take on projects that help the business grow. 



This is a foundational role ‚Äî one where you‚Äôll gain visibility into all parts of the company.



As you grow, your role will grow with you, based on your interests and strengths:

‚Ä¢ Want to work improving our systems and processes? Awesome!

‚Ä¢ Have ideas on how to improve our website? Fantastic!

‚Ä¢ Want to learn how to manage projects? Let‚Äôs go!



We‚Äôre not just hiring for a role ‚Äî we‚Äôre hiring for potential. 



Your responsibilities will span 4 key areas: customer experience (30-40%), operations/logistics (20-30%), executive support (10-20%), and special projects (10-20%) ‚Äî giving you exposure across the business. These percentages are estimates and you can expect your day-to-day to shift and evolve as the business grows and as you take ownership. 



1. Customer Experience

‚Ä¢ Provide
/chat-based support for our customers across our channels (Shopify, Amazon, and wholesale)

‚Ä¢ Answer order and product questions, resolve issues promptly, and ensure customers feel heard and supported

‚Ä¢ Support wholesale partners with order updates, invoicing, and coordination



2. Order Management & Platform Coordination

‚Ä¢ Manage, monitor, and troubleshoot orders across Shopify, Amazon, and wholesale channels

‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot and resolve shipping or fulfillment issues with partners and customers

‚Ä¢ Maintain accurate product listings, inventory data, and logistics information across platforms



3. Executive & Admin Support

‚Ä¢ Manage founder and team inboxes, schedule meetings, and organize internal documentation

‚Ä¢ Assist with travel bookings, meeting preparation, and note-taking

‚Ä¢ Support small projects by tracking timelines, managing tasks, and ensuring follow-through



4. Special Projects & Company Operations

‚Ä¢ Conduct research projects to support decision-making (tools, systems, competitors)

‚Ä¢ Support lead generation efforts through identifying new wholesale prospects, brand partners, or influencers

‚Ä¢ Support planning and execution of events, expos, or marketing campaigns ‚Äî manage timelines, logistics, and tasks

‚Ä¢ Document and maintain SOPs for operational clarity and training

‚Ä¢ Test and troubleshoot web pages, workflows, or customer journeys to ensure quality and functionality

‚Ä¢ Take ownership of ad hoc ‚Äúfigure it out‚Äù tasks ‚Äî we‚Äôll guide you, but we value initiative and independent problem-solving mindset



You‚Äôll be trained on all platforms and tools, and we‚Äôll support your learning ‚Äî but we‚Äôre looking for someone who‚Äôs excited to take initiative and build systems along the way. This role evolves ‚Äî as you grow, so will your responsibilities.







ABOUT YOU / REQUIRED SKILLS OR EXPERIENCE:

We value curiosity, reliability, and the ability to take ownership. If you enjoy figuring things out, learning on the job, and taking initiative, you‚Äôll thrive here. This role is not a fit if you need constant direction or struggle to manage your own time.



Must have experience:

‚Ä¢ 2+ years of experience in a customer service or operations support role 
/chat-based)

‚Ä¢ 1+ years experience in eCommerce environments (Shopify, Amazon, etc.)

‚Ä¢ Fluent in written and spoken English



Key traits:

‚Ä¢ Strong detail orientation, organizational, and time-management skills ‚Äî you‚Äôre detail-obsessed and on top of things

‚Ä¢ Proactive problem-solver ‚Äî you take initiative, do the research, and follow through

‚Ä¢ Able to work independently, ask questions when needed, and communicate clearly

‚Ä¢ Comfortable with constructive feedback and direct, respectful communication



Optional but a big plus:

‚Ä¢ Experience coordinating projects, events, or marketing campaigns is a plus

‚Ä¢ Experience with executive assistant work 
/calendar/travel management)

‚Ä¢ Experience improving or documenting processes (SOPs)

‚Ä¢ Experience at a startup or small business where you wore multiple hats

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúExperience coordinating projects, events, or marketing campaigns is a plus‚Äù







PAY, WORKING HOURS, HOW TO APPLY

If this description seems like it‚Äôs too intimidating for you, this position is probably not for you. However, if you‚Äôre still here reading and this sounds exciting for you, we‚Äôd love to meet you!



The full time monthly salary will be $
based on your skills and level of relevant experience. Being a member of our team has other benefits including up to 16 days of paid time off per year.



We understand you may have a busy schedule, so we‚Äôve made our interview process extremely quick and efficient. 



To apply, please follow the steps below:

1. Get started with a quick Initial Screening here for us to get to know you: 

2. Complete the screening and we‚Äôll be in touch with next steps once we receive it.





The position is on a first come first review basis, so the sooner you complete the screening, the more likely you'll get hired.



Good luck, and we hope to have someone awesome like you to join us!

title: Creative Video Production Editor
description:
We are seeking a reliable and creative Video Production Editor to support our growing content studio on a casual, project based basis. This is a behind the scenes role suited to an overseas editor who can deliver high quality social first video content efficiently, while balancing creativity with structured systems.



You will be responsible for executing the post production process from raw footage to first draft delivery. This includes uploading and organizing content by camera, scene, and shoot date, maintaining clean folder structures, and ensuring every project is structured clearly for fast collaboration. Strong attention to detail and file management is essential.



Once footage is organized, you will assemble timelines based on provided scripts, briefs, or reference edits. You must be confident following direction and brand guidelines, while also contributing creative flair in pacing, transitions, visual rhythm, and storytelling. We want someone who can think creatively, not just mechanically cut clips together.



Music selection is part of your responsibility. You should be able to source appropriate tracks that align with brand tone and emotional intent. All edits must have clean audio balance, smooth cuts, and strong flow suitable for modern social media platforms.



We supply LUTs and brand guidelines. Your responsibility is to color correct footage to a high standard before applying our LUTs, adjusting exposure, white balance, skin tones, and contrast to ensure clean, consistent visuals. You do not need advanced cinematic grading skills, but you must understand how to make footage look polished and professional.



Completed drafts must be uploaded to Frame for client review. You will implement client feedback accurately and efficiently. Turnaround expectations are 24 to 72 hours for first draft delivery depending on project scope, and 24 hour turnaround for revisions once feedback is received.



This role is fully behind the scenes. You will not communicate directly with clients but must communicate clearly and proactively with our internal team regarding timelines, questions, and updates.



The ideal candidate is dependable, responsive, detail oriented, and committed to meeting deadlines. You must be proficient in CapCut and Adobe Premiere Pro. Experience editing short form, social first content such as Reels and vertical video is highly preferred.



This is a casual role with work assigned as projects come in, with the opportunity for increased responsibility and hours as the company scales.



Please check out the level of our work on our 
 to see if you think you can nail our style.

Or this link:

title: Senior Financial Controller / Accountant
description:
Senior Financial Controller / Senior Accountant (Part-Time, Remote ‚Äì Philippines)



Company: European Specialty Coffee & Distribution Group

Structure: Czech Operating Company + US Holding Company

Location: Remote (Philippines ‚Äì CET overlap required)

Employment Type: Part-Time (20‚Äì30 hours per week)

Reports To: Managing Director (Europe)

 

About Us



We are a growing European specialty coffee roasting, distribution, and service company headquartered in the Czech Republic, with a US holding company structure. Our group operates across multiple business lines including wholesale coffee, tea distribution, service operations, and retail caf√©s.



We are currently implementing Odoo ERP to streamline operations, financial reporting, and international consolidation.



We are seeking a highly capable Senior Financial Controller / Senior Accountant to support financial oversight, reporting, and consolidation while supervising our Philippines-based Back Office & Data Entry team.

 

Position Overview



This is a senior-level remote accounting and financial control role supporting a European company with US consolidation requirements.



You will:

‚Ä¢ Oversee day-to-day accounting accuracy

‚Ä¢ Supervise and manage a Philippines-based Back Office / Data Entry Specialist

‚Ä¢ Ensure accurate data entry and transaction integrity within Odoo ERP

‚Ä¢ Coordinate with our external Czech accounting firm (compliance-only)

‚Ä¢ Support EU VAT, OSS, and Intrastat reporting oversight

‚Ä¢ Assist with GAAP adjustments and consolidation for US holding company reporting

‚Ä¢ Prepare documentation for statutory filings

‚Ä¢ Support US year-end closing and, if qualified, assist with US filings



This is not a pure bookkeeping position. It requires ownership, financial analysis capability, and multi-entity experience.

 

Key Responsibilities



1. Financial Oversight & Reporting

‚Ä¢ Oversee monthly closing process (target: within 10 business days)

‚Ä¢ Review general ledger accuracy

‚Ä¢ Perform monthly reconciliations (AR, AP, inventory, intercompany)

‚Ä¢ Prepare consolidated financial statements (CZ + US structure)

‚Ä¢ Deliver monthly management reporting:

o P&L by business line

o Gross margin analysis

o Cash flow forecast (13-week rolling)

o Budget vs actual

o Inventory valuation review

‚Ä¢ Monitor financial KPIs

 

2. Supervision of PH Back Office Team

‚Ä¢ Direct supervision of Back Office & Data Entry Specialist

‚Ä¢ Review invoice processing accuracy

‚Ä¢ Monitor payment matching and AR aging

‚Ä¢ Ensure pricing and VAT codes are correctly applied in Odoo

‚Ä¢ Create and maintain SOPs for transaction processing

‚Ä¢ Implement internal controls within Odoo



You will be responsible for ensuring all operational accounting data is properly entered before submission to the Czech external accountant.

 

3. ERP Oversight (Odoo Preferred)

‚Ä¢ Oversee accounting and finance configuration within Odoo

‚Ä¢ Ensure proper chart of accounts structure

‚Ä¢ Maintain VAT logic and tax mapping

‚Ä¢ Coordinate ERP data exports for Czech accountant

‚Ä¢ Improve financial workflows

‚Ä¢ Support automation and efficiency improvements



Experience in Odoo or Zoho Books/Zoho ERP is strongly preferred.

 

4. European Compliance Coordination

‚Ä¢ Prepare VAT documentation for Czech external accounting firm

‚Ä¢ Assist with OSS reporting structure

‚Ä¢ Oversee Intrastat documentation

‚Ä¢ Review compliance documents prior to submission

‚Ä¢ Maintain clean audit trail



External Czech firm will handle official filings ‚Äî you ensure readiness and correctness.

 

5. US Holding Company Consolidation & GAAP

‚Ä¢ Assist in consolidation of Czech accounts into US holding company

‚Ä¢ Perform GAAP adjustments where required

‚Ä¢ Prepare reporting for US entity

‚Ä¢ If qualified, assist in US year-end closing and corporate filings

‚Ä¢ Manage intercompany accounting and transfer documentation



Experience with US GAAP and multi-entity consolidation is highly valued.

 

Scope of Work

‚Ä¢ Multi-entity structure (EU + US)

‚Ä¢ Wholesale & distribution business

‚Ä¢ Inventory-intensive operations

‚Ä¢ VAT, OSS, and international transactions

‚Ä¢ Intercompany accounting

‚Ä¢ Multi-currency operations

 

Required Qualifications

‚Ä¢ CPA or equivalent certification preferred

‚Ä¢ 5+ years senior accounting experience

‚Ä¢ Experience with EU VAT systems

‚Ä¢ Experience with multi-entity accounting

‚Ä¢ Experience with US GAAP or consolidation reporting

‚Ä¢ Strong Excel proficiency

‚Ä¢ Experience in Odoo or Zoho ERP preferred

‚Ä¢ Experience supervising accounting staff

‚Ä¢ Excellent written and verbal English

 

Ideal Candidate Profile

‚Ä¢ Structured and process-driven

‚Ä¢ Strong analytical mindset

‚Ä¢ Comfortable working independently

‚Ä¢ Experience in international SME environment

‚Ä¢ Detail-oriented but able to see strategic picture

‚Ä¢ Capable of building financial dashboards

‚Ä¢ Proactive in identifying inefficiencies

 

KPIs

‚Ä¢ Monthly close ? 10 days

‚Ä¢ Inventory variance < 1%

‚Ä¢ Clean reconciliation reports

‚Ä¢ Accurate VAT mapping

‚Ä¢ Timely consolidated reporting

‚Ä¢ AR aging within target range

 

What We Offer

‚Ä¢ Long-term strategic role

‚Ä¢ Direct exposure to international business structure

‚Ä¢ Opportunity to shape financial systems

‚Ä¢ Flexible remote work

‚Ä¢ Competitive compensation (based on experience)

‚Ä¢ Potential growth into CFO-level role

 

Working Hours



Must overlap with Central European Time (CET) for at least 3‚Äì4 hours daily.

 

To Apply



Please submit:

‚Ä¢ Updated CV to 

‚Ä¢ Summary of relevant multi-entity experience

‚Ä¢ ERP systems experience (Odoo/Zoho preferred)

‚Ä¢ Confirmation of availability (hours per week)

‚Ä¢ Expected monthly compensation

title: Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist (Search & Social)
description:
Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist (Search & Social)



Remote ‚Äî Philippines | Full-Time



About SocialScience



SocialScience is a growth marketing agency that manages paid search and paid social campaigns for high-growth brands across B2B and DTC. We specialize in performance-driven creative testing and media strategy designed to reduce customer acquisition costs and scale revenue.

We are hiring a Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist to become the central data engine behind all client performance reporting across platforms.

This is not a virtual assistant role. This is a performance marketing analytics role for someone who understands how ad platforms work and how to read, organize, and interpret paid media data.



Role Overview

You will be responsible for pulling, organizing, and analyzing performance data across multiple advertising platforms three times per week (Monday, Wednesday, Friday). You will maintain standardized reporting across clients, identify performance trends, and support our media buying team with clean, reliable data that helps drive decisions.

Over time, you will also help build cross-client insights, creative performance tracking, audit preparation, and budget pacing systems.

You will become the data nerve center for all SocialScience clients.



Key Responsibilities

Core Reporting (Primary Responsibility)

Pull performance reports from:

Google Ads

Meta Ads Manager

LinkedIn Campaign Manager

TikTok Ads Manager

Google Analytics (GA4)

Update master reporting sheets for all clients (3x per week)

Maintain consistent, accurate data across all client reporting templates

Build and maintain pivot tables to analyze:

CPA trends

CTR, CPC, CVR performance

Creative performance

Audience performance

Budget pacing by platform

Identify unusual performance changes and flag them to media buyers

Media Buyer Support

Prepare data sheets before optimization sessions

Maintain historical data for trend analysis

Support quarterly planning with performance summaries

Assist in forecasting and budget pacing sheets

Audit & Case Study Preparation

Pull last 60‚Äì90 days of structured data for new client audits

Maintain ‚Äúbefore and after‚Äù performance data for case studies

Organize campaign structure and performance summaries for strategy reviews

Creative & Audience Insights (Advanced Responsibility)

Track which creatives and audiences perform best across clients

Maintain a creative performance library

Identify patterns across accounts that inform strategy



Required Experience & Skills

3+ years experience working with paid media platforms in an agency or in-house role

Strong working knowledge of:

Google Ads

Meta Ads Manager

LinkedIn Campaign Manager

Google Analytics (GA4)

Advanced proficiency in Excel and Google Sheets

Pivot tables (required)

Excel Formulas and data organization

Deep understanding of:

CPA, CPC, CTR, CVR, ROAS

Campaign ? Ad Set ? Ad structure

How performance data should be interpreted

Experience pulling reports directly from ad platforms

Extremely detail-oriented and process-driven



Nice to Have (Bonus Skills)

Looker Studio / Google Data Studio

Supermetrics or other data connectors

Understanding of UTMs and tracking structure

Experience creating standardized reporting templates



What Success Looks Like in This Role

Within 60 days, you will:

Own reporting for all SocialScience clients

Have standardized reporting templates across accounts

Provide media buyers with clean data before they begin optimizations

Identify performance issues before the team does

Maintain historical data that makes audits and case studies easy



You Are a Great Fit If You

Love working with data and spreadsheets

Notice patterns in numbers quickly

Prefer organized systems over messy information

Can follow processes exactly and consistently

Have worked inside ad platforms and understand how campaigns function

Take pride in accuracy and reliability



Working Schedule

Must be available during overlapping hours with U.S. Eastern Time

Reporting cadence: Monday, Wednesday, Friday



How to apply:

1. Send your Portfolio and Resume to: 

2. Tell us a story of a significant event in your life that has shaped you





See you!
