title: Roadside Assistance Inbound Sales & Dispatch Specialist
description:
(Growth Pathway to Sales Manager / Team Leader)



Company: Staff Connect (on behalf of our client)

Location: Remote ‚Äì Philippines-based

Schedule: Rotating shifts between 5:00 PM ‚Äì 9:00 AM AEDT

Employment Type: Full-time

Compensation: Competitive salary (based on experience and qualifications)

Leave: One week paid leave per year



About the Client



Our client is Australia‚Äôs largest misfuelling specialist, providing nationwide roadside assistance to motorists who a
 put the wrong fuel in their vehicle. When drivers are stressed and stranded, their team steps in to turn the situation around ‚Äî quickly, professionally, and with empathy.



Staff Connect is supporting the client in building their first offshore team in the Philippines, offering a genuine opportunity for high performers to grow into leadership roles and eventually manage an entire offshore operation.



The Role

Inbound Sales & Dispatcher



Growth Pathway: Sales Manager / Team Leader



You will start in a frontline Inbound Sales & Dispatch role, handling incoming calls, assisting distressed customers, and coordinating technicians across Australia.



As you demonstrate strong sales ability, attention to detail, and initiative, you‚Äôll progressively take on operations, quality control, and leadership responsibilities, with a clear pathway to advance into a Sales Manager / Team Leader position.



Key Responsibilities

Core Dispatch & Inbound Sales

- Act as the first point of contact for motorists who have misfuelled their vehicle.

- Use empathy and strong communication skills to convert inbound calls into confirmed bookings.

- Coordinate technicians nationwide using booking platforms and real-time tools.

- Collect deposits, log jobs accurately, and manage cases from start to completion.

- Communicate with customers and technicians via phone, Gmail, Slack, and SMS



Daily Operations & Quality Control

- Support fleet job closures, including managing long wait times when calling for PO numbers.

- Track spill kit usage by collecting all related
s and invoices in Xero (create only, do not send).

- Maintain accuracy in Xero and GeoOp, including:

- Reviewing previous day‚Äôs jobs for incomplete entries.

- Identifying jobs not properly closed or not sent to Xero.

- Perform call log clean-ups, ensuring:

- Objection reasons are correctly logged.

- ETAs, phone times, and job numbers are accurate.

- Sales opportunities are identified and closed.

- Discounts are properly logged and ticked.

- Act as a second set of eyes on GeoOp and call logs to catch errors, fill gaps, and prevent missed opportunities.



Documentation & Process Support

- Update fleet documents using new templates for consistency and clarity.

- Assist with process mapping, staff training, and continuous improvement initiatives.



Tech & Customer Support

- Coordinate servo runs and tech card runs to keep dispatch lines clear.

- Take ownership of escalated customer issues requiring extended phone support.

- Be comfortable being on camera during Slack huddles as part of daily operations.

- Participate in Slack huddles during shifts, including training, check-ins, and live support.



The Successful Candidate

- Minimum 2 years‚Äô experience in a call centre, sales, or dispatch role.

- Proven success in sales conversion and customer service.

- Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.

- Calm under pressure, with strong empathy for customers in stressful situations.

- Tech-savvy, with proficiency in Google Chrome, Gmail, and Google Workspace.

- Comfortable using Slack, including joining huddles and appearing on camera when required.

- Experience working from home with reliable internet and a quiet workspace.

- Bonus: Experience in automotive, roadside assistance, or mobile repair.

- Bonus: Knowledge of Australian geography.



What‚Äôs in It for You

- Fully remote, work-from-home role.

- Work with a growing international client.

- Comprehensive training and ongoing support.

- Clear career progression: Dispatcher ? Sales Manager / Team Leader.

- Supportive, professional team culture.

- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.

title: Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist (Search & Social)
description:
Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist (Search & Social)

Remote ‚Äî Philippines | Full-Time

About SocialScience

SocialScience is a growth marketing agency that manages paid search and paid social campaigns for high-growth brands across B2B and DTC. We specialize in performance-driven creative testing and media strategy designed to reduce customer acquisition costs and scale revenue.

We are hiring a Paid Media Reporting & Analytics Specialist to become the central data engine behind all client performance reporting across platforms.

This is not a virtual assistant role. This is a performance marketing analytics role for someone who understands how ad platforms work and how to read, organize, and interpret paid media data.



Role Overview

You will be responsible for pulling, organizing, and analyzing performance data across multiple advertising platforms three times per week (Monday, Wednesday, Friday). You will maintain standardized reporting across clients, identify performance trends, and support our media buying team with clean, reliable data that helps drive decisions.

Over time, you will also help build cross-client insights, creative performance tracking, audit preparation, and budget pacing systems.

You will become the data nerve center for all SocialScience clients.



Key Responsibilities

Core Reporting (Primary Responsibility)

Pull performance reports from:

Google Ads

Meta Ads Manager

LinkedIn Campaign Manager

TikTok Ads Manager

Google Analytics (GA4)

Update master reporting sheets for all clients (3x per week)

Maintain consistent, accurate data across all client reporting templates

Build and maintain pivot tables to analyze:

CPA trends

CTR, CPC, CVR performance

Creative performance

Audience performance

Budget pacing by platform

Identify unusual performance changes and flag them to media buyers

Media Buyer Support

Prepare data sheets before optimization sessions

Maintain historical data for trend analysis

Support quarterly planning with performance summaries

Assist in forecasting and budget pacing sheets

Audit & Case Study Preparation

Pull last 60‚Äì90 days of structured data for new client audits

Maintain ‚Äúbefore and after‚Äù performance data for case studies

Organize campaign structure and performance summaries for strategy reviews

Creative & Audience Insights (Advanced Responsibility)

Track which creatives and audiences perform best across clients

Maintain a creative performance library

Identify patterns across accounts that inform strategy



Required Experience & Skills

3+ years experience working with paid media platforms in an agency or in-house role

Strong working knowledge of:

Google Ads

Meta Ads Manager

LinkedIn Campaign Manager

Google Analytics (GA4)

Advanced proficiency in Excel and Google Sheets

Pivot tables (required)

Excel Formulas and data organization

Deep understanding of:

CPA, CPC, CTR, CVR, ROAS

Campaign ? Ad Set ? Ad structure

How performance data should be interpreted

Experience pulling reports directly from ad platforms

Extremely detail-oriented and process-driven



Nice to Have (Bonus Skills)

Looker Studio / Google Data Studio

Supermetrics or other data connectors

Understanding of UTMs and tracking structure

Experience creating standardized reporting templates



What Success Looks Like in This Role

Within 60 days, you will:

Own reporting for all SocialScience clients

Have standardized reporting templates across accounts

Provide media buyers with clean data before they begin optimizations

Identify performance issues before the team does

Maintain historical data that makes audits and case studies easy



You Are a Great Fit If You

Love working with data and spreadsheets

Notice patterns in numbers quickly

Prefer organized systems over messy information

Can follow processes exactly and consistently

Have worked inside ad platforms and understand how campaigns function

Take pride in accuracy and reliability



Working Schedule

Must be available during overlapping hours with U.S. Eastern Time

Reporting cadence: Monday, Wednesday, Friday



How to apply:

1. Send your Portfolio and Resume to: 

2. Tell us a story of a significant event in your life that has shaped you





See you!

title: Canva Template & Production Assistant
description:
We're looking for a full-time Canva Assistant to join the team.



Your work will be receiving images and text from another tea
mber, then aligning and placing them correctly into our existing 
 templates for our
 pages and blog sites. You'll also handle other simple admin tasks like airtable, generating captions via AI (copy-paste process following exact instructions). No creative design work, this is about accurately replicating templates.



This is high-volume repetitive work.



Requirements:

- Familiar with Canva

- Basic understanding of what looks visually appealing on

- Able to strictly follow templates and instructions

- Available 40+ hours per week



Important: This role requires working independently without constant guidance/hand-holding. If you need frequent confirmation, meetings, or step-by-step hand-holding, this role is not a fit.



Salary:

500 USD/month full time

(All tools/subscriptions are paid by us)



Hubstaff time tracker + NDA required.

Only apply if you want to work long-term on this over several months.



To apply, include:

- How familiar are you with Canva? (0-10)

- How many hours per week are you available?

- English (0-10)

- A short description of what your most recent job was (summarize it in 1-4 sentences what you worked on)



To confirm you read this entire listing, put in your proposal subject the word "FOCUS"

title: B2B Sales Agent
description:
How to Apply

* Send your most updated resume to

About Us



We are Gushwork.ai ‚Äî one of the fastest-growing AI marketing startups backed by global investors like Lightspeed, B Capital, and SIG. We help B2B manufacturing companies in the U.S. grow their online presence through AI-powered websites and SEO.

outbound calls daily to U.S.-based B2B leads

* Send your most updated resume to

title: Marketing & Admin Assistant
description:
Administrative & Marketing Assistant



Starting Rate: $6.5/hour

Hours: 10‚Äì20 hrs/week

Working time: Flexible, but you must be available for 1‚Äì2 weekly meetings in the morning US CST

Start Date: 1st week of March



Summary ‚Äì We are seeking a reliable, detail-oriented Administrative & Marketing Assistant VA to support CRM and
 campaign execution, lead handling, onboarding setup, and light website updates. This role blends admin + marketing operations‚Äîideal for someone who can follow templates, execute consistently, and improve systems over time.



Our goal is to build a workflow that is as automated and optimized as possible (CRM + onboarding + AI training + client changes), so we‚Äôre looking for someone who enjoys structured work and can keep projects moving.



Please read all REQUIRED conditions below before applying 



REQUIRED: Fluent English (written + spoken) and professional communication

REQUIRED: Highly organized + detail-oriented (strong follow-through and accurate data handling)

REQUIRED: Comfortable working 10‚Äì20 hours/week and managing multiple tasks/priorities

REQUIRED: Comfortable using a time-tracking system

REQUIRED: Able to attend 1‚Äì2 weekly meetings in the morning CST

REQUIRED: Tech-comfortable and able to learn new tools quickly (CRM,
 tools, ClickUp, Wix)



When you message us to apply, you MUST include the sentence below in the subject line or first sentence of your message. Applications that do not include this will be automatically discarded:



‚ÄúI can work 10‚Äì20 hours per week, I‚Äôm comfortable with time tracking, and I can attend 1‚Äì2 weekly meetings in the morning CST. My experience includes (list tools), and I have experience with CRM updates,
 campaigns, and admin/project coordination.‚Äù



Responsibilities:



‚Ä¢ Cold Outreach & CRM Management

? Source and export leads from Sales Genie

? Upload leads into cold outreach platform and launch
 campaigns

? Import contacts and manage records inside GoHighLevel 

? Move engaged leads from cold outreach workflows into the GoHighLevel CRM pipeline as needed

? Review campaign performance (opens, replies, bookings) and update CRM records accordingly



‚Ä¢
 Marketing (Warm & Existing Clients)

? Set up promotional and nurture
 campaigns in GHL or related tools using provided templates

? Write or refine copy when needed based on direction (AI tools allowed, but must manually edit for clarity, tone, and brand voice)



‚Ä¢ Project Management (ClickUp)

?  Track tasks, update statuses, and keep projects organized

?  Preferred: Ability to help build workflows and systems in ClickUp (templates, recurring tasks, pipelines)



‚Ä¢  Client / Company Onboarding Set Up

?  Perform onboarding software setup and configuration (Google Business 360 / 
 platform, etc.)

?  Upload templates and instructions to train AI system based on provided processes

?  Support basic automation setup where applicable

?  Goal: move onboarding toward near-full automation and maximize optimization outcomes



‚Ä¢  Wix Website Support (Light Edits & Go-Live Checklist)

?  Follow go-live checklist to ensure SEO and social requirements are met

?  Handle client change requests in Wix (basic edits like copy updates or image swaps; no heavy design work - training provided)



Preferred Experience & Skills:

‚Ä¢ Experience with CRM systems, especially GoHighLevel or similar platforms

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cold
 outreach tools, lead sourcing platforms (e.g., Sales Genie / Data Axle), and campaign performance tracking

‚Ä¢ Strong
 marketing skills, including writing, editing, and optimizing campaigns for warm and existing audiences

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in ClickUp or similar project management tools; ability to build workflows, templates, and recurring task systems preferred

‚Ä¢ Experience with client onboarding tools and automation, including Google Business-related platforms and basic system integrations

‚Ä¢ Basic Wix website editing experience

‚Ä¢ Strong attention to detail and ability to follow structured processes while improving system and workflows

‚Ä¢ Comfortable using AI tools responsibly while ensuring outputs are accurate, natural-sounding, and on-brand

‚Ä¢ Organized, proactive, and able to manage multiple projects independently in a remote environment



Stretch Goals/responsibilities

‚Ä¢  Improve lead import + campaign tracking process (reduce manual steps, better tagging, cleaner handoff to CRM)

‚Ä¢  Help document SOPs and checklists so onboarding + client updates become faster and more consistent

Administrative Assistant, Marketing Assistant, CRM, GoHighLevel, GHL, Sales Genie, Cold
,
 Marketing, Contact Imports, Lead Management, ClickUp, Project Management, Client Onboarding, Automation Setup, Wix, SEO Checklist, Operations Support

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
Quick question!

Are you tired of working as an average Social Media Manager, never growing professionally, and never getting the chance to take your career to the next level?

Do you want to experience working with clients on a larger platform? Do you want to learn the skills required to help US-based business owners, influencers, and public figures take their social media presence and personal brands to the level of virality?



WE ARE HIRING!

We are looking for individuals who are eager to learn and want to take their digital marketing careers to new heights.

Enjoy benefits such as:

Unlimited access to almost $10,000 worth of training and courses for both personal skills and development.

The chance to work with clients that will elevate your resume, giving you the opportunity to break into the international market.

Working alongside a team that prioritizes a healthy work environment.

An environment that cultivates personal growth, serving as the foundation for skill development.





Just Simply Marketing (JSM) is a digital marketing agency based in Ontario, Canada, dedicated to helping business coaches, speakers, and experts from the US and Canada build, grow, and monetize their online brands. Specializing in organic marketing strategies, we focus on content creation, social media management, lead generation, and video production to help our clients stand out online. At JSM, we value creativity, excellence, and personal growth in everything we do.

You will work closely with our creatives, video editing, and graphic design teams to review and approve videos and designs, ensuring they align with our clients' brand and strategy. As our Social Media Specialist, you will be the driving force behind our clients' brand growth and increased online presence.

This is a fully remote position with working hours from 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM EST, Monday to Friday. The Social Media Specialist will report directly to the Social Media Team Managers.



How to Apply:

Interested candidates, please apply through our application form: wkf.ms/45DaMRT



RESPONSIBILITIES:

-Content Research: Use our FREE AI & Software tools to develop effective social media strategies.

-Content Creation: You will be responsible for creating content ideas to grow your client‚Äôs social media presence, build their personal brand, and ultimately help them generate income through their social media platforms. Don‚Äôt worry, you don‚Äôt have to edit anything! You‚Äôll be working alongside a video editing and graphic design team to create content!

-Copywriting & Scriptwriting: You will work hand-in-hand with a team and your client to build effective storytelling copy for social media. We will train you to use AI tools and storytelling strategies to captivate an audience.

-Content Posting: You will handle the scheduling and posting of content across various social media platforms in line with the content calendar and strategy you've created.

-Content Analysis and Reporting: You will generate reports on account performance and audience engagement. These insights will be used to optimize strategies and create better content for our clients.



ALL TRAINING PROVIDED ‚Äì WORTH $10,000 ‚Äì IS FREE



REQUIREMENTS:

-A minimum of 1 year of experience as a social media manager.

-Proficient in using Instagram,
, TikTok, and YouTube.

-Proven track record in achieving results for your past/current clients' online brands.

-Experience in copywriting and understanding of SEO & keywords.

-Looking to work for the long term and grow within the company.

-Experience with 
, Metricool, Slack, Google Drive, and Google Docs is highly preferred but not required.

-Strong communication skills ‚Äì Confidence is a PLUS as you will be consistently interacting with US/Canada-based clients.



P.S. Don‚Äôt worry if you do not meet all the requirements, we have the training to help you!



How to Apply:

If this sounds like the perfect fit for you, please fill out our application form:

title: Social Media Growth Strategist for Real Estate Education Brand (AI + Reels Focus)
description:
Overview



We are building a thought-leadership brand focused on educating high-income professionals (primarily physicians) about wealth building and real estate investing.



We are not looking for a post scheduler or graphic designer.



We are looking for a strategic social media operator who can help design and execute a repeatable content engine that grows trust, authority, and followers through educational short-form video.



The role includes strategy, scripting, production workflow design, and AI-assisted content scaling.



Objectives



Your goal is to help turn expertise into audience growth and engaged followers.



Success looks like:

‚Ä¢ Consistent follower growth

‚Ä¢ High saves and shares

‚Ä¢ Repeat viewers and inbound conversations

‚Ä¢ Audience trust, not viral entertainment



Responsibilities

Strategy



Develop a clear social media growth strategy targeting high income professionals and physicians

Create a repeatable weekly content framework (themes, cadence, formats)

Identify positioning angles and educational narratives



Content & Scripting



Write short-form video scripts (Instagram Reels, LinkedIn, YouTube Shorts)

Coach on-camera delivery and structure talking points

title: Google Ads Specialist with NZ/AU Experience (Remote Work)
description:
Company: RD Digital (New Zealand)

Location: Remote (Work From Home)

Engagement Type: Contractor (with potential to transition to Full-Time)





About RD Digital



RD Digital is a New Zealand‚Äìbased digital marketing agency specialising in performance-driven paid media, SEO, analytics, and conversion tracking. We partner with businesses across New Zealand, delivering measurable growth through data-led digital strategies.





As a remote-first agency, we focus on outcomes, accountability, and continuous optimisation rather than rigid office structures. This role is designed for someone who is comfortable operating independently while collaborating closely with leadership.





Role Overview



We are seeking a Google Ads Specialist to manage the day-to-day optimisation and health of multiple Google Ads accounts. This role is operational and analytical in nature, with a strong emphasis on proactive optimisation, performance monitoring, tracking validation, and clear reporting.



You will report directly to the Director and play a critical role in ensuring campaign efficiency, tracking accuracy, and actionable insights across accounts.





This position will start as a contractor (WFH). Subject to performance, reliability, and business alignment, there is a clear pathway to transition into a full-time salaried role.





Required Skills & Experience



-2+ years of proven hands-on experience managing Google Ads accounts (Search & Performance Max essential); Google Ads certification is a bonus.

-Strong understanding of GA4, Google Tag Manager, and conversion tracking

-Ability to diagnose and fix tracking issues independently

-Strong analytical mindset with attention to detail

-Comfortable working autonomously in a remote environment

-Clear written communication and reporting skills

-Experience working with international accounts is an advantage





Engagement & Growth Pathway

-Initial engagement: Contractor (remote, WFH)

-Reporting line: Directly to the Director

-Growth opportunity: Transition to full-time salaried role based on performance and consistency

-Location note: RD Digital is a New Zealand‚Äìbased agency with no physical office in the Philippines; this is a fully remote role



Key Responsibilities



Google Ads Management & Optimisation

-Perform daily and weekly health checks across Search, Performance Max, Display, and Brand campaigns

-Optimise bids, budgets, keywords, search terms, audiences, and assets

-Identify inefficiencies, wastage, and scaling opportunities

-Implement ongoing testing frameworks (ad copy, assets, structures)





Tracking & Implementation

-Review and validate conversion tracking across GA4, Google Tag Manager, and Google Ads

-Identify tracking gaps, discrepancies, or misfires

-Implement fixes directly where possible or coordinate with developers when required

-Ensure conversion actions align with business objectives





Reporting & Insights

-Prepare clear, structured performance reports (weekly and monthly)

-Translate data into actionable insights and optimisation recommendations

-Highlight risks, opportunities, and performance trends to the Director

-Support Looker Studio or spreadsheet-based reporting where required





Stakeholder Collaboration



-Work closely with the Director on strategy execution and optimisation priorities

-Provide feedback on account performance and next steps

-Maintain high standards of documentation and account hygiene





Why Join RD Digital?



-Direct exposure to leadership and decision-making

-Clear performance expectations and growth pathway

-Focus on quality, outcomes, and real optimisation (not vanity metrics)

-Long-term collaboration mindset rather than short-term task outsourcing



If you have read the whole job description, please tell us your favourite food in the job application.





Please include your updated resume/portfolio.

title: ACCOUNTS LEAD (DAY SHIFT)
description:
About the Company:

We are a fast-growing property investment and property management business. We are building a finance function that drives decisions, not just reconciliations.

This is not a bookkeeping role. You will own end-to-end daily finance operations and our property management business, including sole trust account ownership. - We‚Äôre looking for a tea
mber who is committed to growing with us long term

nt we need an experienced Accounts Lead for this role.

title: Social Media Manager & Video Editor
description:
JVT Media is a digital marketing company rooted in deeply meaningful work. We amplify the incredible impact being made by people and businesses in our community, through social media. By helping them show up with clarity, become relevant, and communicate their message effectively, we change lives and drive real impact in our community.



Our team is driven by purpose, knowing their work directly contributes to the growth, visibility, and success of local and regional businesses. We are agile and fast-moving. This is an environment of continuous learning, where social platforms and algorithms are constantly evolving, bringing excitement, challenge, and pride to the work we do.



In 2025, we generated 33+ million views and 150,000+ shares and saves for our clients. These are real people taking real actions, with real business impact. We take content performance seriously, and through this role you can gain a portfolio of impressive results and measurable metrics you‚Äôll be proud to showcase.



About the Role



This is a social media creator and coordinator role. If you are able to do short form video editing as well, that would be considered a good bonus. You‚Äôll plan, create, publish, and optimize content across social platforms. The focus is on content that drives credibility, connection, and measurable results.



Main Responsibilities



Social Media Management



- Plan, schedule, and publish content across platforms, primarily Instagram at this time (as platforms evolve, we do too)

- Primary platforms: Instagram and

- Secondary platforms: TikTok and YouTube

- Write clear, on-brand captions

- Optimize posts using music, covers, tags, and formatting

- Manage comments, messages, and share IG stories

- Create content calendars and posting schedules

- Manage influencer campaigns as needed

- Track performance and identify what‚Äôs working and why

- Support testing of new formats, hooks, and content ideas

- Draft content and reports for client approval



Video Editing



- Edit short-form videos for Reels, TikTok, and Shorts

- Understand and implement the elements that make videos perform well on the client‚Äôs platform of choice

- Strong hooks, good pacing, clear storytelling, and visuals that keep viewers watching



What We‚Äôre Looking For



- Social media management experience

- Strong understanding of Instagram and short-form content

- Strong English for caption writing and understanding the nuances needed for content to perform on social media in Canada

- Organized, reliable, and able to work independently

- Positive attitude and pride in your work

- Willingness to learn and adapt as platforms evolve

- Comfortable with video editing preferred



Tools You May Use



- Instagram,
, TikTok, Meta Business Suite

- CapCut

- Google Drive

- Notion

- Slack



How to Apply



Please include:

- A summary of relevant work experience

- A portfolio of your work, 2 to 5 examples of social media posts or short-form videos you‚Äôve worked on

- Tell me your favourite snack at the end of your application.



Bonus to include in the portfolio if you have it:

- Any performance metrics tied to content you‚Äôve produced

- Additional content format examples such as carousels and static posts

- Links to successful content pieces if available

title: Social Media Manager and Podcast Editor
description:
We are looking for a talented and energetic person to join our team as a Social Media Manager and Podcast editor. 



We have two family-run businesses:  One is an ecommerce fishing apparel company, and the other is a residential real estate business. We are based in the USA.



This position will focus primarily on the real estate business, but may also work with our fishing apparel business as well. Having experience with real estate content is not a requirement, but may be a benefit. 



A big part of the responsibilities for the real estate business will be assisting with a podcast that we are planning to launch in the next few weeks. The podcast will focus on all topics relevant to the small city that we live in.  While having experience with podcasts is not a requirement of this position, it could be a benefit.  



We are looking for someone who has a strong feel for social media management and has experience planning and producing content. You do not have to be a professional graphic designer or video editor, but you must have the basic skills to produce quality content.  In most cases, we will be providing you with the concept, raw footage, copy/text, and scripts - your job is to edit it together and post on our social media channels.



We are looking for the right person for this position so we are flexible in terms of hours. We will consider someone who is looking for a part-time position, but it can also be a full-time position (40 hours/week).   



Most importantly, we are looking for someone who is very dedicated and would be interested in a job where they would have a great deal of responsibility and opportunity to make a significant impact.  As our businesses grow, there is also opportunity to grow with us.  Please include the word ‚ÄúSuccess‚Äù in the subject line or first sentence of your reply. 



The job responsibilities include: 

-Editing raw video and audio to create our podcast episodes. 

-Creating short highlight reels from the podcasts to use for promotion and on social media

-Creating engaging reels for social media using raw video and voiceovers which we will provide

-Creating basic graphics and images for social media posts

-Creating and maintaining a social media calendar

-Scheduling and posting content to all social media channels

-Monitoring comments and DMs on social media channels



Job Requirements include: 

-Experience with the skills listed under job responsibilities

-Fluent in English

-Strong computer skills and reliable Internet

-Available immediately for 20-40 hours a week

-Schedule: We are flexible on hours, but we work in Central Standard Time (CST) and it would be important that this person be available for occasional video meetings either in the mornings or evenings (CST)

title: Senior Marketing Manager
description:
Company Overview:

Established in 2001, RWR Group is a leading provider of dedicated channel-specific recruitment services across New Zealand and Australia. With a network of 21 agencies including Retailworld, RWR Executive, Hospoworld, RWR Health, and RWR Construction, we specialize in serving diverse industries and sectors. Our commitment to excellence and innovation has positioned us as a trusted partner for both clients and candidates.



Job Summary:

As a Senior Marketing Manager at RWR Group, you will play a pivotal role in driving the company's marketing strategy and overseeing all marketing activities across our network of specialist recruitment agencies. Reporting directly to the executive team, you will lead a team of marketing professionals and work closely with franchise networks to develop and execute comprehensive B2B and B2C marketing campaigns.



Key Responsibilities:



Marketing Strategy Development: Collaborate with senior leadership to develop and implement strategic marketing plans aligned with company objectives and growth targets.



Campaign Management: Oversee the planning, execution, and optimization of multi-channel marketing campaigns to effectively target B2B and B2C audiences across various industries.



Franchise Network Support: Work closely with franchise partners to understand local market dynamics, provide marketing guidance, and ensure brand consistency across all locations.



Brand Management: Uphold and enhance the RWR Group brand image through consistent messaging, visual identity, and customer experience across all touchpoints.



Digital Marketing: Drive digital marketing initiatives including website optimization, SEO/SEM,
 marketing, social media, and online advertising to increase brand visibility and engagement.



Content Development: Oversee the creation of compelling and relevant content for various marketing channels, including website, blog, social media, and
 campaigns.



Data Analysis and Reporting: Utilize marketing analytics and key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure campaign effectiveness, track ROI, and provide actionable insights for continuous improvement.



Budget Management: Manage marketing budgets effectively, allocate resources efficiently, and optimize spending to maximize ROI and achieve business objectives.



Team Leadership and Development: Lead, mentor, and inspire a team of marketing professionals, fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture focused on innovation and excellence.



Qualifications and Skills:



-Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field; Master's degree preferred.

-Proven experience (5+ years) in marketing management roles, preferably in the recruitment or related industry.

-Demonstrated track record of developing and executing successful B2B and B2C marketing strategies and campaigns.

-Strong leadership skills with the ability to motivate and empower cross-functional teams.

-Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.

-Strategic thinker with a data-driven and results-oriented approach.

-Proficiency in marketing analytics tools, CRM systems, and digital marketing platforms.

-Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities effectively.



Join RWR Group and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to shaping the future of recruitment services across New Zealand and Australia. If you're passionate about marketing innovation and driving business growth, send at lead at rwrgroup dot net dot au. we want to hear from you!

?

title: IT Support Specialist / Systems Support
description:
We‚Äôre looking for an IT support tea
mber who is curious, adaptable, and comfortable solving problems with limited direction. This role blends investigative troubleshooting with repeatable operational tasks. You‚Äôll do well here if you enjoy learning new systems, documenting what you discover, and delivering consistent results.



Responsibilities



Troubleshoot and resolve IT issues across endpoints, users, and cloud tools



Investigate issues where documentation may be incomplete and determine the best path to resolution



Perform routine and repetitive tasks accurately (checklists, validations, maintenance activities, ticket workflows)



Monitor and support cybersecurity tooling: review alerts, validate agent health, assist with remediation steps



Assist with backup monitoring and restore/recovery tasks as needed



Create and update internal documentation to improve future support and reduce repeat issues



Communicate clearly in tickets and Microsoft Teams (status updates, findings, next steps)



Qualifications



Experience in IT support, helpdesk, or systems support (MSP experience is a plus)



Comfortable working independently and escalating appropriately when needed



Strong attention to detail and ability to follow procedures consistently



Clear written English for ticket notes, documentation, and internal updates



Professional, reliable, and able to manage shifting priorities



Nice-to-Haves



Hands-on experience responding to security events (triage, containment, remediation support)



Backup administration or troubleshooting experience



Familiarity with endpoint hardening, application control/allowlisting, and general security best practices



What Success Looks Like



Issues are resolved efficiently with clear documentation



Routine work is completed accurately and on schedule



Security alerts are handled responsibly and escalated when appropriate



Processes improve over time through better documentation and checklists



How to Apply



Please submit your resume and include:



The security tools you‚Äôve used (or similar tools)



Your experience with RMM/PSA platforms



Any experience with backups/restores 



If you tell me the seniority level (junior/mid) and what you want salary range we can find a agreeable place to start.

title: Digital Growth Strategist VA (Cinematic Content + Organic Growth)

 (Reels, Stories, carousels)

Pay + Schedule:

title: High Performance Lead Generation/Cold Call
description:
Job Title:



**High-Performance Cold Caller & Lead Sourcer (Commercial Facility Outreach)**



---



## Mission:



Your objective is simple:



1. **Build targeted lead lists** of commercial facilities.

2. **Secure 10-minute ‚ÄúFloor Audits‚Äù** with Facility Managers and Operations Directors.



You are **not selling a cleaning service.**

You are scheduling a short, professional assessment designed to help businesses **avoid premature capital replacement costs.**



This is a performance-based role for someone who executes with discipline.



---



## The Standard:



**Relentless Lead Generation**

You will source qualified commercial facilities daily using provided criteria.

No random lists. No guessing. Precision targeting only.



**Fearless Execution**

You must be comfortable navigating gatekeepers and speaking directly with decision-makers.



**Precision**

You will follow a specific, proven **60-second script.**

No rambling. No improvising. No ‚Äúsalesy‚Äù fluff.



**Accountability**

Daily End-of-Day (EOD) reporting is non-negotiable.

You will track:



* Leads sourced

* Total dials

* Conversations with decision makers

* Appointments set



**Professional Communication**

Fluent English with a confident, calm, and professional tone.



---



## Daily Responsibilities:



* Source **50‚Äì100 new commercial leads** per day

* Research correct contact names when possible

* Call through the list using the provided script

* Schedule qualified 10-minute floor audits

* Submit daily performance report



---



## Requirements:



* Proven experience in **B2B cold calling** or appointment setting

* Experience with **lead research or list building**

* Reliable high-speed internet

* Quiet, professional workspace

* Ability to follow a script exactly

* Ability to record and submit a short audio clip as part of the application



---



## How to Apply (Required Steps):



1. Submit your resume or a brief description of your cold calling experience.

2. **Crucial Step:** Record yourself reading the line below and include the audio file in your application:



> ‚ÄúI‚Äôm calling because we‚Äôre performing floor audits for facilities in [City] to identify wear patterns that lead to early replacement costs. I wanted to see if it would be unreasonable to stop by for 10 minutes next week to audit your flooring?‚Äù



**Applications without the audio recording will be ignored.**



---



## Compensation:



* Hourly base rate

* Performance bonuses for qualified appointments

* Long-term opportunity for the right operator



---



## Who This Is For:



* Disciplined callers who execute daily

* People comfortable sourcing their own leads

* Professionals who track numbers and improve weekly



## Who This Is NOT For:



* Script-avoiders

* Order-takers

* People who wait to be told what to do

* Callers who cannot handle gatekeepers

title: Content & Creative Specialist
description:
About Us 

The Event Engineer helps entrepreneurs scale to 7-figures and beyond. Led by Lisa Barry, we build high-converting event systems and world-class client experiences. Our mission: helping visionary founders grow wealth that fuels meaningful change.



The Role 

We are seeking a high-level Creative Marketing Architect to own the visual and written soul of our brand. You are responsible for total brand dominance. This role goes beyond social media management; you will architect our front-end aesthetic and create original, scroll-stopping content that establishes Lisa Barry as the preeminent voice in the industry.



Key Responsibilities



1. Native Social Media & Audience Growth



Original Production: Create high-impact Reels, TikToks, and Shorts from scratch. Research trends, develop unique hooks, and execute flawless transitions.

YouTube Mastery: Own the end-to-end production of the weekly 20-minute "Deep Dive." Manage high-retention editing, SEO, and thumbnails that command clicks.

Viral Exposure: Execute the strategy to reach 50,000 ‚Äì 100,000 followers through elite content and engagement.

Community Connection: Engage daily to build deep relationships using Lisa‚Äôs authentic voice.



2. Full-Spectrum Marketing & Asset Design



Product Design: Create high-converting lead magnets, PDF guides, and workbooks that look like 7-figure products.

Funnel Aesthetics: Ensure landing pages and sales funnels in GHL/Canva are visually stunning and premium.

Marketing Collateral: Design pitch decks, onboarding assets, and event-specific graphics (ads, banners, promos).



3. High-Authority Copywriting & Creative Direction



The Written Voice: Ghostwrite the weekly Substack, the "Wednesday Drop" Newsletter, and all social captions. Capture Lisa‚Äôs voice perfectly to inspire action.

Brand Guardianship: Ensure every touchpoint‚Äîfrom
 headers to YouTube descriptions‚Äîis visually elite.

Innovation: Stay ahead of marketing trends to keep the brand fun and innovative.



Who You Are



A Storyteller: You build authority through original visuals and marketing psychology.

An Owner: You don't wait for a task list. You see gaps and fill them with brilliance.

Design-Obsessed: If it isn‚Äôt world-class, it doesn‚Äôt get published.

High-Performance: You thrive in fast-paced environments and take pride in hitting growth targets.



Qualifications & Skills



Proven Results: Documented experience growing personal brands to 50k+ followers (metrics required).

Experience: 2‚Äì3+ years as a Creator or Marketing Assistant for high-ticket coaches or agencies.

Exceptional Communication: Flawless near-native English with a talent for voice matching.

Technical Mastery: Expert in Video Editing (CapCut/Premiere) and Visual Design (Canva/Photoshop/Figma).

Marketing Savvy: You understand how design impacts funnel conversion.



Application Requirements



Resume: A professional history of your experience.

Portfolio: Links to original social content, voice-matching copy, and marketing designs.

Growth Case Study: Breakdown of an account you grew and the strategy used.

DISC Profile: Please include your results.



Work Arrangement & Compensation



Remote: 9am ‚Äì 5pm AEDT

Compensation: $1,280 AUD / month (Full-Time)

Long-term Growth: We are looking for team to grow with the brand; as we scale, your role and compensation will scale with it.

title: Design and Sales Support
description:
We require a sales assistant to work with our Australian-based sales team, to improve our service delivery for the design and installation of shade sails and shade structures. You should have good computer skills, excellent English communication standards and ability to do basic construction designs on a simple program. You will be required to read a client's brief, upload plans into the program, and then design appropriate shade solutions for the client. From this you will be required to work with basic costings to create a draft quotation. 



The work is not full time every day in the beginning, however you would need to be able to respond quickly when an
 is received in order to improve our service levels to our clients. 



We will pay $4/hr AUD as a starting wage, and increase this according to your skill level. We would expect to pay up to $1,000 AUD per month once you are fully skilled in this and can take on the desired workload to the right standard.

title: Short Form Video Editor
description:
ABOUT GIMBAL PODCAST

Gimbal Podcast is a podcast that interviews the behind-the-scenes operators from top creator teams. We talk to editors, managers, strategists, and producers to extract the tactical frameworks they actually use. Our mission is to professionalize the creator economy :)



THE ROLE

We‚Äôre looking for a dedicated short-form video editor to own the entire shorts pipeline for Gimbal. You‚Äôll take raw podcast footage and turn it into 10‚Äì14 scroll-stopping clips per week.

This is not a ‚Äúslap captions on a clip‚Äù role. You‚Äôll be expected to identify the best 
nts, craft hooks, structure edits for retention, and continuously improve based on performance data. You‚Äôll work alongside our long-form editor (who handles the full episode) and our distribution manager (who handles posting and scheduling).



WHAT YOU'LL DO

Core: Short-Form Editing (80% of time)

‚Ä¢ Watch raw podcast footage and identify the 10‚Äì14 strongest clip-worthy 
nts per episode

‚Ä¢ Edit clips for YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Instagram Reels, and LinkedIn (vertical 9:16 format)

‚Ä¢ Write hooks and structure each clip for maximum retention (not just trimming timestamps)

‚Ä¢ Add captions, text overlays, and light graphics to enhance the content

‚Ä¢ Source supplementary B-roll, images, and visual elements to keep clips visually engaging

‚Ä¢ Create or refine thumbnails for each short

Analytics & Optimization (15% of time)

‚Ä¢ Pull weekly performance numbers from YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram

‚Ä¢ Track what‚Äôs working: which hooks, formats, durations, and topics drive the most views

‚Ä¢ Compile a brief weekly performance summary with actionable takeaways

‚Ä¢ Use data to inform your editing decisions ‚Äî we want someone who learns from the numbers, not just vibes

Adjacent Tasks (5% of time)

‚Ä¢ Assist with B-roll sourcing and asset organization

‚Ä¢ Occasional light assistant editor tasks on long-form episodes as needed

‚Ä¢ Help maintain our content asset library



REQUIREMENTS

Must-Have

‚Ä¢ Proven experience editing short-form video content (send us your portfolio or links to clips you‚Äôve edited)

‚Ä¢ Strong eye for what makes a good hook ‚Äî the first 1‚Äì2 seconds are everything

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Premiere Pro, CapCut, or DaVinci Resolve (or similar)

‚Ä¢ Comfortable working with podcast/interview footage specifically

‚Ä¢ Ability to hit weekly deadlines consistently ‚Äî we publish on a set schedule

‚Ä¢ Good written English (you‚Äôll write captions, hooks, and short descriptions)

‚Ä¢ Reliable internet connection and self-managed work schedule

Nice-to-Have

‚Ä¢ Experience with YouTube analytics and understanding of platform algorithms

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Notion (our team‚Äôs operating system)

‚Ä¢ Experience in the creator economy or podcast space

‚Ä¢ Basic motion graphics or After Effects skills

‚Ä¢ An opinion about what makes shorts succeed ‚Äî we want someone who thinks critically about this!



OUR STYLE

Professional but engaging. We‚Äôre not a 
 page, but we‚Äôre not a corporate channel either. Think clean cuts, well-timed zooms, purposeful text overlays, and the occasional visual punch ‚Äî without overdoing it. The content should feel polished and intentional, not templated.



HOW TO APPLY

Send us:

1. Your portfolio or links to short-form clips you‚Äôve edited. Podcast clips are a huge plus. If you don‚Äôt have podcast clips, send whatever best shows your editing style and ability to hook a viewer.

2. A short note (2‚Äì3 sentences) on what you think makes a short-form clip perform well.

3. Your availability, desired salary, and preferred tools/software.

4. BONUS: A 60 second video introducing yourself!



We review every application. If your work is strong, we‚Äôll reach out to discuss a paid test edit.

title: Creative Strategist - Meta Ads | Health & Wellness E-commerce Brand
description:
Here's the job post optimized for OnlineJobs.ph:



Creative Strategist - Meta Ads | Health & Wellness E-commerce Brand

Job Type: Full-Time

Work Setup: Remote

Salary Range: [Your range - e.g., $1,500-$3,000/month] + Performance Bonuses



About the Company

We're a fast-growing consumer health and wellness e-commerce brand based in the US. We create science-backed products with modern design that our customers love. We're scaling rapidly through Meta advertising and need a strategic creative leader to take us to the next level.



The Role

We're looking for an exceptional Creative Strategist who will own our Meta advertising creative strategy and lead our team of video editors and designers. You'll develop winning creative concepts and ensure every ad is executed perfectly before it goes live.

You are NOT a video editor. You are a strategic thinker and creative director who will:



Develop high-performing creative strategies for Meta 
 & Instagram)

Direct our video editors and designers to execute your vision flawlessly

Review and revise every piece of content until it's perfect

Build organized systems to track what works and what doesn't



This role requires extremely high standards. You must be willing to send work back for revisions multiple times until it's perfect.



Key Responsibilities

Creative Strategy & Concept Development:



Develop creative strategies for Meta ads 
 & Instagram) that drive sales and customer acquisition

Create concepts for high-performing ads: UGC content, testimonials, product demos, educational videos, lifestyle content

Identify winning angles, hooks, and messaging through strategic testing

Write detailed creative briefs for editors and designers

Stay updated on Meta trends and competitor creative

Turn product benefits into scroll-stopping ad concepts



Creative Direction & Team Management:



Direct and manage video editors and designers to execute your creative vision

Give clear, specific direction on: shot selection, pacing, hook timing, text placement, music, color grading, CTAs

Review EVERY piece of creative before it goes live - no exceptions

Conduct multiple revision rounds until each ad meets quality standards

Provide detailed feedback so team understands exactly what needs to change

Never allow "good enough" content to go live - you are the quality gatekeeper

Build reference files of winning ads to guide the team

Check all details: aspect ratios, captions, thumbnails, audio levels, brand guidelines



Systems & Documentation (CRITICAL - This is a major part of the role):



Create and maintain organized naming systems for all ads, batches, campaigns, and files

Build detailed tracking sheets (Google Sheets/Airtable) that document:



Hypothesis before launching each batch (example: "We believe lifestyle content will outperform product-focused content for women 25-34")

What creative variables we're testing (hook style, visual approach, messaging angle, CTA)

Performance results (CTR, CPC, CVR, ROAS, CPM)

Deep analysis of WHY ads worked or failed (not just the numbers)

Patterns we discover across all tests

What makes winners different from losers





Maintain organized file systems with clear version control (v1, v2, v3, final)

Create templates for creative briefs and revision tracking

Document everything so we build knowledge over time



Creative Testing & Optimization:



Design testing programs with clear hypotheses before launch

Analyze Meta Ads Manager data to find winning patterns

Use data to inform next creative iterations

Document detailed learnings from every test

Scale winning concepts through systematic testing





Required Qualifications

Mindset (Non-Negotiable):



Very high standards - you refuse to ship mediocre creative

Extremely detail-oriented - you notice small issues others miss

Love building systems and organizing information

Obsessed with understanding WHY creative performs

Patient but persistent - willing to request 5+ revisions to get it right

Enjoy teaching your team to produce excellent work



Experience & Skills:



5+ years creating and directing high-performing Meta ads 
 & Instagram)

Portfolio of Meta ads you've created strategy for (not edited yourself) with proven results

Experience lowering customer acquisition costs and improving ROAS through creative

Expert knowledge of Meta advertising best practices and what makes ads perform

Experience with multiple ad formats: static, carousel, video, stories, reels



Creative Leadership:



3+ years managing or directing creative teams (video editors, designers)

Proven ability to write clear creative briefs

Experience giving specific, actionable feedback

Comfortable requesting revisions until work is perfect

Track record of maintaining quality control



E-commerce & Health/Wellness:



Experience with e-commerce brands or DTC (direct-to-consumer) businesses

Understanding of health/wellness industry

Knowledge of full-funnel creative (cold traffic, retargeting, retention)

Experience with UGC content and testimonial-based ads



Systems & Organization:



Experience building tracking systems and documentation frameworks

Proficient with Google Sheets, Airtable, Asana, Notion, or similar tools

Ability to manage multiple projects without losing quality

Strong written communication for documentation



Analytical Skills:



Comfortable reading and analyzing Meta Ads Manager data

Ability to design hypothesis-driven tests

Can identify patterns in performance data

Balance creative intuition with data analysis





What Makes You Stand Out



You can look at an ad and immediately see what needs to be fixed

You understand the small details that separate a 3% CTR ad from a 5% CTR ad

You don't accept work that's 85% complete - you push for 100%

You naturally create tracking systems because you can't work without them

You've built creative testing frameworks and documentation systems before

You know that scaling creative requires both great strategy AND perfect execution





Red Flags - Please Don't Apply If:



You're uncomfortable giving direct critical feedback

You prefer doing the editing work yourself rather than directing others

You think "good enough" is acceptable when deadlines are tight

You find documentation and tracking tedious

You haven't managed a creative team before

You don't have patience for multiple revision rounds

You view creative as subjective rather than performance-driven





Why Work With Us



Lead creative strategy for a rapidly growing health brand

Build and direct your own creative team to your standards

Direct impact on company growth

We value quality over speed

Competitive salary with performance bonuses based on results

Long-term growth opportunity as company scales

Fully remote - work from anywhere in the Philippines

Supportive, professional work environment





To Apply, Please Submit:



Resume/CV highlighting your creative leadership experience

Cover Letter (in English) answering these questions:



Describe your process for directing creative from concept to final approval

Share an example of when you improved creative quality through revisions

How do you balance high standards with keeping your team motivated?

What systems have you built to track creative performance?





Portfolio including:



Meta ads you've created strategy for and directed (specify which ones you directed vs. edited)

Performance data showing results your creative achieved

Examples of documentation (creative briefs, tracking sheets, frameworks) - screenshots are fine, redact confidential info





Answer this specific question:

"Describe a time you sent creative back for multiple revisions. What exactly needed to be fixed, and how did you communicate that to your team?"



Please include links to portfolio/work samples in your application.



Application Instructions:



Write "META CREATIVE STRATEGIST" in your subject line so we know you read this post

Only apply if you have proven Meta ads experience with portfolio examples

Applications without portfolio samples will not be reviewed





We're looking for someone who can start within 2-4 weeks. This is a long-term position with growth potential as our brand scales.

title: Full-Time Social Media Video Editor (Content Marketing & Metricool Scheduling)
description:
Employment Details

‚Ä¢ Type: Full-Time (40 Hours/Week)

‚Ä¢ Location: Remote (Philippines)

‚Ä¢ Salary Range: 40,000 PHP per month (Negotiable based on portfolio quality) + 13th Month Pay

‚Ä¢ Software Requirements: Adobe Premiere Pro, Metricool

About Our Company

We are a growing B2B (Business-to-Business) enterprise dedicated to helping our clients scale their operations through high-impact, professional content marketing. We are currently searching for our very first full-time creative team member. Because you are our first hire, you will not be lost in a massive corporate machine or treated as a disposable contractor. You will work directly with the founder to shape the visual output of our company. We believe in mutual growth, absolute respect for your time, and providing a stable, long-term environment for someone who is eager to learn and grow with us.

Role Overview

We are seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented Video Editor who understands the unique nuances of professional content. Your primary objective will be to take raw footage, transform it into engaging, high-retention videos, and manage the administrative scheduling of those assets across our platforms.

You will be responsible for editing two distinct categories of content:

1. Client Deliverables: Polished, professional videos tailored to the specific brand guidelines of our corporate clients.

2. Internal Content Marketing: Educational videos, thought leadership clips, and promotional assets designed to market our own agency.

This role requires a critical balance of creative editing and administrative precision. You will not just be cutting footage; you will be the final step in our content distribution pipeline, ensuring that the right video goes live at the right time.

Key Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Edit long-form and short-form videos (both vertical and horizontal formats) utilizing Adobe Premiere Pro.

‚Ä¢ Incorporate clean, professional motion graphics, lower-thirds, and text overlays suitable for a corporate audience. (Please note: We do not use frantic, over-edited "influencer" styles. We value clean, authoritative pacing that builds trust).

‚Ä¢ Perform essential color correction, audio leveling, and background noise reduction to ensure high production value.

‚Ä¢ Export finalized assets optimized for the compression algorithms of various platforms (LinkedIn, YouTube, Instagram).

‚Ä¢ Upload completed videos, write basic accompanying social media captions, and schedule posts for distribution using the Metricool platform.

‚Ä¢ Utilize Metricool's "Approval Workflow" feature to submit drafts to management for review prior to final publication.

‚Ä¢ Maintain highly organized project files, folder structures, and secure cloud backups.

Required Skills & Experience

‚Ä¢ Proven, demonstrable experience utilizing Adobe Premiere Pro (Knowledge of After Effects is a fantastic bonus, but not strictly required for this role).

‚Ä¢ A strong portfolio demonstrating your ability to edit professional, narrative-driven content (such as talking heads, explainer videos, or podcasts).

‚Ä¢ Experience with, or a strong willingness to rapidly learn, Metricool for social media scheduling and analytics.

‚Ä¢ Excellent English comprehension and written communication skills for drafting basic social media copy.

‚Ä¢ A strong understanding of pacing, storytelling, and visual hierarchy.

‚Ä¢ Exceptional attention to detail‚Äîyou meticulously review your own work before submitting it for approval.

Hardware & Technical Requirements

(Due to the heavy processing requirements of video editing, please ensure your personal workstation meets these criteria before applying)

‚Ä¢ Processor (CPU): Intel Core i7 / AMD Ryzen 7 (or equivalent/newer) / Apple Silicon M1 or newer.

‚Ä¢ Memory (RAM): Minimum 16GB (32GB is highly preferred for a smooth 4K workflow).

‚Ä¢ Graphics (GPU): Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GTX 1660 / RTX series or equivalent) with at least 4GB VRAM.

‚Ä¢ Storage: Solid State Drive (NVMe SSD preferred) to ensure fast playback of heavy files.

‚Ä¢ Internet: A highly stable connection with a minimum of 50 Mbps Download / 20 Mbps Upload speeds (this is crucial for downloading gigabytes of raw client files).

‚Ä¢ Power: Access to a UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supply) or backup power during regional outages is highly preferred.

What We Offer You

‚Ä¢ A stable, full-time monthly salary paid reliably on schedule via EasyPay or your preferred transfer method.

‚Ä¢ Statutory 13th-Month Pay (prorated based on your exact start date).

‚Ä¢ A flexible, output-based working environment. As long as deadlines are strictly met and communication is clear, we do not micromanage your daily hours.

‚Ä¢ The opportunity for significant career growth. As our first creative hire, successful performance will lead to increased responsibilities, leadership opportunities, and increased compensation as the business scales.

How to Apply

We receive a high volume of applications for our roles. To ensure we are reviewing candidates who possess the high attention to detail required for professional video editing, please follow these instructions perfectly. Applications that do not follow these steps will be immediately discarded.

1. Change the subject line of your application
 to exactly: "B2B Premiere Editor"

2. Provide a brief, 3-to-4 sentence introduction explaining why you are interested in transitioning into or continuing to work within business education content editing and content marketing.

3. Include a direct link to your portfolio. Please explicitly point out 1 or 2 specific videos in your portfolio that best demonstrate clean, professional pacing and excellent audio management.

4. Include a direct screenshot of your computer‚Äôs system specifications (showing CPU, RAM, and GPU) alongside a screenshot of a recent internet speed test.

Note to Applicants: Shortlisted candidates will be invited to complete a short, time-bound trial task. This will involve editing 60 seconds of sample footage and drafting a theoretical Metricool upload sequence to ensure we are aligned on style and technical capability. You are welcome to heavily watermark this trial task to protect your intellectual property.

title: Social Media Editor & Content Coordinator
description:
Location: Remote

 Company: Canadian-Based Social Media Agency

 Employment Type: Full-Time (40 hrs/week)

 Compensation: $900 CAD per month + performance bonuses



About Us

We are a fast-growing Canadian social media management agency specializing in beauty and service-based businesses. We produce high-quality short-form content (Instagram Reels & TikTok) for multiple active clients and are expanding our production team.

This is a stable, long-term opportunity for someone who wants to grow with a company ‚Äî not just freelance project to project.

We value organization, reliability, and strong communication. As we grow, there will be opportunities for increased responsibility, higher compensation, and leadership within the production team.



Role Overview

You will be responsible for editing short-form video content, drafting simple captions, organizing deliverables in Notion, and preparing monthly content calendars for approval. Training will be provided within the probation period of 3 months. 

This is a production and coordination role.

 No client communication required.

 No posting to client accounts required.

You will work directly with the founder and creative director, Giuliana



Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Edit 12 short-form reels per client per month (6‚Äì7 clients total)

 ‚Ä¢ Use structured editing templates and brand guidelines

 ‚Ä¢ Add subtitles/captions to videos if necessary

 ‚Ä¢ Draft simple captions using ChatGPT as a support tool

 ‚Ä¢ Input finalized content into our Notion database

 ‚Ä¢ Organize Google Drive folders monthly

 ‚Ä¢ Prepare posting calendars with suggested dates

‚Ä¢ Prepare grid mock up using reel covers for each video

 ‚Ä¢ Implement revision feedback

 ‚Ä¢ Maintain clean organization and meet deadlines



What We‚Äôre Looking For

‚Ä¢ Experience editing Instagram Reels / TikTok

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable with CapCut & Canva

 ‚Ä¢ Strong written & spoken English

 ‚Ä¢ Highly organized and detail-oriented

 ‚Ä¢ Able to follow systems and improve workflows

 ‚Ä¢ Reliable internet connection

 ‚Ä¢ Available full-time (40 hours per week)

 ‚Ä¢ Looking for a long-term position



Compensation & Growth

Base Salary: $900 CAD per month (Full-Time)



Bonuses Available:

 ‚Ä¢ Additional pay for extra editing beyond monthly workload

 ‚Ä¢ Performance-based bonuses for consistency and reliability

 ‚Ä¢ Opportunity for salary increases as client workload grows



As the company expands, there will be opportunities to grow into a senior production role and take on additional responsibility.

We are building a long-term team, not hiring for short-term work.



Hiring Process

Shortlisted candidates will be asked to complete a paid sample task before final selection.

The sample task will include:

‚Ä¢ Editing 1 short-form reel

‚Ä¢ Drafting 1 simple caption



This test will be paid. We believe in respecting your time and skills, and we use this step to ensure alignment in editing style, organization, and communication before moving forward with a full-time offer.



Employment Structure



This is a full-time, long-term position.

The first 30 days will serve as a probationary period to ensure mutual fit. During this time, structured onboarding and training will be provided. Following successful completion of the probation period, the role continues as a long-term position with opportunities for growth and performance-based increases.



To Apply Please include:



Portfolio or examples of short-form edits

A 2-3 minute video introducing yourself

Your editing software of choice

Confirmation that you are available full-time



Only applicants who follow all instructions will be considered.



Thank you for your interest in working with The Socials Haus!

title: Part-Time Collections Officer (Work From Home)
description:
Part-Time Collections Officer (Work From Home)



We are looking for a confident, results-driven individual to take ownership of overdue accounts and get them paid.



This is not a passive admin role. We need someone who is comfortable having firm conversations, handling objections, and consistently following through until payment is secured. If a contact can‚Äôt be reached, you don‚Äôt stop ‚Äî you find another pathway.



If you avoid difficult conversations, this role is not for you.



The Role

- You will be responsible for recovering outstanding payments through strategic, persistent phone follow-up.

- Hours: 12‚Äì15 hours per week 

- Location: Remote 

- Start: Immediate



You must be available to make calls during business hours across:

¬∑ Australia

¬∑ United States

¬∑ New Zealand



What You‚Äôll Be Accountable For

¬∑ Proactively calling overdue accounts.

¬∑ Securing payment commitments and following through.

¬∑ Navigating gatekeepers and locating decision-makers.

¬∑ Keeping detailed records of all communication.

¬∑ Providing clear weekly reporting on recovery progress.

¬∑ Escalating matters when required.



We‚Äôre Looking For Someone Who:

¬∑ Is confident, direct and professionally assertive.

¬∑ Is persistent and resilient when facing delays or excuses.

¬∑ Thinks on their feet and adapts conversations in real time.

¬∑ Communicates clearly and confidently in English.

¬∑ Works independently and manages their own follow-up schedule.

¬∑ Has collections, credit control, or high-volume phone experience (preferred but not essential if you are strong on the phone).



Experience with MYOB or Xero is an advantage, but attitude and results matter more than software knowledge.



What We Offer

¬∑ 12‚Äì15 flexible hours per week.

¬∑ Remote work.

¬∑ Ongoing opportunity for the right person.

¬∑ A clear focus on outcomes, not micromanagement.



To Apply, please send:

¬∑ A short summary of your collections or phone-based experience (include years of experience).

¬∑ Your weekly availability (including time zones you can cover).

¬∑ Your expected hourly rate.

¬∑ Your full name,
 and phone number.

¬∑ Your resume.

¬∑ A voice recording via Vocaroo using the script below.



Please note: Do not apply unless you are confident, assertive and professional.



---



Sample Script



Good morning, this is [Your Name] calling from Enlighten Press.



I‚Äôm following up regarding your outstanding balance of $10,000 that was due on October 9th.



Can you please confirm when payment will be made? If it helps, I can resend the invoice while I have you on the phone.



We do need to finalise this matter, so I‚Äôd appreciate confirmation today.



Thank you.

title: Business Development Manager
description:
Job Title: Business Development Manager & Virtual Assistant (WordPress Development Agency)

Location: Remote (9 AM ‚Äì 5 PM Central US Time, Monday to Friday)

Job Type: Full-Time



About the Role:



We are seeking a proactive and results-driven Business Development Manager & Virtual Assistant to join our WordPress Development Agency. This role is a blend of business development and virtual assistance, requiring expertise in WordPress, WooCommerce, AI tools, SEO, and QA. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in the web development industry (minimum 3 years), SEO (2 years), and client acquisition.



You will work closely with the CEO and Business Manager to generate business opportunities, handle marketplace bidding, respond to inbound leads, manage proposals, and support day-to-day operations, including QA testing, SEO, and social media marketing (SMM).



Key ResponsibilitiesBusiness Development & Sales



Engage with direct leads from the website chat, advertisements, and inquiries.

Identify potential projects on online marketplaces

Create compelling proposals and bids based on client requirements and submit them.

Follow up on leads and proposals to convert them into paying clients.

Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients and partners.

Stay up-to-date with WordPress and web development trends to align sales strategies.

Collaborate with the management team to define sales strategies and achieve revenue targets.

Virtual Assistance & Administrative Tasks



Assist the CEO and Business Manager in administrative and project management tasks.

Perform QA testing of WordPress and WooCommerce websites before delivery.

Execute SEO tasks such as on-page optimization, keyword research, and technical SEO audits.

Assist with social media management and content scheduling.

Conduct industry research and competitor analysis to improve business strategies.

Organize documents, reports, and client communications.

AI & Automation



Utilize AI-powered tools for lead generation, proposal writing, automation, and content optimization.

Improve workflow efficiency using AI-based business solutions.

Requirements & Qualifications



Experience:



3+ years in the WordPress/Web Development industry.

2+ years in SEO and digital marketing.

Proven experience in business development, sales, or client acquisition.

Technical Skills:



Proficiency in WordPress & WooCommerce.

Strong knowledge of SEO best practices, keyword research, and site audits.

Familiarity with SMM strategies and content planning.

Experience with QA testing for WordPress projects.

Ability to use AI tools for business development and marketing tasks.

Strong writing skills for proposal creation and client communications.

Soft Skills:



Strong negotiation and persuasion skills.

Excellent verbal and written communication in English.

Self-motivated and results-driven.

Strong organizational and time management skills.

Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively.

Work Schedule



Monday ‚Äì Friday, 8 AM ‚Äì 5 PM CST (Central US Time)



Pay: $1,000 - $1,200 USD per month.



Job Type: Full-time



Work Location: Remote

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
We are looking for a creative specialist to lead our social media activity across multiple brands.

Must be good with design tools (Adobe Suite, Canva), with an enthusiastic understanding of marketing fundamentals (competitive research, brand positioning, value proposition etc‚Ä¶), and the ability to bring it all together to make engaging social media campaigns (strategy, storytelling).



This role will be an interesting mix of research, strategy, design, analysis, and interaction across all social media accounts.

We are looking for an active social media user that can spot relevant content trends and use these insights to create engaging content for our brands/channels.



Company Overview: OneWorld Business Solutions is a consulting firm dedicated to helping small and medium-sized companies optimise their operations and streamline processes to drive growth and success.



Responsibilities:

-Plan, generate, edit, publish, and share daily content that builds meaningful connections and encourages community members to take action.

-Set up and optimize company pages within each platform to increase the visibility of the company‚Äôs social content.

-Ensure that all published content is consistent with the brand image and positioning

-Continuously improve by capturing and analyzing the appropriate social data/metrics, insights, and best practices, and then acting on the information.

-Collaborate with other departments (customer relations, sales, etc.) to manage reputation, identify key players, and coordinate actions.



Requirements:

-Proven working experience in social media marketing or as a digital media specialist.

-Excellent consulting, writing, editing (photo/video/text), presentation, and communication skills.

-Experience working in the finance sector is a huge advantage

-Demonstrable social networking experience and social analytics tools knowledge.

-Knowledge of online marketing and a good understanding of major marketing channels.

-Positive attitude, detail and customer-oriented with good multitasking and organizational ability. (If you‚Äôve read this far, include the word ‚Äúpineapple‚Äù in your application‚Äîwe like to work with people who pay attention to detail)

-Fluency in English.



What We Offer:

-Competitive salary package.

-Opportunities for professional growth and development.

-A dynamic and supportive work environment.

title: Commercial Real Estate Lead Generation Team Required
description:
East Coast based commercial real estate investor seeking a structured lead generation team to identify off market commercial acquisition opportunities.



This position is for a team with internal management and quality control. This is not a solo VA position.



We are calling commercial property owners and business decision makers across the United States. This is not residential wholesaling and not an appointment setting role.



Core Objective



Generate consistent qualified commercial real estate leads through real conversations with property owners.



A qualified lead means:



Owner expresses real openness to selling

Owner provides context beyond simple price curiosity

Motivation or timing is identified



Performance Expectation



Target output once ramped is 2 to 3 qualified commercial leads per caller per day.



Scope of Work



Outbound calling to commercial property owners

Follow a structured commercial discovery script

Uncover motivation and timing

Log clear and structured notes

Provide organized daily reporting



Requirements



Established team with internal supervision

Experience speaking with commercial property owners

Strong listening and conversational ability

Ability to follow structured discovery without sounding scripted

Provide full unedited call recordings

Reliable internet and professional calling setup



Accent is not a concern. Comprehension and conversational discipline are critical.



Compensation



Hourly structure

Short trial required before long term engagement



Application Instructions

title: Expert in InDesign Automation & Make.com (Editorial Workflow)
description:
I am looking for a Creative Automation Specialist to bridge the gap between high-end book design and automated data injection. I have a professional book layout designed in Adobe InDesign, and I need to create a workflow where long-form text can be injected via 
 (Integromat) into a dynamic template.



The Challenge:

Standard PDF form-filling is not enough. The text inputs are long and must flow across pages, respecting paragraph styles, linked text frames, and high-fidelity typography.



Key Requirements:



Deep knowledge of Adobe InDesign (specifically IDML and Linked Text Frames).



Proven experience with 
 (Integromat) and API integrations.



Experience with automation tools like Plumsail Documents, 
, Marq, or Adobe PDF Services API.



Ability to handle "text overflow" and dynamic pagination in automated PDF generation.
