title: Sales Representative
description:
Join a fast-growing US online home goods retailer and enjoy the learning and opportunities that you have while working with us.



We strive to provide 5-star service & shopping assistance to all of our clients, and all of our team is accountable to fulfill this.



We are looking for a Sales Representative who can assist prospective buyers and close online ecommerce sales.



We're only looking for full-time, long-term, ongoing cooperation.



Work schedules available:

8 AM to 4 PM US EST

4 PM to 12 AM US EST



Your work week will be 5 days per week, with 2 days off per week. Days off will be selected with your manager. We will try to accommodate your preferences for which days you like, based on availability.



This role starts ASAP!!



Job Duties and Responsibilities:

Receive incoming phone calls and live chats from potential customers (prospects) who indicated that they need shopping assistance. This does not include calls and chats from existing customers that need help with their orders (that‚Äôs a job for a different department)

Makes follow-up calls, writes follow-up
s, and text messages to potential buyers. We try to follow up 5x with each person that contacted us (unless they indicate that they are no longer interested). We don‚Äôt do cold calling. Only reaching out to prospects who interacted with our online store and left their contact information.

After each interaction with a prospect/customer, writes notes & comments in our CRM (Asana)

Communicate efficiently and build rapport with potential customers

Assists prospects in their shopping journey and helps make the purchase decision

Ensures that all prospects‚Äô questions and objections are addressed

Leads every interaction to a close sale, which means an order is placed on our online store

Prepares custom quotes, price matches competitors if necessary, and offers custom discounts. This requires calculating margins & ensuring profitability.

Answering questions about the products we offer, including technical questions. Learns the specifications, features and benefits of our bestsellers. Over time, becomes an expert in the industry.

If not able to answer product-specific questions, conducts research in the materials provided by the supplier, or reaches out to the supplier to get the information

Confirms stock availability and lead times when offering products to prospects

Documents standard procedures and best practices in a written form, so that other tea
mbers can learn from them



Requirements:

At least 2 years of experience in sales on the phone

Experience must include both inbound and outbound sales

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

Experience in Customer Service on the phone is a nice to have

Experience in the e-commerce (online shopping) industry is nice to have

Home improvement, construction, and gas plumbing industry experience is a plus

Outgoing, friendly, and lively

Can-do mindset, with a sense of ownership, pride in your performance, and its impact on the company‚Äôs success

Long-term commitment - treat this as your career



What we can offer:

Sales commission: 8% of gross profit from all orders closed. Gross profit means the sale amount minus the product and shipping costs. Paid monthly. No upper limit. Monthly commission payouts range between $1,200 (the guaranteed minimum) and as high as $3,000 (for the top performer). The average monthly payout is $1,465 (average from the last 2 years).

$1,200/month minimum guaranteed pay

15 days paid days off per year (also convertible to min. guaranteed commission)

Paid training on all aspects of the role

Opportunities for professional development

Friendly atmosphere

Online Interview process

Fully remote position

title: Podcast Guest Booking & Outreach Specialist
description:
Part-Time ‚Ä¢ Remote ‚Ä¢ Long-Term Potential

Hours: 10‚Äì20 per week to start

Experience Required: Proven podcast guest booking experience



About the Role

We are looking for a Podcast Guest Booking & Outreach Specialist to help secure high-quality podcast appearances for the owner of Big Hearted Breeders, Heather Gibson. 



This role is NOT about editing audio or managing social media.

Your sole focus is researching relevant podcasts, pitching hosts, and booking appearances.



You should already understand:

*What podcast hosts care about

*How to pitch without sounding generic or spammy

*How to track outreach and follow-ups consistently



About Us



Big Hearted Breeders Community is a mission-driven education and wellness brand rooted in the belief that pets can bring real hope, comfort, and healing into homes.



Founded by Heather Gibson‚Äîan experienced foster and adoptive parent, pet wellness educator, and advocate for ethical breeding‚Äîour work sits at the intersection of animals, mental health, education, and community. Through podcasts, educational programs, live and virtual events, and partnerships in the pet and wellness space, we help families, breeders, and pet lovers make informed, heart-centered decisions that support both human and animal well-being.



We are a values-driven team that cares deeply about:

*Kindness and integrity

*Thoughtful, ethical work

*Clear communication and reliability

*Long-term impact over short-term wins

*We believe in building sustainable systems, telling meaningful stories, and showing up with professionalism and heart. We‚Äôre looking for people who take pride in their work, enjoy collaboration, and want to contribute to something that genuinely helps others.



If you‚Äôre someone who values purpose, organization, and doing good work behind the scenes that creates real-world impact, you‚Äôll likely feel at home here.



Primary Responsibilities

*Research and identify relevant podcasts aligned with our brand and audience

*Build and maintain a list of target podcasts and hosts

*Write and send personalized podcast pitch
s or DMs

*Follow up appropriately (without spamming)

*Track outreach, responses, and bookings in a simple system

*Coordinate booked appearances and confirm logistics

*Maintain a steady pipeline of upcoming podcast interviews





Required Experience & Skills (Non-Negotiable)

*Proven experience booking podcast guests (yourself or others)

*Strong research skills (finding the right shows, not just big ones)

*Excellent written English and persuasive communication

*Ability to personalize outreach at scale

*Organized tracking of pitches, follow-ups, and bookings

*Professional, respectful communication with hosts





Nice-to-Have (Not Required)

*Experience in wellness, pets, education, or mission-driven brands



What Success Looks Like

*Consistent outreach being sent weekly

*A growing list of booked podcast appearances

*Clear visibility into outreach and booking status

*Quality podcast placements that align with the brand



Compensation

*Hourly or monthly retainer, based on experience

*Competitive for proven results

*Performance-based increases possible as bookings grow





Who This Role Is Best For

-This role is ideal for someone who:

-Enjoys research and relationship-based outreach

-Understands podcast culture and host expectations

-Is persistent, organized, and detail-oriented

-Wants ongoing, flexible, part-time work with growth potential



How to Apply

Please include:

*A brief description of your podcast guest booking experience

*Examples of podcasts you‚Äôve helped book guests on (if available)

*Your availability and preferred compensation structure

*Fill out the following. Applications without the form will NOT be considered: 



Applications without direct podcast booking experience will not be considered.

title: Social Media Content Creator & Manager ‚Äî TikTok & Instagram (Faith-Based App)
description:
WAGE/SALARY: $150/month

DESIRED HOURS PER WEEK: 15 (3 hours per day, 5 days a week)



JOB DESCRIPTION:

We are the creators of the 75 Holy Challenge‚Ñ¢ ‚Äî a faith-based wellness app on iOS and Android that guides Christians through 75 days of spiritual and physical transformation. The app has been featured on Google Play and is growing rapidly. We need a dedicated content creator to help us scale our social media presence across TikTok and Instagram.

This is a part-time role ‚Äî 3 hours per day, every day ‚Äî with consistent, guaranteed monthly work at $135/month.



YOUR DAILY RESPONSIBILITIES (3 Hours Per Day):

Content Creation & Posting (2 hours per day):

‚Äî Create and post 2-3 pieces of content PER DAY on BOTH TikTok and Instagram (that's 2-3 on TikTok AND 2-3 on Instagram daily)

‚Äî Content must be a mixture of: slideshow reels, static image posts, carousel posts, short-form videos, text overlay videos, and story content

‚Äî Write engaging, informative captions for every post with relevant hashtags

‚Äî Use trending audio and formats that are currently performing well in the Christian and wellness spaces on TikTok and Instagram

‚Äî All content must be on-brand, faith-centered, and speak to a Christian audience with authenticity and respect

Tools you will use for content creation:

‚Äî Canva (slideshows, carousels, static posts)

‚Äî Adobe (graphic design, video editing)

‚Äî Veo3 (AI video generation)

‚Äî Nano (AI content tools)

‚Äî Bannabba (video creation)

‚Äî CapCut or similar (video editing, transitions, text animations)

You are expected to be proficient in at least 2-3 of these tools and willing to learn the others.

Community Engagement & Growth (30 minutes per day):

‚Äî Search and engage with content under these hashtags DAILY:

#ChristianTikTok #75Hard #75Holy #75HolyChallenge #PrayerLock #ChristianChallenge #FaithJourney #FaithAndFitness #BibleReading #SpiritualGrowth

‚Äî Engagement means: liking relevant posts, leaving genuine and thoughtful comments (not spam ‚Äî real comments like encouraging words, prayer hands ????, fire emojis ????, and meaningful replies that make people click on our profile)

‚Äî Reply to every comment on our posts within the same day

‚Äî Follow relevant creators and accounts in the Christian and faith wellness space

‚Äî The goal is to make the @75holy brand VISIBLE in the community every single day

Reporting & Strategy (30 minutes per day):

‚Äî Track which posts are performing well and which are not

‚Äî Send a weekly report (simple ‚Äî what worked, what didn't, what to try next)

‚Äî Stay updated on trending sounds, formats, and content styles on TikTok and Instagram

‚Äî Coordinate with our team on upcoming app features, launches, and campaigns so content aligns with our marketing calendar



WHAT WE PROVIDE YOU:

REQUIREMENTS:

‚Äî Proficiency in Canva and at least one video editing tool (CapCut, Adobe, etc.)

‚Äî Excellent written English ‚Äî captions must be well-written, engaging, and error-free

‚Äî This is NON-NEGOTIABLE. You must understand the tone, the language, and the audience

‚Äî Reliable internet connection and your own phone/computer

‚Äî Ability to work independently and post EVERY DAY including weekends

‚Äî Must be available to start immediately



BONUS SKILLS (Not Required But Preferred):

‚Äî Understanding of TikTok SEO and algorithm optimization

‚Äî Experience growing Instagram accounts from scratch

‚Äî Experience with AI content creation tools (Veo3, Nano Bannana)



?? REQUIRED TEST TASK ‚Äî READ CAREFULLY ??

To be considered for this role, you MUST complete the following test and submit it with your application. Applications without a completed test will NOT be reviewed.

Create ONE sample TikTok-style slideshow or video reel (15-30 seconds) promoting the 75 Holy Challenge‚Ñ¢ app.

Don‚Äôt worry, you don‚Äôt have to edit anything! You‚Äôll be working alongside a video editing and graphic design team to create content!

-Copywriting & Scriptwriting: You will work hand-in-hand with a team and your client to build effective storytelling copy for social media. We will train you to use AI tools and storytelling strategies to captivate an audience.

-Content Analysis and Reporting: You will generate reports on account performance and audience engagement. These insights will be used to optimize strategies and create better content for our clients.



ALL TRAINING PROVIDED ‚Äì WORTH $10,000 ‚Äì IS FREE

, TikTok, and YouTube.

, Metricool, Slack, Google Drive, and Google Docs is highly preferred but not required.

title: Real Estate Development Project Manager
description:
Job Summary

The Virtual Real Estate Development Project Manager will manage the entire lifecycle of development projects‚Äîincluding feasibility, acquisition, entitlement, and construction‚Äîremotely. This role requires a blend of real estate finance knowledge, project management discipline, and high-tech proficiency to lead remote teams, coordinate with contractors, and secure necessary approvals from a virtual office environment. 



Key Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Project Lifecycle Management: Oversee all phases of real estate development, including pre-development, design, construction, and close-out.

‚Ä¢ Virtual Coordination & Communication: Act as the central point of contact for architects, engineers, contractors, and city officials, utilizing VoIP, Zoom, and project management platforms.

‚Ä¢ Project Feasibility & Planning: Conduct site analysis, feasibility studies, and market research to determine project viability. Create and manage project budgets, pro formas, and detailed schedules.

‚Ä¢ Entitlement & Permitting: Manage the zoning, permitting, and regulatory approval process, coordinating with local authorities remotely.

‚Ä¢ Scheduling & Tracking: Develop and maintain detailed master schedules to ensure project milestones are met on time.

‚Ä¢ Contract Negotiation: Assist in the selection and negotiation of contracts with vendors, consultants, and contractors.

‚Ä¢ Reporting: Prepare periodic reports for senior management regarding project pipeline, risks, and performance.

‚Ä¢ Risk Management: Identify potential bottlenecks and proactively mitigate risks through digital data analysis and virtual tea
etings. 



Required Qualifications & Skills

‚Ä¢ Experience: 5+ years of experience in real estate development, project management, or construction.

‚Ä¢ Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Real Estate, Urban Planning, Construction Management, or Finance (Master‚Äôs preferred).

‚Ä¢ Technology Proficiency: Expertise in project management tools (e.g., Asana, MS Project, Procore) and Microsoft Office Suite, particularly Excel for financial modeling.

‚Ä¢ Industry Knowledge: Strong understanding of zoning laws, land use, and development regulations.

‚Ä¢ Self-Management: High level of self-motivation and the ability to work independently in a remote, fast-paced environment.



Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

‚Ä¢ Project delivery within approved budget and timeline.

‚Ä¢ Accuracy of financial forecasts and projections.

‚Ä¢ Effectiveness of project coordination.

title: Project Lead ‚Äì IT / Tech Projects
description:
About Digibeacon, the premier ClickUp Solutions Partner in the Philippines, is looking for a Project Lead who will run and execute IT and technology projects hands-on. This role is customer-facing and requires someone who can architect, configure, and implement project management dashboards, reports, and productivity tools‚Äîincluding ClickUp and related platforms.



This is a delivery-focused role where you will be actively involved in project scoping, configuration, client sessions, and end-to-end implementation.



Role Overview

The Project Lead will work directly with clients and internal teams to ensure that each project is delivered according to requirements. You will be responsible for hands-on configuration, workflow setup, dashboard creation, and ensuring that clients adopt and understand the systems built for them. PMP certification is an advantage but not required.



What You‚Äôll Do

1. Lead and execute multiple IT/tech projects simultaneously.

2. Work directly with clients to gather requirements and translate them into workflows, dashboards, process diagrams and reports.

3. Architect and configure project management spaces, structures, and tools (primarily ClickUp).

4. Build dashboards, reporting views, automations, custom fields, forms, and project templates.

5. Conduct client workshops, onboarding sessions, and training.

6. Prepare project documentation including process maps, SOPs, and implementation guides.

7. Coordinate timelines, deliverables, and dependencies across teams.

8. Troubleshoot configuration issues and recommend solutions.

9. Track project progress and ensure timely completion of milestones.

10. Ensure high client satisfaction by delivering organized, scalable, and strategic configurations.



Qualifications

1. 2‚Äì4 years of experience managing or implementing IT, SaaS, or tech-related projects.

2. Strong hands-on experience with project management tools (ClickUp and other similar Project management tools).

3. Ability to design workflows, dashboards, automations, and structured project setups.

4. Excellent communication skills and confidence in client-facing sessions.

5. Strong organizational skills, problem-solving ability, and a ‚Äúcan-do‚Äù attitude.

6. Experience in process mapping, diagram or SOP creation is a strong advantage.

7. PMP or similar certifications are a plus, but not required. 



What You‚Äôll Need

1. A desktop or laptop with decent specs capable of running multiple applications for virtual meetings and presentations

2. A quiet home workspace

3. A noise-cancelling headset

4. A stable high-speed internet connection



Why Join Digibeacon?

1. Competitive compensation package

2. Hybrid work setup with a collaborative and high-performance team

3. Opportunity to work directly with executives and contribute to operational strategy and growth

4. Exposure to modern SaaS tools, data-driven reporting, and digital transformation initiatives



How to Apply

1. To process your application, please complete the sign-up form below.

2. We only process applicants who complete the form.

3. Apply here: 
.com/digibeaconcareers

Nice to Have:

Why Work With Us:

title: Part-Time Bookkeeping Virtual Assistant

The Role

As our Bookkeeping VA, you will be responsible for maintaining accurate financial records across multiple platforms, ensuring transactions reconcile properly, and supporting owner and vendor payments. This is a part-time role (20 hours per week) with steady, ongoing work.

- QuickBooks

- OwnerRez

- Clearing

description:
About Us:

We are a fast-growing e-commerce company specializing in funnel-driven dropshipping, focused on building highly optimized, conversion-focused sales funnels at scale. Our success depends on operational excellence, strong testing systems, and skilled funnel builders who understand both the technical and strategic side of funnel performance. As part of our team, you will work alongside experienced funnel builders in a high-performance environment where results are recognized and rewarded.



Job Description:

We are looking for a Funnel Builder who will be responsible for building, maintaining, and optimizing high-converting funnels across our funnel ecosystem. In this role, you will not only execute funnel builds but also actively contribute insights, improvements, and strategic input based on performance data, product understanding, and conversion best practices. You will work in a fast-paced testing environment where precision, ownership, and performance-driven thinking are essential.



Responsibilities:



Funnel Creation & Implementation:

You will build and launch complete funnels based on internal SOPs, product requirements, and campaign strategies, ensuring technical accuracy and full functionality from start to finish.



Quality Control & Testing:

You will thoroughly test all funnels you build, ensuring that pages, links, integrations, checkout flows, and tracking systems work flawlessly.



Conversion-Focused Execution:

You will apply your understanding of copy structure, offer positioning, and funnel logic to ensure that each funnel is optimized for maximum conversion performance.



Product & Copy Understanding:

You will study the product, the offer, and the intended customer journey to ensure the funnel structure aligns with the marketing message and campaign goals.



Performance Contribution & Insights:

You will provide feedback, suggestions, and improvement ideas based on your experience, helping refine templates, layouts, and funnel systems over time.



Collaboration & SOP Compliance:

You will work closely with the store management and funnel teams, following internal SOPs while maintaining high professional standards and operational consistency.



Requirements:



Experience:

Proven experience building sales funnels (Funnelish, Shopify-based funnels, ClickFunnels, or similar platforms preferred).



Technical Accuracy & Attention to Detail:

Strong ability to ensure flawless technical setup, integrations, and user flow functionality.



Conversion Awareness:

Understanding of basic copy structure, conversion principles, and funnel psychology is required.



Ownership & Professionalism:

Highly professional, reliable, and capable of taking full ownership of the funnels you build.



Proactive & Insight-Driven:

Ability to think independently, provide improvement ideas, and contribute strategically rather than only executing instructions.



Language:

Fluent in English, both written and spoken.



What We Offer:



A high-performance remote working environment with a team of experienced funnel builders.

Competitive base compensation combined with a performance-based bonus system, where builders who consistently create winning funnels can earn substantial monthly bonuses.

The opportunity to significantly increase your earnings based on measurable performance and KPI achievement.

A collaborative environment where funnel builders continuously learn from each other and improve together.

Long-term growth opportunities within a rapidly scaling e-commerce organization.

title: Accounting Coordinator / Accounts Payable & Receivable Specialist
description:
Moe‚Äôs Group is HIRING an Accounting Assistant / Bookkeeper!



Only submissions through this form will be considered.



We‚Äôre looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Accounting Assistant / Bookkeeper to support our daily financial operations. The ideal candidate has hands-on experience managing payables and receivables, maintaining accurate financial records, and working with accounting and e-commerce platforms. This role is essential in ensuring organized, compliant, and efficient accounting processes.



About Us:



Moe‚Äôs Group is a global leader in skincare manufacturing, trusted by over 100 international brands. We combine innovation, quality, and a personalized approach to help businesses scale and succeed in competitive markets. From manufacturing to brand strategy, our end-to-end services are designed to exceed expectations, backed by a team committed to customer satisfaction and long-term success. At Moe‚Äôs Group, we don‚Äôt just support brands‚Äîwe empower them to lead.



What you‚Äôll do:



-Manage accounts payable, including processing vendor invoices and payments

-Handle accounts receivable, including invoicing, payment tracking, and follow-ups

-Maintain accurate vendor and client financial records

-Assist with account reconciliations and reporting support

-Ensure proper documentation and organized filing of all accounting records

-Support financial reporting and month-end closing tasks

-Coordinate accounting data from e-commerce and ERP platforms (Amazon, Shopify, Odoo, Wix)



What we‚Äôre looking for:



-2‚Äì4 years of accounting or bookkeeping experience

-Proficient in QuickBooks (highly required)

-Working knowledge of Amazon, Shopify, Odoo, and Wix platforms

-Experience reconciling e-commerce transactions and payment gateways is a plus

-Strong organizational and time-management skills

-High level of accuracy and attention to detail

-Reliable, trustworthy, and able to handle confidential information

-Good communication skills



Why join us?



-100% remote work opportunity

-Long-term stable job with significant room for professional growth

-Fixed weekends off

-All necessary tools, courses, and subscriptions provided



Learn more about our company by visiting our website: 

For the latest updates and opportunities, follow us on LinkedIn: www.
/company/moesgroup

title: Creative Specialist
description:
Creative Specialist (E-commerce) ‚Äì Performance Ads



We are looking for a Creative Specialist for our growing e-commerce brand.



Your main responsibility is creating high-converting video and image advertisements based on provided competitor ads and product materials. This is not a research role ‚Äî all source material is provided.



We are looking for someone creative, detail-oriented, and commercially minded.

Video Advertisements:



- Remove competitor branding and text from provided ads

- Translate videos into Dutch

- Add subtitles and style them consistently

- Ensure clean, professional, conversion-focused edits

- Replace removed segments smoothly using other video fragments

- Deliver multiple ad variations per product



Image Advertisements:



- Edit competitor image ads into localized Dutch versions

- Remove competitor product names

- Apply our brand style and colors consistently

- Create new product visuals that clearly show the product or how it solves a problem



Your goal is simple:

Create ads that look professional, trustworthy, and designed to convert.



What We Expect:



- Strong attention to detail

- Ability to follow instructions precisely

- Consistent output quality

- Understanding of what makes ads convert

- Independent working style

- Meeting deadlines



This is a long-term position with growth potential.

To make sure you actually read this job post:

- Short introduction

- Relevant experience

- Examples of ad creatives (if available)

- Your availability

title: CONTENT ADMIN AND GROWTH ASSISTANT (Fitness Brand | Remote) Part-Time, LONG TERM EMPLOYMENT | 5-8 hrs/wk | $30 CAD/wk
description:
Focus: Scheduling, organization, and community engagement through Automation.



CONTENT ADMIN AND GROWTH ASSISTANT (Fitness Brand | Remote)

Part-Time  | LONG TERM EMPLOYMENT | 5-8 hrs/week | ~$30 CAD/week + Performance Bonuses



We need an organized, reliable engine to manage our content ecosystem. You are the bridge between the finished video and our growing community.



WHAT YOU WILL OWN



-- Distribution: Scheduling all content across Instagram, YouTube, and our Fitness app.

-- Channel Management: Writing engaging captions, managing hashtags, and tracking basic analytics.

-- Community Support: Monitoring comments, filtering DMs, and engaging with the audience to boost the algorithm.

-- Workflow Automation: Connecting our CRM (or Lead forms) to Slack/Email using Zapier, Make, or native integrations.

-- Data and Excel: Maintaining tracking sheets, cleaning lead lists, and using formulas to report on weekly performance.

-- Systems and Backend: Organizing the cloud library and keeping the Trello content calendar updated.

-- AI Support: Using ChatGPT for caption variations and scheduling automation.

-- Minor content editing: Adding watermarks, doing small video cuts, etc.



TOOLS YOU WILL USE



-- Scheduling: Buffer / Metricool

-- AI: ChatGPT / Claude

-- Internal Management: Trello, Slack, Google Suite (Excel / Google Sheets)

-- Fitness Management: Everfit

-- Social Media: Instagram / YouTube

-- Automation: Zapier

--Video editing tools: Capcut, Premiere Pro, etc.

*You don't need to know all of these tools but the ability to learn new tools easily



HOW TO APPLY



1-At the top of your application, type: ADMIN.

2-Briefly describe an automation you have built (e.g., Connected X to Y via Zapier).

3-Rate your Excel skills from 1-10.

title: UX/UI Designer (Figma) ‚Äî Polish & unify an existing product
description:
Lunchkompis is a live, working web product. We‚Äôre not starting from zero ‚Äî we need a sharp UX/UI designer to make the experience tighter, more consistent, and more premium across the product.

Audit the current UX/UI and identify the biggest friction + inconsistency points

Improve layout, spacing, typography, hierarchy, and overall ‚Äúfeel‚Äù

Create/clean up a small design system (colors, type scale, spacing, components)

Redesign key flows/pages (web + responsive) with clear UX reasoning

Deliver dev-ready designs in Figma (components, variants, specs, handoff notes)

What ‚Äúdone‚Äù looks like (deliverables)

UX/UI audit + prioritized list of changes (quick wins + bigger improvements)

Updated high-fidelity screens for the agreed scope

A consistent component set (buttons, inputs, cards, tables, nav, states)

Responsive behavior defined (mobile/tablet/desktop)

Optional: basic accessibility pass (contrast, states, keyboard focus)

You‚Äôre a fit if you

Have strong visual UI craft (spacing, typography, consistency)

Can do practical UX improvements (not just ‚Äúpretty screens‚Äù)

Work fast, communicate clearly, and can iterate based on feedback

Use Figma professionally (auto layout, components, variants)

Nice to have

Experience with design systems / component libraries

Experience designing dashboards / admin interfaces

Understanding of dev handoff constraints (web, components)

Engagement

We‚Äôre open to freelance or part-time. Start with a small scoped phase, then expand if it‚Äôs a good match.

How to apply

Send:

Portfolio (2‚Äì4 relevant projects)

A short note: what you‚Äôd improve first in a UX/UI polish project

title: Parking Operation Manager
description:
PARKING OPERATIONS MANAGER



Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full-Time



ABOUT VERTEX FLEET



Vertex Fleet is a leading national truck parking and real estate network, specializing in outdoor industrial storage (IOS). We address the critical truck parking shortage across the United States by offering secure, accessible, and strategically located parking solutions for the freight and logistics industry. With an aggressive expansion strategy targeting 100 locations nationwide, Vertex Fleet is revolutionizing the IOS and fleet parking industry through cutting-edge technology, innovative business practices, and unparalleled customer service.



Our facilities provide 24/7 security, commercial-grade lighting, perimeter fencing, and convenient access to major transportation arteries, serving trucking companies, drivers, and fleet managers across the country.



POSITION OVERVIEW



We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Parking Operations Manager to join our rapidly growing team in a fully remote capacity. This role is pivotal to our national expansion, combining business development, partnership management, operational oversight, and team development. The ideal candidate will excel at building relationships with facility owners, promoting our innovative parking platform system, supporting B2B sales efforts, and elevating our team's operational excellence and customer service capabilities.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



Real Estate Partnership Development

‚Ä¢ Build and cultivate strong relationships with industrial outdoor storage property owners and real estate partners nationwide

‚Ä¢ Identify and pursue opportunities to acquire or lease new IOS locations to support our 100-location expansion goal

‚Ä¢ Negotiate partnership agreements, lease terms, and acquisition deals



B2B Sales & Customer Support

‚Ä¢ Assist team members in preparing accurate and competitive quotations for B2B customers (trucking companies, fleet managers, logistics operations)

‚Ä¢ Review pricing proposals to ensure alignment with company standards and market positioning

‚Ä¢ Support the sales process for daily, monthly, and long-term parking contracts

‚Ä¢ Maintain detailed records of B2B customer interactions, requirements, and contract terms

‚Ä¢ Develop strategies to convert leads into long-term fleet partnerships



Daily Operations Management & Oversight

‚Ä¢ Manage remote employees responsible for monitoring parking space occupancy across multiple locations

‚Ä¢ Ensure accurate, real-time tracking of occupied spaces and available capacity at all facilities

‚Ä¢ Implement efficient processes and systems for daily operational tasks and reporting

‚Ä¢ Monitor key performance indicators including occupancy rates, utilization, and revenue metrics

‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot operational issues and implement corrective actions swiftly

‚Ä¢ Coordinate with on-site managers at various Vertex Fleet locations

‚Ä¢ Ensure compliance with security protocols and facility standards across all sites



Team Development & Customer Service Excellence

‚Ä¢ Provide comprehensive customer service training to all team members

‚Ä¢ Develop and deliver training programs specifically designed to improve employees' communication and speaking skills

‚Ä¢ Create training materials, scripts, and standard operating procedures for customer interactions

‚Ä¢ Conduct regular coaching sessions and role-playing exercises to enhance service quality

‚Ä¢ Evaluate employee performance through call monitoring, metrics review, and constructive feedback

‚Ä¢ Foster a culture of exceptional customer service that reflects Vertex Fleet's commitment to the trucking industry

‚Ä¢ Implement continuous improvement initiatives to elevate team performance



Technology & Platform Management

‚Ä¢ Utilize and optimize Vertex Fleet's proprietary parking platform system

‚Ä¢ Ensure team members are proficient in using technology tools for reservations, tracking, and reporting

‚Ä¢ Provide feedback to leadership on platform improvements and operational efficiency enhancements

‚Ä¢ Support the implementation of innovative technology solutions in line with company goals



REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS



‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, Real Estate, Logistics, or related field (or equivalent experience)

‚Ä¢ Minimum 3-5 years of experience in operations management, preferably in parking, logistics, transportation, real estate, or property management

‚Ä¢ Proven track record in business development, relationship building, and partnership management

‚Ä¢ Strong experience in B2B customer service and sales support

‚Ä¢ Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to train others effectively

‚Ä¢ Demonstrated ability to manage remote teams and coordinate across multiple locations

‚Ä¢ Proficiency in CRM systems, property management software, and operational platforms

‚Ä¢ Strong organizational skills with exceptional attention to detail

‚Ä¢ Self-motivated and able to work independently in a remote environment

‚Ä¢ Comfortable with technology and learning new platforms quickly



PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS



‚Ä¢ Experience in the trucking, logistics, or freight industry

‚Ä¢ Background in industrial outdoor storage, fleet management, or truck parking operations

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of the commercial real estate market and lease negotiations

‚Ä¢ Experience with training and development or adult education methodologies

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with parking management systems or reservation platforms

‚Ä¢ Understanding of the truck parking crisis and industry challenges

‚Ä¢ Bilingual (English/Spanish) is a plus



KEY COMPETENCIES



‚Ä¢ Relationship Building: Natural ability to establish trust with property owners, partners, and industry stakeholders

‚Ä¢ Sales Acumen: Understanding of B2B sales cycles and value-based selling

‚Ä¢ Operational Excellence: Commitment to efficiency, accuracy, and continuous improvement

‚Ä¢ Training & Coaching: Skill in developing others and improving team performance

‚Ä¢ Communication: Exceptional speaking, presentation, and interpersonal abilities

‚Ä¢ Problem-Solving: Quick thinking and effective resolution of operational challenges

‚Ä¢ Industry Knowledge: Understanding of trucking, logistics, and fleet operations

‚Ä¢ Technology Proficiency: Comfortable with multiple software platforms and digital tools

‚Ä¢ Remote Work Success: Highly organized, self-directed, and results-focused

‚Ä¢ Customer-Centric: Deep commitment to exceptional service for drivers and fleet managers



PERFORMANCE METRICS



‚Ä¢ Successfully onboard new real estate partners and IOS locations

‚Ä¢ Achieve occupancy and utilization targets across managed facilities

‚Ä¢ Maintain high customer satisfaction scores from B2B fleet partners

‚Ä¢ Ensure accuracy in space availability reporting (minimal discrepancies)

‚Ä¢ Demonstrate measurable improvement in team communication and customer service scores

‚Ä¢ Meet business development targets for partnership acquisitions and platform promotion

‚Ä¢ Reduce operational issues and increase efficiency metrics



WHAT WE OFFER



‚Ä¢ Fully remote work environment with flexibility

‚Ä¢ Competitive salary commensurate with experience

‚Ä¢ Performance-based incentives and bonuses

‚Ä¢ Comprehensive benefits package

‚Ä¢ Professional development and growth opportunities

‚Ä¢ Be part of a rapidly expanding company revolutionizing the truck parking industry

‚Ä¢ Opportunity to make a significant impact on solving America's truck parking crisis

‚Ä¢ Collaborative, innovative, and mission-driven team culture

‚Ä¢ Direct involvement in a high-growth phase of the company's national expansion



WHY JOIN VERTEX FLEET?



At Vertex Fleet, you'll be joining a company at the forefront of solving one of the trucking industry's most critical challenges. We're not just managing parking lots‚Äîwe're building a nationwide network that keeps America's supply chain moving. With our commitment to innovation, technology, and exceptional service, you'll have the opportunity to shape the future of the IOS and fleet parking industry while growing your career with a dynamic, mission-driven organization.



TO APPLY



Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience in:

‚Ä¢ Building business relationships and partnerships

‚Ä¢ Operations management across multiple locations

‚Ä¢ Training and developing high-performing teams

‚Ä¢ Supporting the trucking, logistics, or transportation industry



Vertex Fleet is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We encourage applications from all qualified candidates regardless of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, or any other protected characteristic.



Join us in revolutionizing truck parking and supporting the backbone of America's economy‚Äîthe trucking industry.

---

The most valuable traits for this role are:

Because campaigns move fast,  someone who:

title: Data Entry Virtual Assistant (SaaS Platform) ‚Äî Excel + Pivot Tables + METRC Experience
description:
Position: Virtual Assistant (Data Entry / SaaS Operations Support)

Location: Remote (Philippines preferred ‚Äî OnlineJobs.ph)

Hours: Full-time, 40 hours/week

Coverage Window: Monday‚ÄìSaturday, 6:30 AM‚Äì7:30 PM Pacific Time (team-based shift coverage)

Shift Model: You‚Äôll be assigned a consistent shift within the coverage window and coordinate handoffs with the team

Pay: $[4.50/hr] (more based on experience) + paid interview (includes Excel/pivot exercise)



About the Role



We‚Äôre hiring a detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support data entry and data quality tasks inside our SaaS platform. You‚Äôll join an experienced operations team that‚Äôs been doing this work for 3 years, with defined SOPs, QA checks, and shift handoffs to maintain coverage throughout the day.



This role requires strong Excel skills (including pivot tables) and comfort working in structured workflows. METRC experience is a major plus‚Äîideal candidates can demonstrate familiarity with the platform and provide proof of credentials (details below).



Responsibilities



Enter and maintain accurate records in our SaaS platform



Validate data quality: completeness, formatting, duplicates, and exceptions



Use Excel daily for cleaning and preparation (filters, sorting, text functions, data validation, basic formulas)



Build pivot tables to summarize datasets and support QA (counts, totals, grouping, segmentation)



Follow documented SOPs and naming conventions precisely



Maintain clear shift notes and handoff summaries to the next tea
mber



Flag anomalies and edge cases promptly with clear context/screenshots



Requirements (Must-Have)



Excel proficiency, including pivot tables (you will demonstrate this during a paid interview)



Proven accuracy with repetitive, detail-heavy work



Strong written English and ability to follow instructions exactly



Reliable internet and consistent availability for a set schedule within the coverage window



Comfortable working in web apps (SaaS tools, dashboards, Google Drive)



Strong Preference / Bonus



METRC experience (cannabis track-and-trace)



Ability to show METRC credentials or verifiable experience (see note below)



Prior experience with CRM/ERP-like systems, data cleanup, and record reconciliation



Familiarity with CSV import/export workflows and data normalization



Paid Interview Skill Check (Excel)



During the paid interview, you will:



Open a provided dataset



Build a pivot table to answer specific questions (e.g., totals by category, counts by status, grouping by date)



Share your screen and explain your approach briefly



METRC Credentials (Verification)



If you have METRC experience, include one of the following:



A screenshot showing your name/email in a METRC-related user/account context with sensitive details redacted



A brief description of your METRC role (facility type, tasks performed, duration, state)



Any training/certification or proof of access you can share safely



(Do not send API keys, passwords, or any sensitive login details.)



How to Apply (Required)



Please reply with:



Full name + location (city/province)



Availability: confirm you can work 40 hrs/week and specify your preferred shift hours in Pacific Time



Excel skill level (beginner/intermediate/advanced) + 1‚Äì2 examples of pivot tables you‚Äôve built



METRC experience: yes/no. If yes, describe your experience and include your verification method (redacted screenshot or details)



Typing speed (WPM) + internet speed test result (screenshot ok)



Answer these questions:



What‚Äôs the difference between a pivot table and a normal filtered table?



When a pivot table shows wrong totals, what are two things you check first?



Subject line: VA Data Entry + Excel Pivot + METRC ‚Äì [Your Name]



What Success Looks Like (First 30 Days)



You can complete data entry tasks with minimal errors and follow SOPs reliably



You consistently produce clean handoffs between shifts



You can identify patterns, duplicates, and anomalies before they become downstream issues

title: Cold-Calling Appointment Setter ‚Äì Australian Trade Businesses IMMEDIATE START
description:
Job Title: Cold-Calling Appointment Setter ‚Äì Australian Trade Businesses



Job Type: Remote / Performance-Based



About Us: We help Australian trade businesses (plumbers, electricians, builders, carpenters, and more) grow by generating high-quality, qualified leads and converting them into paying clients. We‚Äôre looking for a motivated cold-calling appointment setter based in the Philippines to contact Australian businesses and schedule qualified appointments for our sales team.



Role Overview:

As a Cold-Calling Appointment Setter, you will:

Make outbound cold calls to Australian trade businesses during Australian business hours (8:30?AM ‚Äì 5:00?PM AEST / 6:30?AM ‚Äì 3:00?PM PHT).

Prospect and qualify businesses to ensure they are decision-makers and suitable clients.

Schedule appointments for the sales team ‚Äî target: 40 booked appointments per month.

Follow up to confirm appointments and maintain accurate CRM records.

Maintain high-quality standards ‚Äî only qualified appointments count for payment.



Requirements:

Excellent English communication skills (spoken English must be clear and professional for Australian clients).

Confident, persuasive, and resilient to cold-call rejection.

Experience in cold calling, appointment setting, or B2B sales preferred.

Must be able to work Australian business hours (8:30?AM ‚Äì 5:00?PM AEST / 6:30?AM ‚Äì 3:00?PM PHT).

Understanding of Australian business culture is a plus.

Self-motivated, results-driven, and comfortable with a performance-based pay structure.



Compensation:

$15 AUD per booked appointment (must be a qualified prospect and show up).

$25 AUD bonus if the appointment converts into a paying client.

Performance-based payouts fortnightly.



Earnings are uncapped ‚Äî top performers can earn significantly more.



Example potential monthly earnings (high performer):

40 booked appointments/month ? $600 AUD

15 of those convert ? $375 AUD bonus

Total monthly: $975 AUD (with potential to earn more as performance increases)



Why Join Us:

Work remotely from anywhere in the Philippines.

Flexible schedule aligned with Australian business hours.

High earning potential based purely on performance.

Training provided for prospecting, qualifying, and scheduling appointments with Australian trade businesses.

title: Notion Consultant
description:
JOB OVERVIEW



We're hiring a skilled Notion consultant to conduct 30-minute client sessions for business owners and teams in North America. This is a professional, client-facing role where you'll help people build better systems inside Notion.



You'll work directly with English-speaking clients via video calls, guiding them through setup, solving problems live, and taking occasional 1:1 coaching calls.



This is a part-time role with flexible scheduling. After onboarding and training, you set your own schedule and adjust hours based on your preferences. Notion provides client referrals - there's steady work for those who want it.



WHO WE ARE



JRCMiller is a service-based business led by Jordan Ray C. Miller, a Notion Ambassador and business advisor. We're subcontracted with Notion to host 30-minute sessions for new users and Ambassador events. We're hiring 1-2 consultants now with plans to grow to ~5 over the next year.



WHAT YOU'LL DO



- Run 30-minute Notion setup sessions with clients via Zoom or Google Meet

- Help users improve dashboards, databases, workflows, and systems based on their needs

- Ask thoughtful questions to understand client situations and recommend practical solutions

- Send pre-written follow-up
s after sessions

- Maintain light documentation for team follow-up

- Take occasional 1:1 coaching calls and service referrals when opportunities arise



REQUIREMENTS



- Strong Notion expertise across databases, relations, formulas, views, and dashboards

- Excellent English in both written and spoken communication - you'll be leading client calls

- Comfortable with client-facing video calls and live problem-solving

- Available for 1-2 hours per week during US business hours (8 AM - 5 PM EST). You can schedule the remaining 4-7 hours per day at times that work for you.

- Reliable internet, quiet workspace, and professional communication



COMPENSATION



- $15/hour for client sessions

- $60/hour for 1:1 coaching calls

- 10% commission on service referrals



Expected minimum income: $1,800-$2,400/month

(based on $15/hour at 6-8 hours/day - excluding 1:1 coaching calls and commissions)





HOW TO APPLY



1. Send us your resume or Notion Portfolio

2. Tell us how long you've used Notion and why this job interests you.





We review applications as they come in, If selected, you'll be invited to an interview.

We are looking for an experienced bookkeeper who is not afraid to learn new things daily, for our E-commerce business. This is a high-growth position. You must be a self-starter and love to learn new things!



As a bookkeeper, the ideal candidate is highly driven, enjoys working with numbers, has attention to detail, and is familiar with Amazon Seller Central and other online marketplaces. This individual will be the primary point of contact for our bookkeeping. The candidate should be experienced and know how to set up QuickBooks. The ideal candidate must have previously successfully delivered P&L reports to the accountant. You may also be required to learn other e-commerce-related skills to fit in with our existing operations. You must be a leader, reliable, communicative, and willing to learn.



If you would like to apply, please answer the questions below and send them to 
 upload your resume to the following link: 









Also, let us know the following answers:



1. How many years of bookkeeping experience do you have?



2. What bookkeeping software do you use, ie. Quickbooks?



NOTE: Failure to follow the exact instructions in your responses will immediately disqualify you. You will NOT be considered if you do not follow the instructions and send back your reply listed herein.



Duties & Responsibilities:

-Reconciliation

-Entering bills

-Paying bills

-Expenses

-Credit card usage

-Bank statements

-Balancing checks

-Amazon reports

-Profit and Loss reports

-Monthly balance sheet

-Making sure all finances are up to date

-Setting up and entering everything into QuickBooks

When applying for the position, please include QuickBooks in the title.



This position is full-time. However, initial training may be part-time only to get new hires up to speed.



*****DO NOT apply if you cannot fulfill the job requirements OR are not detail-oriented ****
salary: Up to 150,000 php or depends on your ...

title: Fundraising & Grants Coordinator
description:
Experience & Skills

Minimum 2 years of nonprofit fundraising or development experience

Proven grant writing experience with successful applications (government and/or foundation grants)

Proficiency with donor CRM/database systems (Bloomerang, DonorPerfect, Little Green Light, Salesforce, or similar)

Strong writing skills with ability to craft compelling narratives and persuasive proposals

Excellent research skills and ability to identify funding opportunities from multiple sources

High level of organization and attention to detail, especially with deadlines and compliance requirements

Self-directed work style with ability to manage multiple projects independently

Technical Proficiencies

Google Workspace (Gmail, Docs, Sheets, Drive) and/or Microsoft Office Suite

Donor CRM platforms

 marketing platforms (MailChimp, Constant Contact, or similar)

Grant databases and research tools

Personal Attributes

Passion for social justice, criminal justice reform, and community healing

Cultural competency and understanding of issues affecting law enforcement and urban communities

Strong interpersonal skills and ability to build relationships with diverse stakeholders

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

Certification in grant writing (GPC) or fundraising (CFRE)

Experience with Instrumentl, GrantStation, or similar grant research platforms

title: SHORT FORM VIDEO EDITOR | Flexible Work Schedule
description:
We‚Äôre hiring someone who knows how to turn long-form content into sharp, high-retention short videos for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



This role is for someone who understands pacing, hooks, and visual rhythm in short-form content, and knows how to edit with intention rather than just cutting clips.



‚Äî-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those ‚Äúmagic 
nts‚Äù where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does‚Äîevery time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just cutting together videos for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you have strong creative instincts and know how to spot 
nts that make people stop scrolling? Are you proactive, adaptable, and detail-oriented? Do you have a sharp sense of pacing, an instinct for hooks, and a clear understanding of how short-form videos need to flow to hold attention? Do you take pride in clean edits and delivering videos that feel intentional and finished? Do our core values sound like a fit for who you are?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Short-Form Editing & Story Selection

- Review long-form videos, transcripts, or raw footage to identify short-form clip opportunities

- Select 
nts that are clear, engaging, and platform-appropriate

- Edit vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts

- Create strong hooks, clean cuts, and natural pacing

- Deliver publish-ready videos that meet brand and platform standards



Captions, Visuals & Formatting

- Add on-screen captions (burned-in or SRT as required) with proper timing and readability

- Apply basic motion, zooms, punch-ins, and visual emphasis where appropriate

- Follow platform-specific formatting (aspect ratio, duration, safe margins)



Iteration & Workflow

- Implement feedback efficiently and meet agreed turnaround times

- Maintain clear file naming and folder organization

- Track edits, revisions, and delivery status as required



Requirements:

- A STABLE, HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION, REQUIRED (at least 150mbps)

- Experience with Final Cut Pro X (or other editing software, such as Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro) is required

- Strong preference for MacOS users

- Experience editing short-form vertical content for social platforms, required

- Strong understanding of short-form pacing, hooks, and retention

- Experience working from transcripts or long-form content, required

- Clean file organization and understanding of post-production workflo

- Portfolio of completed short-form video projects, required

- General understanding of brand, content marketing, YouTube, etc, required

- GREAT interpersonal and communication skills, required

- Ability to self-start, work on a tight schedule, and manage multiple project deadlines, required

- Ability to follow directions and a LOVE of completing lots of projects according to consistent specifications, required

- Growth mindset, required



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.


 



STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to participate in two PAID test projects, $10-20 USD for each test project estimated to be 2-3hrs of work for each (a total of $40 USD!).



STEP 3:

Candidates who advance through the test project rounds will be invited to an interview.



STEP 4:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 5:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Video Editor with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your video editing expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

title: English & Chinese-Speaking Virtual Assistant (WhatsApp Support) ‚Äì Light Workload, Per-Booking Pay
description:
We are a growing home-service massage platform. Our therapists travel directly to customers‚Äô homes or hotels.



We are looking for a reliable Virtual Assistant who can speak and write both English and Chinese (Mandarin) to manage simple customer communication via WhatsApp and connect customers with available therapists.



This role has a very light active workload. Most of the time, you only need to stay available and respond quickly when a new message comes in.



Main Responsibilities



Your job is very simple:



‚Ä¢ Reply to customers on WhatsApp

‚Ä¢ Communicate in English and Chinese (Mandarin)

‚Ä¢ Ask for basic booking details (location, time, service)

‚Ä¢ Post the request in the therapist group

‚Ä¢ Connect the customer and the therapist

‚Ä¢ After that, they handle everything directly



Each booking usually takes 2‚Äì3 minutes of active work.



Phone Calls



Sometimes customers may call instead of texting.



You should:

‚Ä¢ Answer the call if possible

‚Ä¢ Speak simple, friendly English or Chinese

‚Ä¢ Explain that we are a booking platform

‚Ä¢ Tell them you will connect them with a therapist



No complex sales or long calls required.



Work Setup



‚Ä¢ 40 hours per week

‚Ä¢ Fixed shifts assigned by us

‚Ä¢ During your shift:



Keep WhatsApp open



Respond within a few seconds to 1‚Äì2 minutes

‚Ä¢ You can do other work during your shift as long as you stay responsive



This role is mostly about availability, not constant active work.



Payment



‚Ä¢ $1 per confirmed booking

‚Ä¢ Each booking takes only a few minutes

‚Ä¢ The more bookings we get, the more you earn



Example:

‚Ä¢ 5 bookings per day ? $150/month

‚Ä¢ 10 bookings per day ? $300/month

‚Ä¢ 20 bookings per day ? $600/month



As the business grows, your income grows as well.



Test Phase (Important)



This is an initial test phase that can start immediately (as early as tomorrow).



During this phase, we evaluate:

‚Ä¢ Response speed

‚Ä¢ Communication quality

‚Ä¢ Reliability

‚Ä¢ Efficiency



After the test phase, this role can turn into:

‚Ä¢ A hybrid model (salary + bonus), or

‚Ä¢ A full-time fixed salary position



Required Skills



Language (Required):

‚Ä¢ Good English (written and spoken)

‚Ä¢ Chinese (Mandarin) ‚Äì required



Other:

‚Ä¢ Reliable internet connection

‚Ä¢ Comfortable using WhatsApp daily

‚Ä¢ Fast response time

‚Ä¢ Responsible and dependable



Application Instructions (Important)



Clearly state your Chinese (Mandarin) level.

Applications without this will be rejected.



Confirm you are comfortable with:



$1 per booking payment



availability-based work



Write a short reply to this message:



English:

‚ÄúHi, I‚Äôd like to book a massage for tonight. Are you available?‚Äù



Chinese:

‚Äú?????????????????‚Äù

title: Affiliate & UGC Content Manager (with experience)
description:
You Knead Sourdough

Direct Hire | Remote | Philippines preferred

Contractor - keeping Australian Work hours alongside our team.

40 Hours per week.

$2000 AUD per month





We‚Äôre looking for an experienced Affiliate & UGC Content Manager to own and grow our creator, affiliate, and paid partnership program for You Knead Sourdough in AU, UK, NZ and Beyond!



This is not a junior coordination role. We need someone who understands what good Meta ads content actually looks like, how creator content needs to be captured technically, and how to turn that content into approved, ready to run paid partnership ads inside Meta Ads Manager.



You‚Äôll bring your own systems, structure, and experience, and work closely with our marketing team to make sure creator content supports both our organic and paid content strategy.



What you‚Äôll be responsible for:



Affiliate & Creator Program Management

- Recruit, onboard, and manage multiple UGC creators and affiliates at once

- Build and improve our affiliate and UGC program over time

- Maintain strong, long term relationships with creators through clear communication and support

- Provide constructive, brand aligned feedback to creators so content is commercially useful without micromanaging



UGC & Paid Partnership Content

- Brief creators on exactly what content is needed for Meta ads, including format, hooks, framing, and technical requirements

- Ensure content is captured correctly for use as paid partnership ads and whitelisted reels

- Collect, organise, and store all creator content and usage rights

- Push approved creator content into draft Meta ad campaigns for internal review and approval

- Work with the marketing team to align creator content with our content calendar where required



Contracts & Usage Rights

- Manage creator and affiliate contracts, including content usage rights and international creators

- Ensure we have clear permission to use creator content across paid and organic channels

- Build and maintain simple, scalable contract structures



Other tasks - Operations & Admin

- Coordinate product shipments to creators and track content delivery

- Pay creator and affiliate invoices

- Manage affiliate payments and basic accounts inbox tasks

- Update tracking spreadsheets and reporting

- Monitor 3pl accounts and related payments





Collaboration

- Work closely with the marketing team to support campaigns and launches

- Assist with other marketing tasks when required



What we‚Äôre looking for

- At least 2-3 years experienced on the field

- Proven experience managing UGC creators and affiliates for eCommerce brands

- Strong understanding of Meta ads content, paid partnership ads, and Ads Manager workflows

- Confident managing multiple creator relationships at once

- Comfortable giving clear, constructive feedback to creators

- Highly organised, proactive, and systems driven

- Experience handling light finance and admin tasks

- Ideally has existing UGC or affiliate contacts

- Professional, kind, and relationship focused communication style



How to apply: Reply to this job ad with the subject line, Affiliate & UGC Content Manager (with [Number] experience)



Example: Affiliate & UGC Content Manager (with 4 years experience)





Bonus points

- Experience working with international creators

- Experience in food, lifestyle, or education based brands

- Familiarity with Shopify, Meta Ads Manager, and affiliate platforms

title: AI Video Ads Editor ‚Äî Viral ‚ÄúTalking Characters‚Äù + Doctor/Nurse UGC (1‚Äì2 min)
description:
I need a video editor/creator who can produce 1‚Äì2 minute AI-style viral ads (UGC + animation) where talking fruits / body parts explain benefits in a funny, punchy way ‚Äî plus AI nurse/doctor avatar videos that explain our product benefits clearly.



Deliverables

 ‚Ä¢ 1‚Äì2 minute vertical videos (9:16) optimized for TikTok/IG Reels

 ‚Ä¢ Hook in first 1‚Äì2 seconds, fast pacing, pattern interrupts

 ‚Ä¢ Captions/subtitles baked in (viral style)

 ‚Ä¢ 2‚Äì5 variants per concept (different hooks/edits)



Styles we‚Äôll run

 ‚Ä¢ Talking fruits: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm a blueberry‚Äîhere‚Äôs what I do for your skin/brain/etc.‚Äù

 ‚Ä¢ Talking organs/body parts: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm your liver‚Äîstop doing this, do this instead.‚Äù

 ‚Ä¢ AI nurse/doctor UGC: professional, confident delivery explaining product benefits (scripted, punchy, not boring)



What you‚Äôll do

 ‚Ä¢ Write/shape the script (or improve mine), then produce final edit

 ‚Ä¢ Generate/animate characters using AI tools (your stack is fine)

 ‚Ä¢ Create AI nurse/doctor avatars (face + voice) for benefit-driven segments

 ‚Ä¢ Add voice (AI voice is ok), SFX, music, memes, b-roll, transitions

 ‚Ä¢ Deliver final exports ready to post (+ editable files if requested)



Requirements

 ‚Ä¢ Proven experience making viral short-form ads (TikTok/Reels)

 ‚Ä¢ Strong comedic timing + pacing + retention editing

 ‚Ä¢ Can make AI characters/avatars that look clean + believable (not cheap)

 ‚Ä¢ Fast communication + iteration



Nice to have

 ‚Ä¢ Direct response marketing instincts (CTR/retention-focused)

 ‚Ä¢ Can A/B test hooks and produce cutdowns quickly



To apply

Send:

 1. 3‚Äì5 examples of similar work (talking character + AI avatar style)

 2. Your AI tool stack (avatar + voice + editing)

 3. Rate per finished video + per extra variant

 4. Turnaround time for the first draft



Ongoing work

If you nail the first one, I‚Äôll keep you on weekly volume.

title: Customer & Admin-Focused Virtual Assistant
description:
Schedule: Day Shift | 8 hours/day 

Rate: P50,000/month 



PLEASE READ THROUGH THE WHOLE POST



Our client is a New South Wales-based electrical services firm expanding rapidly into the solar and battery installation sector. We are looking for a dedicated Full-Time Customer-Focused Admin Assistant to join our team and help streamline our operations.



Tasks and Responsibilities



Solar & Technical Administration

- Utilize solar and battery design software to assist in job preparations.

- Manage and submit Grid Applications via the Essential Energy portal (NSW Distribution Network).

- Coordinate technical data between design platforms and energy retailers/distributors.



Job & Lead Management

- Manage incoming leads and customer data within the CRM.

- Convert voice recordings (Whisper Memos) into accurate job notes and descriptions.

- Schedule site works and coordinate appointments with both clients and subcontractors.



Financial & Compliance Admin

- Execute daily invoicing and track billable hours and materials.

- Follow up on overdue payments and act as a liaison for the company bookkeeper.

- Manage and generate SWMS (Safe Work Method Statements) and other WHS compliance documentation.



Tech Stack



The successful candidate will work with the following tools:



- Job Management: Simpro

- CRM: Trade.ai

- Solar Design: Pylon

- Financials: Xero

- Grid Portal: Essential Energy

- Productivity: Whisper Memos (Voice-to-Text), Loom (SOP Videos)





Qualifications



- Technical Proficiency: Familiarity with Australian energy distribution networks (specifically Essential Energy) and trade management systems like Simpro.

- Software Literacy: Experience or a high aptitude for learning solar design software (e.g., Pylon) and CRM platforms (e.g., Trade.ai).

- Administrative Skills: Ability to synthesize raw voice-to-text data into professional notes and maintain meticulous documentation (SOPs, SWMS).

- Communication: A confident phone manner for appointment setting and lead follow-up.

- Proactivity: A growth mindset with the ability to identify and automate admin-heavy tasks.

- Detail-Oriented: Meticulous data entry skills to ensure accurate profit margins on battery installs.



The Perks

- Philhealth contribution of P1200 per 6 months

- Birthday Gift Allowance P1,000

- Annual Leave Allowance (10 Days)

- Personal Leave Allowance (5 Days)

- Public holidays annually (10 Days)

- Comprehensive training materials and documented processes

- Work with high-profile clients and prestigious brands

title: SEO Content Writer
description:

You'll create optimized blog posts, service pages, and website content designed to drive organic traffic and generate leads for our contractor clients. Your content will target homeowners searching for remodeling services in specific geographic markets.

title: Awesome Listings Coordinator to Busy Real Estate Team (secure, long term position)!!!
description:
Listings Coordinator Job Post



Title: Awesome Listings Coordinator to Real Estate Team (secure, long term position)!!!

Type of Work: Full Time

Pay: TBD

ID Proof: 60



Skill Summary:

Coordination for our Real Estate Listings 

‚Ä¢ Tech skills - working with CRM (lofty for real estate agents) and local MLS software

‚Ä¢ People skills - working with real estate agents on our team and their clients

‚Ä¢ Organization skills



Description

Experience with Canadian or American Real Estate preferred but NOT necessary, we will train right the candidate.



We are looking for a full time employee, possibly two.



We are looking for an amazing Listings Coordinator! You will be doing a variety of tasks, almost all of which we have tutorials, videos, and coaching / training for you. Some tasks will include general virtual assistant tasks. The listings process is very detailed, sequential and precision is mandatory.



More than just a manager, we are looking for a new PARTNER to join our team. We need someone trust worthy, highly competent, quick thinker and very reliable. We are looking for someone to grow with our team and as we become more successful, you too will get a higher pay.



WATCH this Review of our current ROCKSTAR listings coordinator ‚Äì 



Also watch this REVIEW from another ROCKSTAR admin on our team - 



Your Top Tasks:



This role primarily deals with executing on our Listings Process for our agents and their clients. It requires communication with the agents and their clients, mainly via our CRM, docusign and
. But sometimes over the phone, so you will need some phone skills as well.



We call this the LISTINGS COORDINATOR role.



There is no experience necessary, we have a full training program for you as well as our current Listings Coordinator to help you every step of the way to get you up to speed. We have a handbook, videos, and 1 on 1 (or 2 on 1) training for this role. We do expect this person to learn quick, think for themselves, and not just take orders but to use their best judgement on executing action items. But at the same time use discretion to know what should require going to a superior to ask questions.



This role is perfect if you:

O Enjoy following detailed processes and procedures.

Your Top Tasks (we will train):



Communicating with agents and their clients through our CRM / Docusign /
 / Dropbox ‚Äì Following our strategies and systems step by step

o Messaging with agents about upcoming real estate listings we are going to be putting on the market. Adding market updates and reports to the clients portal /
s in our CRM (
)

o Ensure the agents information added is correct, message them asking for more if not.

o Compiling paperwork for listings, sending to clients, answering clients questions if necessary.

o Setting up stagers, photographers / videographers for taking photos and videos the listings.

o Sending various templated
s to clients in advance of the listing to get things prepared and manage clients expectations and educate them on our processes.

o Receiving photos / videos, preparing write up, and compiling the data for the listing creation in our local real estate board software.

o Adding social media posts to market the listings.

o Following our strategies and system step by step

o Setting up showing software based on clients requirements.  

o All the white staying on contact with the agent to ensure all goes as required.

o Communicating with me or our operations manager when issues arise with clients, or agents or 3rd party service providers.

o Trouble shooting as issues arise, for software, or 3rd party service providers, difficult clients etc.



Other:



o Website work, editing, updates, blog writing, minor seo.

o Feedback from showing agents on our listings, texting through our CRM, then compiling feedback to send to clients.

o Creating and sending our deal of the week
s to our larger database

o Creating and sending our
 newsletter

o Blog writing with AI help.

o Doing some basic SEO work that we will teach you on as well

o Repurposing the content for other things



We may put you through a course so you can be better educated on different software or marketing platforms. We are also open to buying courses for you to level up your skills and knowledge in marketing.



There will be a 3-month probation period from the time you start & if it‚Äôs the right fit you will be offered a full time salaried position with many benefits that is rare with an overseas company.



Pay: TBD, this will depend on your competency and level of skill and other people that apply to the job. Payment is once per month in Php via paypal. 



Working Hours: This will be discussed but at this point the plan would be to have you and another listings coordinator working side by side, but also with some staggered hours. Our listings go live mainly on Wednesdays and Thursdays. So Monday to Thursdays are usually the busiest time. You may work more on these days and less on other days of the week. You would likely be required to work from 8am to 6pm on those 4 days (Calgary, Alberta, Canada Mountain Time). But it is not always really busy, so a 10 hour day is only usually during our busy season from March to end of June. Also with two if you in the same position it will be rare that you will need to work days this long. The biggest part if being available during that time frame to work.





Perks:

*Flexible Vacation - We offer paid vacation once you officially become part of the team as a salaried partner.

*Opportunity to advance/get bonuses, if you do a good job I will give you a raise, bonuses, and if the right fit, let you lead our team of future assistants

*Outside of busy required times, your work hours / times can be very flexible.

*Opportunities for growth within our team.





About Me:

I own and run the Ben Sweet & Associates real estate team in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. We are a team of 15 realtors and 2 local admins and we‚Äôre now looking for two full-time Listings Coordinators. We are not just looking for coordinators, but partners we can depend on and relay on and build a trusting relationship with. We want you to stay with us for the long term and as we grow the team, you will be given more responsibilities and a larger pay. We are seeking someone who is loyal, coachable, and dedicated to everyone‚Äôs success. If you are into self-development and looking to continually grow, then you are already good in our books.



Most people on our team we trained from the ground up ‚Äì they had no real experience in their role. Experience is great, but what we hire for is character. If you are the right fit, we have no problems training someone with no experience.





Web: 



To Apply for the job:



1. My name is Ben Sweet. Write an
 to 
 the subject line to "I Want to Work for You Ben and [Insert the name of my current listings coordinator who was in the first video] ‚Äì Listings Coordinator"



2. At the top of your message write a minimum of 3-4 few sentences (but no more than 2 paragraphs) on why you would like this position, and why you are a good fit. Please do not write more than that or else your application will not be reviewed.



3. Take the DISC personality test. 
p   

Attach the results to this
 -> 
 as well.



4. Your Instagram Profile if you have one



5. Take this English test

o Go to: 
/test-your-english/business/

o Start a video of yourself or screen record starting at this page and say your name, the date, and the time

o Do the test and send me a link to the video.



6. What is the last book you finished reading?



7. Your expected pay in Php per hour



8. Hard Drive ‚Äì Take a screenshot of how much space you have on your hard drive on your computer



Make sure to follow all the steps above. This is an excellent job opportunity with the ability to get bonuses and raises, so I will only look at applicants that really want the job and follow these instructions. If we d
 to interview you there will be a short Zoom call to start.



Do not write more than what I have asked you above, if you write more than what is asked for above your
 will not be replied to unfortunately.



Thank you and we‚Äôre looking forward to hearing from you!



Ben Sweet

title: IT Sales Client Intake & Discovery Consultant
description:
Company: Beta Tech (Australia)

Location: Remote ‚Äì Philippines



About Beta Tech



Beta Tech is an Australian business systems and automation company.

We help trade and field service businesses replace messy admin, missed bookings, and manual workflows with custom-built systems, CRM setups, and automation.



We are growing and looking for a confident, organised communicator to manage inbound enquiries and run structured discovery calls with Australian business owners.



This is NOT a typical admin VA role.

This is a performance-driven, revenue-impact role.



What You Will Do



Respond to new enquiries within 5 minutes



Call Australian business owners who enquire about improving their systems



Run structured discovery calls (training provided)



Identify admin, booking, payment, and workflow problems



Prepare detailed requirement briefs for our systems team



Book proposal calls



Maintain accurate CRM records



Follow structured follow-up processes



What This Role Is NOT



Not technical support



Not cold calling random lists



Not graphic design or web development



Not just
 handling



You will be speaking directly with business owners.



We Are Looking For Someone Who:



Speaks clear, confident English



Is comfortable speaking on the phone



Can listen carefully and take structured notes



Can follow a system without improvising scope



Is KPI-driven and comfortable with performance targets



Has experience in sales support, SDR, appointment setting, or SaaS intake (preferred but not required)



Compensation



Competitive base salary



Performance bonuses for:



Attended discovery calls



Closed deals originating from your intake



Long-term growth opportunity



Application Process



To be considered, please submit:



A 60-second voice recording introducing yourself as if you are calling a business owner from Beta Tech.



A short written outline explaining how you would run a discovery call with a plumbing business that says:

‚ÄúOur admin is messy and we miss follow-ups.‚Äù



Only shortlisted applicants will move to the next stage.
