title: Web and Marketing Designer
description:
Job Description: Web + Marketing Designer (Wix Studio, Canva, Figma)



If you love turning messy notes into clean, on-brand pages‚Ä¶ and you get weirdly excited about a well-structured resource hub (like ‚Äúah yes, hierarchy ????‚Äù), this might be your lane.



We‚Äôre looking for a Web + Marketing Designer who can help us ship a backlog of website pages and marketing assets fast‚Äîwithout needing constant approvals. This isn‚Äôt a ‚Äújust make pretty things‚Äù role. It‚Äôs a take-ownership, ship consistently, and make the brand feel instantly more professional kind of role.



?



Your impact



Within 90 days, you‚Äôll own a steady pipeline of polished web and marketing assets. You‚Äôll help us:

 ‚Ä¢ launch a content/resource hub with 20‚Äì25 high-quality pages

 ‚Ä¢ create clean, consistent marketing + client education materials

 ‚Ä¢ speed up how we communicate with clients (clearer visuals, better pages, smoother onboarding)



?



What you‚Äôll do



Website build-outs (core focus)

 ‚Ä¢ Build and refresh 20‚Äì25 website pages to kickstart a content/resource hub (feature launches, SOP-style guides, education pages)

 ‚Ä¢ Work mainly in Wix Studio (if you‚Äôre strong in WordPress/CMS and can ramp fast, that‚Äôs totally acceptable)

 ‚Ä¢ Turn rough wireframes/notes into polished pages with strong layout, hierarchy, and readability

 ‚Ä¢ Make smart design decisions independently (no ‚Äúwaiting for the founder to approve every pixel‚Äù energy)



Marketing + client-education assets

 ‚Ä¢ Create branded assets in Canva (LinkedIn carousel/swipe posts, onboarding visuals, lightweight collateral)

 ‚Ä¢ Maintain brand consistency using our brand kit (fonts, colours, spacing, tone)

 ‚Ä¢ Produce Figma mockups when needed (page concepts, component ideas, layout explorations) and translate them into live pages



Light ops + communication support (small but helpful)

 ‚Ä¢ Support basic operations:
 triage, draft/reply to simple messages, flag priority items

 ‚Ä¢ Gradually step into client onboarding/follow-ups once you understand the business (you may be looped into onboarding comms or occasional calls)



How we collaborate

 ‚Ä¢ Daily comms:

 ‚Ä¢ Files/docs: Google Workspace

 ‚Ä¢ Documentation: Confluence (easy to learn)



?



Must-have qualifications (self-check)

 ‚Ä¢ Formal design education (degree, diploma, or recognised certification) ‚Äî not purely self-taught

 ‚Ä¢ Strong portfolio showing web + marketing design (live links and/or case studies)

 ‚Ä¢ Confident in Canva (independent creation of marketing assets)

 ‚Ä¢ Confident in Figma (UI/UX mockups, layouts, components)

 ‚Ä¢ Web platform capability: Wix Studio preferred, or strong WordPress/CMS experience and can ramp quickly

 ‚Ä¢ Professional, client-ready English (written + spoken)

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable working with autonomy and initiative (minimal hand-holding)

 ‚Ä¢ Secure home office + reliable internet



?



Nice to have (but not required)

 ‚Ä¢ Wix Studio experience specifically (responsive rules, components, Studio builder)

 ‚Ä¢ Experience designing education/resource hubs, knowledge bases, or feature launch pages

 ‚Ä¢ Basic copywriting / UX writing instincts

 ‚Ä¢ Confluence familiarity or experience documenting workflows

 ‚Ä¢ Comfortable using AI tools to speed up drafts (with good judgment)



?



Success outcomes (30 / 60 / 90 days)



30 days ‚Äî settled in + shipping

 ‚Ä¢ Learn the brand + cadence

 ‚Ä¢ Ship your first pages/assets with minimal revisions

 ‚Ä¢ Establish a weekly rhythm (plan early-week, deliver end-week)



60 days ‚Äî consistent output

 ‚Ä¢ Reliably produce high-quality pages and Canva assets end-to-end

 ‚Ä¢ Confidently handle simple client follow-ups/onboarding comms



90 days ‚Äî pipeline owner

 ‚Ä¢ Own the web + marketing design pipeline

 ‚Ä¢ Clear the initial backlog of pages

 ‚Ä¢ Reduce founder involvement to quick reviews vs constant direction



?



Why this role matters



The business is growing and shipping features, but design + content updates are bottlenecked by founder capacity. Your work directly improves:

 ‚Ä¢ how customers understand the product

 ‚Ä¢ how polished the brand looks

 ‚Ä¢ how smooth onboarding feels



If you want a role that starts design-heavy and can grow into broader ops/client support, you‚Äôll fit here.

title: Ad Creator & Video Editor (Affiliate Marketing ‚Äì Short Form Ads) Platform
description:
About Us

We are a lean affiliate marketing team producing high-converting ad creatives across multiple verticals, including online gaming, financial technology, supplements, and software. We move fast, test aggressively, and prioritize performance-driven media.

We are looking for a skilled ad creator and video editor who understands how to craft sales-focused content that converts.



Role Overview

You will create short-form video ads designed to drive conversions. This includes review-style ads, high-energy TikTok-style edits, viral formats, and strong CTA-driven creatives.

You must understand how to structure ads that hook attention quickly and push viewers toward action.



Responsibilities

Create short-form video ads (primarily 15‚Äì60 seconds)

Edit engaging, flashy, fast-paced TikTok-style content

Produce review-style and talking head ads

Integrate current social media trends and popular culture into creatives

Use AI tools to generate UGC-style content and commentary

Deliver multiple variations for testing

Optimize edits based on performance feedback

Maintain clean, error-free English in all on-screen text and voice content



Required Skills

Strong video editing skills

Experience creating direct-response ads

Ability to craft compelling hooks and strong CTAs

Understanding of what makes ads convert

Excellent English (impeccable grammar required)

Resourceful and self-sufficient

Ability to follow briefs and deliver quickly



Preferred Skills

Experience with CapCut

Experience with AI video creation tools

Experience creating AI-generated UGC content

Background in affiliate marketing ads

Experience in online gaming, fintech, supplements, or software verticals



Performance & Pay

$2 per approved short-form video

Payment is based on approved deliverables

Strong performers may receive extended contracts or full-time offers



How to Apply

Send the following:

Video portfolio (required ‚Äì direct links only)

Examples of performance-focused ad creatives

List of tools you use (especially AI tools and CapCut experience)

Weekly availability



Applications without a video portfolio will not be considered. Only applicants with strong English and demonstrated ad experience will be reviewed.

title: Web Developer (Full-Time Collaboration) ‚Äì Web Applications
description:
We‚Äôre looking for a developer to work with us full-time on web app creation and ongoing maintenance. The focus is clean architecture, solid logic, and building systems that last.



This is a long-term collaboration for someone who can take ownership of their work and move projects forward with minimal supervision.

- Vanilla JavaScript

- MySQL



You should be comfortable building systems from scratch and maintaining existing ones.

- Experience with Laravel and/or Symfony

- Good knowledge of GitHub, VS Code, and basic DevOps

- Strong logical thinking and the ability to understand requirements beyond surface-level explanations

- Already using a MacBook Pro

- Or at least a modern, reliable computer setup



What Matters Most:



- Clean and structured coding

- Problem-solving mindset

- Ability to work independently

- Clear and direct communication

- Attention to detail



Remuneration (Monthly Range):



- Junior level: $400

- Mid-level: $700

- Senior level: $1,000 ‚Äì $1,500

Range depends on skill level and experience.



Why Work With Us

- You won‚Äôt just maintain code ‚Äî you‚Äôll build systems.

- You‚Äôll be exposed to real architecture decisions, performance considerations, and structured development practices.

- If you‚Äôre serious about sharpening your skills quickly and gaining strong, practical experience, this collaboration will push you forward.



To Apply

Send:

Short introduction

Relevant projects (live links preferred)

GitHub profile (if available)

Your level (Junior / Mid / Senior)

Your expected monthly remuneration



We review applications carefully.

title: Webinar Operations & Tech Specialist
description:
About the Role: We are looking for a sharp, fast-acting Operations Specialist to own the technical side of our weekly live webinars. You will be the "co-pilot" for the founder, ensuring the tech is flawless so I can focus 100% on the presentation and the sale.



Primary Responsibilities:



Live Webinar Management: Manage the Zoom/Webinar platform during the live show. You will be responsible for dropping the Whop payment links and financing links in the chat at the exact right moment.



Pre-Webinar Setup: Update the webinar dates on our landing pages and in GoHighLevel (GHL) every week.



Automation Maintenance: Ensure the "Webinar Starting Now" SMS and
 sequences are active and firing to our lead list.



Post-Webinar Cleanup: Update the funnel for the replay and ensure the sales data is tracking correctly.



Skills Required:



Experience with Zoom, GoHighLevel, and Zapier.



Ability to work live (U.S. time zones) and stay focused in a high-energy environment.



High attention to detail‚Äîmissing a payment link or a date change isn't an option.

title: SEO Specialist (Construction Industry) ‚Äì Long-Term Work
description:
SEO Specialist (Construction Industry) ‚Äì Long-Term Work



We are a UK-based construction company looking for an experienced SEO specialist to work with us long-term.



This is not a beginner role.

This is for someone who knows what they‚Äôre doing and can work without being babysat.



Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



- Minimum 3 years proven SEO experience

- Strong understanding of:

  - Google Search Console

  - Keyword analysis

  - On-page SEO

  - URL slugs

  - Site structure

  - Tags & metadata

  - Internal linking

- Able to:

  - Analyse Search Console data

  - Integrate keywords naturally into existing content

  - Improve rankings without over-optimising

- Can work independently and proactively

- Does NOT need constant checking

- Understands how SEO works for local service / construction businesses

- Reliable internet and availability



Bonus (Not Required but Preferred)



- Experience with Google Ads

- Experience ranking local service businesses

- Experience in UK markets



What We Expect



- You manage your own work

- You take initiative

- You communicate clearly

- You reply promptly (no disappearing for days)

- You commit to regular, ongoing work

- You are organised and professional



We are NOT interested in:

- Jack of all trades

- General VAs pretending to be SEO experts

- Time wasters

- People who outsource the work

- People who need hand-holding



What You Must Include in Your Application



To be considered, you MUST send:



1. Your hourly rate

2. Your available working hours (in UK time)

3. Examples of websites you have ranked

4. Your main SEO tools

5. A short explanation of how you use Google Search Console

6. How you normally improve underperforming pages



Applications without this information will be ignored.



Pay & Work



- Hourly or monthly (based on experience)

- Long-term opportunity

- Stable workload

- Performance-based growth



If you are a serious SEO professional looking for consistent work with a growing company, apply.



If not, please do not apply.

‚Ä¢ Basic copywriting / UX writing instincts

‚Ä¢ Confluence familiarity or experience documenting workflows

‚Ä¢ Comfortable using AI tools to speed up drafts (with good judgment)



?



Success outcomes (30 / 60 / 90 days)



30 days ‚Äî settled in + shipping

‚Ä¢ Learn the brand + cadence

‚Ä¢ Ship your first pages/assets with minimal revisions

‚Ä¢ Establish a weekly rhythm (plan early-week, deliver end-week)



60 days ‚Äî consistent output

‚Ä¢ Reliably produce high-quality pages and Canva assets end-to-end

‚Ä¢ Confidently handle simple client follow-ups/onboarding comms



90 days ‚Äî pipeline owner

‚Ä¢ Own the web + marketing design pipeline

‚Ä¢ Clear the initial backlog of pages

‚Ä¢ Reduce founder involvement to quick reviews vs constant direction



?



Why this role matters



The business is growing and shipping features, but design + content updates are bottlenecked by founder capacity. Your work directly improves:

‚Ä¢ how customers understand the product

‚Ä¢ how polished the brand looks

‚Ä¢ how smooth onboarding feels



If you want a role that starts design-heavy and can grow into broader ops/client support, you‚Äôll fit here.

title: ADS Editor Germany/Beauty
description:
Job Title: Direct Response Video Editor & Ads Creator (Beauty Niche) ‚Äì Long-term Partnership

Brand: 

Niche: Beauty / Cosmetics

Language Requirement: German (Content Creation) / English (Communication with us)

Location: Remote (Focusing on the German Market)



The Role

We are looking for a creative powerhouse who is both an Ads Editor and a Content Strategist. We don‚Äôt just need someone to "cut video"; we need someone who understands direct response marketing and can turn raw footage into high-converting assets.



Your Responsibilities

Ad Creation: Transform existing raw content into high-performing video ads (TikTok, IG Reels, FB Ads).



Content Sourcing: Proactively find and curate trending content/B-roll that fits our brand aesthetic.



VSL Mastery: Craft and edit Video Sales Letters that keep viewers hooked from the first second to the CTA.



German Market Focus: Since our brand operates in Germany, you must be able to create/edit content that resonates with the German beauty audience (understanding the language/culture is a massive plus).



Requirements

Proven Track Record: Experience in the Beauty/Skincare niche is highly preferred.



Direct Response Knowledge: You understand hooks, hold rates, and how to drive conversions, not just "pretty" edits.



Tool Kit: Mastery of Premiere Pro, After Effects, or CapCut (Desktop).



Autonomy: You don't just wait for instructions‚Äîein bring your own ideas for new ad angles and creative testing.



VSL Experience: You know how to pace a long-form sales video to maintain engagement.



What We Offer

Long-term Partnership: We are looking for a reliable partner to grow with us, not a one-off freelancer.



Creative Freedom: We value your expertise and input on what works.



Consistent Workflow: Regular projects and clear communication.

title: Full-Time Social Media Manager (Organic Growth Focus) ‚Äì Remote
description:
We are a growing marketing agency working with businesses worldwide, and we are looking for a full-time Social Media Manager to join our remote team.



This role is for someone who understands how to grow brands organically through strategic content, community building, and influencer collaborations. This is not a basic scheduling or posting role. We are looking for someone who can manage social media end-to-end and drive measurable growth.



ROLE OVERVIEW



You will be responsible for managing and growing our presence across:



1.
 (X)

2.

3. Instagram

4. TikTok

5. LinkedIn

6. Any additional platforms we expand into



Your focus will be on organic reach, engagement, brand authority, and strategic influencer partnerships.



RESPONSIBILITIES



You will:



1. Research trends, audience behavior, and content opportunities within marketing and local business niches

2. Develop strategic content ideas designed to drive organic growth

3. Write compelling copy for posts, captions, hooks, threads, carousels, and calls to action

4. Design posts, carousels, stories, and short-form videos using Canva

5. Create reels and short-form videos using Canva templates

6. Plan and manage a structured content calendar

7. Optimize content per platform including format, tone, timing, and algorithm behavior

8. Monitor engagement and actively build community through comments, DMs, and conversations

9. Track performance metrics and refine strategy based on data insights

10. Identify and research relevant influencers within our niche

11. Conduct influencer outreach via DM or
, build partnerships, and coordinate collaborations

12. Track influencer campaign performance and ensure alignment with brand goals

13. Collaborate with our internal team to align content and partnerships with overall marketing strategy



REQUIREMENTS



To be considered, you must:

1. Have proven experience managing social media accounts for brands or agencies

2. Demonstrate strong content writing and copywriting skills

3. Have experience with influencer outreach or partnership coordination

4. Be capable of independent research on trends, competitors, and niche influencers

5. Have solid working knowledge of Canva for posts, carousels, reels, and short videos

6. Understand how organic growth works on TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn,
 (X), and

7. Be comfortable initiating conversations and building relationships with influencers

8. Be available for a full-time remote position

9. Be organized, reliable, and deadline-driven

10. Think strategically, not just creatively



PORTFOLIO REQUIREMENT (IMPORTANT)



Your application must include:



1. Links to social media accounts or brands you have managed

2. Examples of posts, carousels, reels, or short videos you created

3. Examples of influencer collaborations you have executed, if applicable

4. A portfolio link or Google Drive link showcasing your work



Applications without proof of work will not be reviewed.



SALARY



Please include:



1. Your expected monthly salary

2. Confirmation of full-time availability

3. Your earliest possible start date



HOW TO APPLY



Start your application with the phrase:



SOCIAL MEDIA BUILDER



Then include:



1. A brief introduction about yourself

2. Links to your portfolio and previous social media work

3. Examples of influencer outreach or collaborations, if any

4. Your expected monthly salary

5. Your availability and start date



We are looking for someone who takes ownership, understands organic growth deeply, can build strategic influencer relationships, and wants to grow long-term with a marketing agency.
